Menu | Mucca Osteria – Authentic Italian Dining in Portland — Mucca V3
Gift Cards
Menu
Reservations
Wine
Pizzeria
Gift Cards
Menu
Reservations
Wine
Pizzeria
We offer an à la carte menu and prix fixe menu inspired by the bounty of each season for your dining experience.
Prix Fixe Menu
: Delight in the customizable experience of our exquisite 4-course prix fixe menu, where you may choose from options of our most beloved dishes and seasonal specials for each course — Appetizer, Pasta, Main Course, and Dessert. We can accommodate most dietary restrictions with a minimum of 48 hours notice. We look forward to creating a memorable dining experience for you.
Please click here for our current menus.
(Our menus may occasionally vary based on ingredient availability).
Thank you for choosing to dine with us! A 20% gratuity will be included in your bill to fairly compensate our hardworking front and back of house staff as we strive to provide you with exceptional service. Your understanding and continued support are greatly appreciated. Grazie!

name: Campana
raw_text:
Portland's Best Italian Restaurant | Campana
ABOUT

ABOUT
MENUS
EVENTS & PRIVATE DINING
GIFT CARDS
PRONTO GELATO
CONTACT US
CONTACT US
RESERVATIONS
Campana
A Contemporary Italian Restaurant in Portland, Oregon
Campana is critically acclaimed, being recognized by both
The Oregonian
and
Portland Monthly Magazine
as one of the city's best restaurants. Notably, in
The Oregonian
's 2024 Readers' Poll, Campana was voted the best pasta restaurant in Portland.
Eater Portland
described the space as "bright" and "industrial," while
Portland Monthly
noted its ambiance as "part New Jersey food DNA, part New York fine dining."
Make a Reservation
CONTACT
(503) 841-6195
info@campanapdx.com
HOURS
Monday & Tuesday:  closed
Wednesday - Friday:  5-9pm
Saturday:  4-9pm
Sunday:  4-8pm
LOCATION
901 NE Oneonta St
Portland, Oregon 97211
Reserve a Table
Campana serves a menu of house-made pasta, a la minute risotto, along with meat and fish entrées. Regular offerings include staples like Penne alla Vodka, Cavatelli with Pork Ragù, and Roasted Chicken 'Scarpariello,' in addition to farm sourced seasonal specials. The drink selection features exclusively Italian wines and a range of classic and modern cocktails.
Reserve a Table
Planning something bigger?
Learn more about private dining.
Daily Happy Hour
Wednesday - Friday 5 - 6pm
Saturday - Sunday 4 - 5pm
Happy Hour is served all night at the bar
View Our Menu
Give the Gift of Pasta
Buy a Gift Card
The Oregonian
“
Here are the 5 best places for pasta in Portland
“
Reader’s Choice Awards, The Oregonian
No. 1: Campana
Our dining critic Michael Russell called Campana the best pasta restaurant in Portland earlier this year, and our readers agree! “The handmade pasta is always perfect. They also have the best meatballs,” said one reader. “The ragu and cavatelli is mind alteringly superb,” said another. “Food is impeccable, service is attentive and kind, and the owners and management are some of the best people I’ve ever known,” a reader said.
READ THE ARTICLE
EATER
“
The Best Italian Restaurants in Portland
” by Eater Staff, Eater Portland
There’s plenty to like in this bright, open industrial space, but the simple-yet-delicious plate of spaghetti and meatballs is hard to beat, especially with a crimson glass of Italian wine in hand.
READ THE ARTICLE
Portland Monthly
“
PORTLAND’S TOP 50 RESTAURANTS OF 2024
”
Karen Brooks, Portland Monthly Magazine
While we were sleeping, Campana has quietly morphed into a must-know Italian restaurant, warm and thoughtful to the bone. The mood: part New Jersey food DNA, part New York fine dining. Chef-owner George Kaden comes from both worlds, and he’s got the meatballs to prove it
READ THE ARTICLE

About the Business
Business owner information
Barry B.
Business Owner
At Mama Mia Trattoria, you'll find timeless favorites like chicken, veal and eggplant parmigiana, ravioli, lasagna, manicotti, gnocchi, pizzas, and seafood dishes cooked to perfection. Each dish is made from scratch, using only the best ingredients available. Pastas and mozzarella are made fresh everyday at Mama Mia Trattoria.

Mama Mia Trattoria's authentic southern Italian meals and genuine hospitality of people who love delicious dishes conjure memories of a traditional Italian kitchen. Our "old school" Italian-American soul food, like that offered in many of the best restaurants dotted throughout Little Italy's across the United States, will exceed your expectations. 

Mama Mia Trattoria is open every day for lunch and dinner and now open Saturdays and Sundays for brunch. We also offer take-out, online ordering, catering and event services for your party or corporate gathering.

Gumba is inspired by Italian food, but with roots that extend deep and go far beyond the landscapes of Italy. This is not Italian food. This is food inspired from a life long love of eating.

About Estes
Estes is an Italian American restaurant inspired by Italian roots and the seasonality of the Pacific Northwest. Estes is named for the Italian side of my family that immigrated to the US from Rome. Upon arrival to Ellis Island, our family name was changed from d’Este to Estes.
Estes specializes in hand-made pastas as well as risotto, meat and fish entrees that are seasonally inspired by our farmers. With family roots reaching to Rome, our menu consists of staples such as Cacio e Pepe, Lumache all’Arrabbiata, as well as seasonally influenced ravioli or tortellini.
Currently a Chef Residency, we are located inside Broder Nord on N. Mississippi Ave in the Boise-Eliot Neighborhood
Italian American on Mississippi Ave
Estes Ristorante on Mississippi Ave offers a vibrant fusion of traditional Italian flavors with a modern American twist. Known for its handcrafted pasta and contemporary takes on classic dishes, this spot brings an innovative culinary experience to the heart of the neighborhood. Perfect for those seeking authentic tastes with a fresh perspective.

Wednesday - Thursday 5pm-9pm
Friday - Saturday 5pm-10pm

Q:
It says there are many vegetarian options on the menu, but none of the pastas are vegetarian and only one pizza is vegetarian. Are there other other vegetarian options, not on the menu?
A:
They will make pasta anyway you want, just ask. They will give you choices too.
Michael P.
1 person found this helpful
See question details
Q:
Could anyone lets say from the age of 18-21 allowed? i know it a wine place but i really wanna attend a jazz place without the wine?
A:
It's a wine bar but it's also a restaurant.  I've seen families with children in there so I am pretty sure you could just go in, order a pizza and a Coke and listen to the music.  I'd give them a call after 5:00 pm and ask.  (503) 659-1143
Walter M.

Exclusive Red Wine Bottles
Famigilia Rivetti, (DOCG) 2021 Nebbiolo Italy
Elegant structure, vibrant acidity, and tannins, often showcasing flavors of cherry,
rose petals, and earthy notes, Pairs well with, meat and cheesy dishes.
Antonelli, Montefalco Sagrantino, (DOCG) 2012 Italy
This vintage is likely to exhibit deep, dark fruit flavors—think black cherry and plum
alongside distinctive earthy and spicy notes. The tannins are often robust, making it a
great candidate for aging, which can enhance its complexity. You'll also find hints of
leather, cocoa, and possibly herbal undertones as it evolves in the glass. Pairing it
with hearty dishes like roasted meats or aged cheeses can really elevate the
experience.
Produttori Barbaresco (DOCG) 2019 Nebbiolo Italy
Aromas of spices, pepper, and black cherries. On the palate this wine is powerful,
firm, elegant and ethereal. Pairs well with pastas, risotto, white meats, poultry, red
meat, lamb pappardelle and aged cheese.
Cantina Zaccagnini (DOC) 2021 Montepulciano Italy
Intense ruby red color with violet nuances. Intense, characteristic bouquet of the
primary grape aromas. Fruity component, full bodied and robust, well-balanced with
tannin and oak features. Pairs well with ragu dishes, white meats, poultry, house
baked breads.
Damilano Borolo (DOCG) 2018 Liste Italy
Deep garnet color with intense aromas of roses, red berries, licorice, and tobacco.
On the palate, it is full-bodied and rich with flavors of black cherry, plum, chocolate,
and truffle. The tannins are silky and refined, with a long and persistent finish.
Tenuta Di Sesta (DOCG) 2019 Brunello Di Montalcino Italy
Elegant, rich in aromas of dried red fruits, spicy in notes of liquorice and tobacco.
Dry, soft with velvet tannins, balanced, very intense, and persistent finish. Pairs well
with meat pizzas, carbonara, seafood, and cured meats.
Inscription, Pinot Noir, OR (local)
Elegant, rich in aromas of dried red fruits, spicy in notes of liquorice and tobacco.
Dry, soft with velvet tannins, balanced, very intense, and persistent finish. Pairs well
with meat pizzas, carbonara, seafood, and cured meats.
Campo Viejo , Tempranillo, La Rioja, Spain
Intense ruby red color with violet nuances. Intense, characteristic bouquet of the
primary grape aromas. Fruity component, full bodied and robust, well-balanced with
tannin and oak features. Pairs well with ragu dishes, white meats, poultry, house
baked breads.
Fattoria di Petrorio, Chianti Classico, Italy (DOCG)
Elegant, rich in aromas of dried red fruits, spicy in notes of liquorice and tobacco.
Dry, soft with velvet tannins, balanced, very intense, and persistent finish. Pairs well
with meat pizzas, carbonara, seafood, and cured meats.
Bodegas Belgrano, Malbec Reserva, Argentina
Intense ruby red color with violet nuances. Intense, characteristic bouquet of the
primary grape aromas. Fruity component, full bodied and robust, well-balanced with
tannin and oak features. Pairs well with ragu dishes, white meats, poultry, house
baked breads.

At Gino's, every meal tells a story
fresh ingredients, heartfelt flavors, and the joy of gathering together.
Bring the heart of Gino's to your table
crafted with love, served with care.
Let us take care of the food so you can focus on the moment. Our curated dishes, made with fresh, local ingredients, are perfect for any occasion.
Catering
Gather around Gino's
where every celebration feels like home.
From intimate gatherings to lively celebrations, Gino's is your destination for exceptional group dining. Let us make your occasion truly special.
Book a party
Skip the wait, savor the flavor
pick up your Gino's favorites today!
Pick up a meal that's always fresh and full of flavor. Perfect for enjoying wherever life takes you.
Order now
It all started when...
Marc and Debby Accuardi opened Gino’s Restaurant and Bar February 27, 1996; their idea was to have a place where families, friends, and neighbors could gather for quality food and wine. That simple idea has turned into the reality that Gino’s is today. When you walk through the copper metal door and you’re greeted with the warmth of a century old oak wood bar, you know you are someplace where you can relax.
Read more
about us
Reserve your spot at Gino's
where great food and unforgettable moments await

Review by - Google
five star review by
Steph S:
Stumbled on here once and have been back 3 times. The puttanesca is *muah! * Service has been top notch every time and I feel like this is a true staple of the area.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Brian N:
Large plates easy to share. Four of us went for dinner and we each had something different and all four meals were delicious! All of the staff were amazing!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Phil B:
Excellent service and the food was absolutely amazing. Was an absolutely beautiful evening and perfect place for a first date !
Review by - Google
five star review by
Josh V:
The food was flawless, the service was no nonsense and precise, exactly the way it should be. We love Gino's.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Ellie S:
Always amazing food! It is such a nice atmosphere, the food is AMAZING, my favorite is the ravioli!

LUNCH

Lunch is counter service, walk in only.
DINNER
SUNDAY-THURSDAY 4-9
FRIDAY & SATURDAY 4-10
HAPPY HOUR 4-6p
DINING AT KACHKA
DINNER RESERVATIONS & WALK INS
Kachka gladly takes reservations for dinner service from 4-9pm SUNDAY-THURSDAY, and 4-10pm FRI & SAT. Happy Hour is available from 4-6pm daily. If nothing is available on OpenTable, you are welcome to stop by to check with the host. We encourage reservations however, we do save a limited amount of tables for walk ins at our bar, and lounge.
LUNCH AT KACHKA
We are open for lunch daily from 11am-3pm. Lunch is walk in only, counter service style with indoor seating available in the Kachka lounge
.
PLOV PARTY
Inspired by our recent trip, we bring you the Kachka
Plov Party
. Plov is the national dish of Uzbekistan and we ate it in every city we went to, taking in the subtle differences in spices and technique. We loved it so much we even hauled a kazan home in our suitcase! Join us in celebrating this amazing dish.  Please visit our Plov Party! page for more info
here.
ORDER KACHKA TAKE-OUT
Please note that a 22% service fee will be applied to to-go orders in order to provide  a minimum wage of $25 per hour and free healthcare for all employees.
PARTY PACKAGES
Georgian Supra
Kachka Classics
Silk Road Feast
Large Party Inquiry
We love to throw parties!
We offer private dining in our Gallery room, with a variety of menu options. No matter the occasion we’ve got the perfect set up for you!
For parties up to 12, please book online. For groups larger than 12, please complete the form below
be sure to check out all the details on the
Private Dining
page before submitting your request.

DIMO’S APIZZA (“ahh-beets”) “Dimo” is an homage to Chef Doug
Miriello’s grandmother, Grace Dimo. The menu is a reflection of
Doug’s East Coast roots and highlights his favorite local ingredients
and New Haven style apizza that he grew up on.

FAQs
Who is Luc Lac Vietnamese Kitchen?
We are just one big, pho sling’n, fish sauce cookin', cocktail pourin', Portland lovin' family.
Do you offer specialty catering?
No problem! We generally need a 72 hour notice for any catering orders. All catering orders can be picked up from our restaurant everyday from 11am - 11pm. We offer both self - serve family style catering packed in aluminum foil trays or individually packed items packed in our regular to-go boxes. Please keep in mind that we cannot pack soup based items such as pho or curry in aluminum foil trays, so they can only be purchased as individual items. We can provide catering orders of all sizes with a minimum total of $200. A 15% catering service charge will also be applied on top of all orders. You can make your catering order through our
online catering website
. For all catering questions, please email office@luclackitchen.com.
If you are interested in having a catering order delivered to your office or event, we do work very closely with a 3rd party catering team called Spork who can help take your order as well as deliver your food. Please reach out to
Spork
for more information on placing an order.
Do you take large to-go orders?
Yessir! We can take to-go orders as large as ~$250 without any prior notice. To place a large to-go order, call our restaurant during regular business hours and we should be able to coordinate your order with the kitchen to be picked up in about 15-30 minutes. Unfortunately, due to the high volume of our orders, we are unable to accommodate any special pick up times. If you need a special pick up time, please call 15-30 minutes before you intend to pick up. Please keep in mind that all orders over $80 are subject to a 15% service fee. For any order larger than ~$250, please consider our catering options.
Do you take reservations?
Luc Lac does not accept any reservations. We are a first-come, first-serve, walk-in restaurant for complete parties only. Our space is very limited and fills up fast. Out of fairness to anybody already waiting in line and currently on our seating list, we can only take your order once your entire party has arrived in our building. Unfortunately, there are absolutely no exceptions. If we can’t see everybody’s face, your entire party has not arrived.
If you arrive before the rest of your party, you are welcome to stand in line to receive a number to hold your spot in line. Please keep in mind that this number will only hold your place in line and it does not allow you to place any food orders or be seated until your entire party has arrived.
For lunch, our busiest hours are between 11:30AM-1:30PM. For dinner, our busiest hours are between 5:30PM-9:00PM. All guests should anticipate a wait during these hours. Small parties of four or less can typically anticipate a 10-25 minute wait for a table after your order has been placed. Parties larger than six should anticipate a 20-40 minute wait. Depending on how busy our restaurant is, these wait times can vary for better or worse. Please be assured, our team will work our ass off to make sure you get seated as soon as possible!
Do you seat incomplete parties?
No. We have limited seating and there is often a waiting list during our peak hours. Out of fairness to all of our customers, we are only able to take orders and seat parties that are complete.
Is Luc Lac a full service restaurant?
No. We are a counter-service restaurant where all of our customers order at the counter first prior to seating. Customers are seated and served on a first-order, first-served basis.
Drop us a line
Name
Email address
Message
©
Luc Lac Vietnamese Kitchen
Often imitated, never duplicated.

To our customers
​
Thank you for choosing Murata, and we hope you enjoy Murata’s select Japanese cuisine. Due to fluctuations in the availability of fresh, quality ingredients, the chef reserves the ability to modify menu items to maintain the highest quality of our food items. If you have special requests, please inform your server before placing your order.
Also, we are happy to take your reservations and make special accommodations for your parties. Please let us know of any ways that we can assist your special occasion.
​
Thank you very much for your patronage.
Owner
Masayuki Murata

raw_text:
Degario's | Gluten Free Vegetarian Vegan Pasta Italian Cuisine
top of page
Welcome to
Degario's Ristorante!
Come see how we strive to be the Best Italian Restaurant in Portland!
Click Here To Place An Online Order
HOME
Menu Degario's Ristorante
GLUTEN FREE VEGETARIAN VEGAN OPTIONS
ABOUT
VISIT US/CONTACT US
BLOG
Social Media
More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Gluten Free diet? No problem!  Just ask your server for recommendations and we will take care of you!  We offer many preparations of pasta dishes that are gluten free, and you will find many entrees that we make that are gluten free such as our steak or lamb chops!  We can also substitute a gluten free crust on pizzas and recommend cocktails that don't contain gluten!
Many of our pasta dishes & salads are much more than just vegetarian friendly, they are a vegetarian's delight!  Ask your server for a recommendation based on what you are craving and we will be sure to cook something delicious to satisfy your desires! A few popular options at the moment are the Mediterranean Cavatelli , Margherita Pizza, Ricotta Ravioli in sage cream sauce with squash, Gemelli Primavera, and the delicious Trofie al Pesto!
Vegetarian & Vegan Diet
Special
Diet?
If you have any other dietary concerns or requests please ask your server and we will work hard to cook something delicious for you that caters to your diet!

History on Our Italian Restaurant Menu in Troutdale OR
Ristorante Di Pompello is owned and operated by Saul and Ruby Pompeyo. This restaurant is the culmination of a lifelong dream of Saul’s; to open one of his own Italian Restaurants! Saul and Ruby work seven days a week in the restaurant. Their Italian food menu is made up of Ruby’s sauces made fresh, from scratch, every day. She also helps Saul in the kitchen as well.
Saul was raised in the Italian Food business. His father owned and operated an Italian Restaurant in Mexico City where Saul learned all aspects of the Italian Restaurant. In the summer time, as a child and teen, Saul would travel to his paternal grandmother’s home on the Yucatan Peninsula. His Grandmother was a fantastic traditional Italian cook and constantly entertained many guests and relatives. Always at her side was Saul learning traditional Italian recipes from the finest; Grandma Di Pompello. The name of the restaurant “Di Pompello” is the original Italian family name and serves as a memorial to Saul’s grandparents and underscores the value of family to Saul and Ruby.
Contact Us
Call us today to make reservations or book your event with Ristorante Di Pompello, authentic Italian restaurant!
(503) 667-2480
Or, leave your information below and we’ll give you a call back as soon as possible. We look forward to working with you!

After the Family restaurant was destroyed in the Mexico City earthquake, Saul was recruited to leave Mexico City and come to Portland to manage a downtown Italian Restaurant. After his initial experience in Portland, Saul opened several other Italian food places in Portland for other people. Saul finally decided it was time for him to fulfill his lifelong dream and open his own Authentic Italian restaurant. Saul chose to open up in Troutdale because of the small town family atmosphere that Troutdale offers. He wants to know his customers as his friends and family. Because making friends is so important to him, he stresses food quality with every meal that is prepared.
“We want to know everybody and have a relationship with our customers and provide the best food we possibly can” ~ Saul.
We invite you to stop by and check out our extensive and affordable Italian restaurant menu. We have a variety of Italian food options, from sandwiches and Traditional Classic pasta dishes to extravagant Italian Seafood Specialties. We even offer daily Specials.

About the Business
The turning peel pizza dough is sourdough naturally leavened for 3 days. Sourdough is easier to digest and much healthier for your body. And it gives that flavor you cannot resist.

Airy rim and thin crust: the AVPN has a standard for Neapolitan pizza. The turning peel follows the AVPN standard.

The turning peel pizza has a deliciously chewy, yet crunchy texture. A thin crust that can surprisingly withhold the toppings.

Nebbiolo Restaurant & Wine Bar
Located in Oregon City, OR, Nebbiolo Restaurant & Wine Bar specializes in locally sourced foods and drinks, including dine-in meals and takeout. Proudly serving our community for over 13 years. Sophisticated comfort foods created by our female chef. Private event catering available. Contact us now to make a reservation.

About the Business
Business owner information
Michael T.
Business Owner
Simple Italian food, high quality and people oriented service, craft cocktails, scratch kitchen, curated wine list!.  Our menu changes seasonally and we always have at least 3 nightly specials to talk about.  We've been in business since 2004 with lots of our staff at 10 years or more.  Gorgeous outdoor patio, private dining and directly across from the Reser Performing Arts Center.   We take reservations so whether you're here for a casual lunch or a special dinner, we offer a wonderful dining experience in the heart of Beaverton.

Our second taproom is located in NW Portland's Slabtown area and houses a state-of-the-art tasting room in addition to our production brewery.
Seating will be first-come, first-served - we will not be taking reservations at this time. Guests of all ages are welcome, as are your furry friends! Leashed, friendly dogs are now allowed on the patio. No cash will be accepted at this time.
Click
here
for the full draft list and beginning 5/1 we will be welcoming
Pizza Thief
into our kitchen full-time to serve up NY-Style goodies every day!
NW28th Events:
Thursdays:
We’re back with our pals at Last Call Trivia every week starting at 6pm!
7/4: Closed for the Fourth of July
7/7: Yoga + Beer hosted by Cheers & Namaste starting at 11am.
Your registration includes a 60 minute yoga class and your first beverage.
$23 for Yoga + Beer. $17 for Yoga Only.
Register here.

Menu
Famous 3 Course Meals
Menu items and prices can vary by location.  Please contact The Old Spaghetti Factory near you for specific information.
Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.
View Your Location’s Menu
Appetizers
Sicilian Garlic Cheese Bread
A generous portion of fresh bread topped with a tasty blend of garlic and three melted cheeses served toasted with a side of our homemade Marinara Sauce. (1220 cal)
Salad
Chicken Caesar Salad
Lightly breaded chicken breast strips atop romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, shredded Romano cheese, and croutons.  (1120 cal)
Without chicken (820 cal)
Served with soup (100-320 cal) and spumoni ice cream (170 cal)
Founder's Favorites
Our Famous Baked Lasagna
Layers of noodles, Marinara Sauce, ground beef and pork, and four delicious cheeses.  (820 cal)
Gourmet Jumbo Crab Ravioli
Large ravioli stuffed with savory crab meat and ricotta cheese topped with a rich Pesto Alfredo Sauce. (810 cal)
Garlic Mizithra
Spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter tossed with a delicious blend of sautéed garlic, bacon,
and mushrooms. (1360 cal)
Spaghetti Vesuvius
A spicy blend of tender chicken, sausage, and diced meatballs with green peppers and onions. Seasoned with Tabasco® and Sambal Chili Paste. (860 cal)
Savory Chicken
Chicken Parmigiana
A perfectly seasoned breast of tender chicken with melted cheese and Pomodoro Sauce. Served with spaghetti and Marinara Sauce. (750 cal)
Breast of Chicken Fettuccine
Fettuccine topped with tender diced chicken breast, fresh broccoli, sautéed mushrooms, Alfredo Sauce, and shredded Romano cheese. (1260 cal)
Chicken Marsala
A freshly seasoned breast of tender chicken with a Mushroom and Marsala Wine Sauce. Served alongside spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. (1000 cal)
Pasta Classics
Served over the finest 100% durum semolina spaghetti.
Marinara Sauce
Our from scratch recipe of fresh onions, carrots, tomatoes, and garlic sautéed in olive oil and Italian seasonings.  (560 cal)
Rich Meat Sauce
Mamma Mia!  Our 1969 original from scratch recipe of perfectly ripe tomatoes and ground beef sautéed with freshly chopped onions, celery, and garlic, all simmered slowly to perfection with savory Italian herbs and spices.  Delizioso!  (650 cal)
White Clam Sauce
Our from scratch recipe for clam lovers – with hints of wine, fresh garlic, green peppers, onions and parsley.  (810 cal)
Mushroom Sauce
Our from scratch Marinara sauce topped with freshly sautéed seasoned mushrooms.  (670 cal)
Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter
A toothsome treat for cheese lovers.  (1190 cal)
The Manager’s Favorite
Pair any two of the above Classic Sauces to create our favorite combination.  (600-1000 cal)
Pot Pourri
A sampler of Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter, Meat, Clam and Marinara Sauces.  (880 cal)
Hearty Meal
A larger serving of our Pasta Classics or Factory Favorites entrees. (950-1990 cal)
Factory Favorites
Italian Sausage with Meat Sauce
Zesty sausage served with our from scratch Rich Meat Sauce.  (980 cal)
Sicilian Meatballs
Two large handmade beef meatballs delicately seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices, then topped with our from scratch Marinara Sauce.  (1040 cal)
Meat Lover’s Treat
Sicilian meatballs, Italian sausage and spaghetti with
Rich Meat Sauce. (1460 cal)
Hearty Meal
A larger serving of our Pasta Classics or Factory Favorites entrees. (950-1990 cal)
Signature Pastas
Fettuccine Alfredo
Fettuccine noodles in a butter cream sauce with shredded Romano cheese. (1090 cal)
Spinach & Cheese Ravioli
Ravioli stuffed with spinach and two delicious cheeses, and topped with our savory Marinara Sauce. (470 cal)
Spinach Tortellini with Alfredo Sauce
Hat shaped pasta, stuffed with a blend of roasted chicken and Mortadella meats, and Romano cheese. (940 cal)
Sides
Fresh Broccoli
Broccoli lightly flavored with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. A great compliment to any entrée!

Our eclectic menus derive inspiration from the Pacific Northwest, extend throughout the Americas and beyond, creating our globally inspired cuisine.
Chef Victor’s dishes are a product of many years working in a professional kitchen. He enjoys curating plates with authentic Mexican flavors, while simultaneously utilizing the finest Northwest ingredients and artisan products from abroad to bring our seasonal, scratch menus to life.
For any questions regarding our menus, or take out orders,
please call the restaurant at (503)-850-8915.

A tangy favorite, made from scratch in our kitchen.
Serves 4
Includes half a loaf of Fresh Sourdough bread and butter.
Add Caesar Salad for 4 for an additional price. (optional)
Add 1/2 dozen White Chocolate Macadamia & 1/2 dozen Chocolate Chip Cookies for 4 for an additional price. (optional)
Baked Lasagna
Layers of Italian lasagna noodles, ground beef, Italian sausage, mozzarella, and cream cheese with Italian spices. Topped with marinara sauce and Parmesan.
Chicken Parmigiana
Parmesan crusted grilled chicken breasts topped with marinara, mozzarella and Parmesan over linguine alfredo or marinara.
Family Pasta Combo
Half Baked Cheese stuffed Tortellini with a rich creamy sauce and mozzarella. Half Chicken Pasta Carbonara with Linguini Alfredo, bacon, chicken, sweet peas, mushrooms, green onions, and Parmesan.

Dine-in Burmese Food Experience
In addition to expanded delivery and takeout offerings, Top Burmese Virtual Restaurant opens its first brick and mortar restaurant location on a trendy NW 21st Ave in Portland. Soon after, additional dining concepts were added such as Bistro Royle in Beaverton, and Burma Joy on vibrant Portland's Slabtown. Come experience our Burmese dining destinations where you can sit down and enjoy our amazing food. Walk-ins welcome.

About the Business
Momoyama is a family-owned contemporary Japanese restaurant that is proud to build on the tradition of Chef Scott Chae’s 30+ years of experience.  Our foundation is the quality sushi and warm service that have made the Yama family of restaurants a Portland staple.  At Momoyama our mission is to elevate that experience in a way that is sleek and modern, yet unpretentious.  Sushi classics share space with creative rolls and exotic offerings from Japan’s Toyosu fish market.  A robust kitchen menu includes premium steaks like A5 Miyazaki Wagyu and unrestrained innovative dishes like the Uni Squid-ink Pasta.  In addition to an extensive sake list, Momoyama offers a full service craft-cocktail bar with playful libations created by an expert bar staff.  From an intimate omakase experience at the sushi bar, or a magical date night, to large party celebrations, and casual family dinners. We strive to provide a welcoming and inclusive experience for every occasion.

TESTIMONIALS FROM OUR
Customers & Friends
Working owners who dedicate their lives to this unique restaurant are amazing and I love to support them as a patron…in return I receive amazing food and entertainment provided almost nightly. Live music, Karaoke, Sing-Alongs, paint night and so on. The menu has a funny name for every meal so be prepared to read every item to figure out what it is, and it’s worth it! The atmosphere is perfect in this relic church conversion, not to mention how good music sounds in this building. I highly recommend you stop in and enjoy yourself. Say hello for me!
Mark Seleen
review from Google
Totally fabulous food and service….3 of us had clams, smoked salmon linguine, a burger…and to die for chocolate mouse pie…we were all very happy and can’t wait to go back…forgot to pick up the take-out menu….for future reference….I had been there once a long time ago and forgot how good it was…super happy to see organic chicken on the menu…terrific variety…a gem of a place.
Nancy Pitt
review from Facebook
Just went earlier tonight for the first time – I’ve driven right past this place a lot, wife and I wanted to go out, we live nearby, so we decided to pop in and see how it is. I think it’s going to be very difficult for us to want to go anywhere else now when we go out to eat. The service was fantastic, smiles all around, checked in on us a couple times unobtrusively, were quick to respond when we flagged them down for a couple to-go boxes, and clearly enjoyed working there. As for the food? Absolutely amazing. Entrees and appetizers were fantastic, you can very clearly tell that it’s all housemade to order, and made by someone that loves what they do. Sorry Mom, but this is some of the best food I’ve ever had! I’m already eager to go back and enjoy another meal
Eric Farm
review from Google
I was taking my son out for his birthday, to the Jack Axe, to throw some axes and do something “different”…I wanted something different for dinner too. Now my husband is on a Keto diet for his health, and the rest of us wanted something amazing. I found Spinella’s online. I loved the idea it is in an old church. I loved the architecture. And I loved the idea that it was not a chain.
We arrived after 8pm, and it was not too busy. The menu is clear and amazing. The names of the meals are so funny, it sparked lots of conversation at our table. They were willing to help make meals keto compliant, and they even let me switch the protein out on mine. I had the most amazing meal here that I have had since I moved to Portland. No kidding. In fact, I struggle with telling you this, because you will flock there in large numbers perhaps, and I will have to wait in line to get that amazing white sauce. But, I owe it to the Yelp community to say, it is amazing. It’s a fun place, the art work is eclectic and the atmosphere is light. But the food. Oh my goodness the food. The potted bread is something I loved in Vegas at another restaurant and thought I would never see again. The pasta dishes are so phenomenal, oh my, I’m salivating on the keys just thinking about it.
Betty C.
review from Yelp
Spinellas
Proudly powered by

name: Matador NW Portland
raw_text:
Matador | NW Portland Restaurants & Bars | Happy Hour, Mexican Food
Matador NW Portland
With windows opening out onto the busy corner of NW 23rd and Quimby, the Matador is at the epicenter of NW Portland. This is the city's fastest growing and arguably its most exciting neighborhood, bridging the timeless Alphabet Blocks and the burgeoning Slabtown. Located in a former distillery, our NW Portland restaurant and bar has been a destination for nearly a decade. Bright and airy by day and a party scene by night, we offer a premier tequila/mezcal bar, late-night food, and NW Portland's best happy hour.
Order Online
Purchase Gift Card
Location
& Hours
Our restaurant and bar is located on the corner of NW 23rd Avenue and Quimby Street in Northwest Portland.
Get Directions
Sunday - Thursday:
11am - 12am
Friday - Saturday:
11am-2am
Happy Hour:
Daily 4-6pm and 10pm-Last Call
1438 NW 23rd Ave
Portland, OR 97210
(503) 228-2855
21+ for Dine-In
Happy Hour
Cocktails To Go
Family-style Meal Kits
View Menus
Main Dine-In Menu
Cocktails
Happy Hour
Tequila
Wine
Private Events
Whether you’re planning a private dinner or a meeting with AV capability, NW Matador has the perfect space for you. Our room can accommodate up to 34 guests, ages 21 and over, and includes large garage doors for a beautiful indoor-outdoor experience when the weather is right. Choose from our customized menus for sit-down or buffet-style occasions. Our staff is happy to help you plan every detail so that you can relax and enjoy our food and drinks.
Please note that we are unable to rent the Añejo room for dinner Friday and Saturday.
Book an Event
Join Our Team
We are always looking for passionate people who want to help us create an extraordinary experience for our guests. If that sounds like you, you’ll love it here, and we want to meet you.
Follow the link below to tell us something about yourself below, or just call or stop by one of our restaurants to set up an interview.
Apply Now
Order Online
More locations
When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device.

Menu
Press
Tamales
Come visit us at our new location!  4512 SE 28th Ave.
Come visit us at our new location!  4512 SE 28th Ave.
About Us
At Salsas Locas, we bring tradition to the table. Founded by Latina entrepreneur Lucy De Leon, our mission is simple: craft culturally authentic meals that meet the highest standards for schools, wholesale buyers, and food service programs.
We proudly serve school districts, local retailers, and institutions with fresh, flavorful food—always made in Oregon, always made with care.
As a Latina-owned business, we celebrate our roots and proudly serve the communities that raised us.
Our Food
Crafted with quality ingredients by people who care. Explore our menus to discover what makes our food stand out.
From special celebrations to everyday cravings, let us handle the cooking — it’s our specialty.

top of page

About

Menu
Gift Cards
Our Dinner changes completely every to allow for changes in locally sourced ingredients and our Chef’s creativity. Please note, our prices vary depending on market price of our ingredients as well.
If you have questions related to allergies or dietary restrictions, please reach out to us directly. We will do what we can to accommodate you.
The Experience
We offer three different options when you dine with us...
Chef's Menu
Take a seat at the Chef's Counter, and Chef Juan takes care of the rest.
​
$90-110 per person,
depending on weekly menu
.
À
La Carte
Pick and choose what looks best to you. Our menu changes completely every week, so no day is ever the same.
Let Us Decide!
Large party and don't want to coordinate an order? We'll take care of it for you.
​
We offer a large format version of our Chef's Menu experience, but for your large party!
Week of September 29
Our menu changes every week. Check back on Tuesday for the weekly menu

raw_text:
Home | Rocio's Mexican Restaurant
Home
About Us

Order Now
Unforgettable Mexican Dining Awaits You!
Experience Mexican perfection at Rocio's. Tradition meets innovation in every dish.
See Our Menu
about us
Rocio's is a place where singles, couples, and families alike can enjoy a great meal in a stylish and relaxed setting.
MAY 16, 2023 - CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP
:
â
Welcome to Rocio's Mexican Restaurant, where a rich tapestry of flavors meets warm hospitality! Nestled at 2850 SE Gladstone St. in Portland, Oregon, our vibrant eatery has been a beloved culinary destination for the past 8 years. Under new ownership since May of this year, Kenny has infused Rocio's with renewed zeal and a commitment to culinary excellence.
Rocio's legacy lives on with new ownersâsame traditions, fresh beginnings!
Thanks for 8 incredible years, SE PDX! Rocio's journey continues. Visit us in San Diego. Â¡Tanto amor!
Explore how to do it
At Rocio's, we pride ourselves on creating an inviting atmosphere that complements our delectable Mexican cuisine. Our patrons rave about the friendly and attentive staff, making every dining experience a delightful occasion. One satisfied customer shared, "Great Mexican food, good atmosphere for dine-in, and really nice staff!!" We cherish the positive feedback from our community and strive to exceed expectations.
For inquiries or reservations, contact us at
(971) 266-8860
.
Â¡Buen provecho!
Embark on a culinary journey with us and savor our signature dishes, with the shrimp tacos standing out as a true crowd-pleaser. Even seasoned connoisseurs, like one of our patrons who resides in the Riviera Maya, attest to the exceptional quality of our fare. Join us for Taco Tuesday, a cherished tradition that brings friends and families together to indulge in the flavors that make Rocio's Mexican Restaurant a culinary gem. Come experience the passion and heart that Kenny pours into every dish, as we aim to take Rocio's to new heights by satisfying all palates.
our menus
Tradition and Innovation on Your Plate!
Experience Rocio's Mex: Explore drinks, savory delights, and customizable catering. A taste of Mexico awaits!
Rocio's offers a menu blending authentic Mexican traditions with innovative flavors.
Enjoy a variety of drinks, savory delights, and customizable catering options at Rocio's.

Came to celebrate our Dadâs 86th birthday! Â We all enjoyed trying a new place. Â Food was delicious, fresh and drinks were enjoyed as well. A special Cherro for my Dad was shared. Thank you for making the afternoon extra special.
Traci Parsons
Very good Mexican food. A wide variety to choose from, everything was authentic, and staff were extremely accommodating. We even help them create a new drink that all the staff loved. Thank you for an awesome evening.
Dennis Gavin
My friend and I absolutely love the food here. We sat outside on a gorgeous day. She kept saying, it's so fresh, it's so fresh. We wanted something healthy and we got what we wanted and a delicious Margarita.
Janie Losli
Just found this place and it's sooo good! Great service and good prices. We had brunch and will definitely be back to try more. The rest of the menu is huge! Tons of different Tequila's and drink choices from the bar.
Tracey Wiley
The food and menu are simple yet simply delicious. My Spanish coffee served with a cinnamon stick was perfect on the cold, windy winter afternoon I was there. Staff sweet as can be.
Solstarmoonlight

The backstory
A few years back, during our stay in the little red house; really just down the street from our
current and hopefully final location here in Lake Oswego we used to Smoke Chicken.
It really goes without saying that it was a smashing hit. We were thrilled to be there.
The road construction began and so did our peril. Running out of time and with nowhere to go, and
given the lack of options in the vinicity, we decided to move to Bangy Road. We thought it was a
fantastic space and very conducive to our business; still the one caviat this place had was that we
were unable to bring the smoker with us. Getting used to the place and the new location took time,
however despite its proximity we just couldn’t replace the organic traffic that Boones Ferry offers.
We took our chances and decided to go for it. At the time we had no idea that another spot would
opened up or that we would even be able to come back to Boones Ferry or that even a pandemic was
looming in the near future. With hard work and under difficult circumstances we were able to manage
the storm and successfully relocate the business.
Our one missing component from this puzzle was to somehow recuperate the Smoked Chicken. With
a brand new smoker and the same delicious recipe; the Smoked Chicken is finally back, here, again.

raw_text:
Eat at Wayfinder — Wayfinder Beer

LOCATIONS
Home
About

Find Our Beer
Contact
OUR BEER
HELL FREEZES OVER
Rotating beer with a Frozen Lemonade Float. Refreshing, unbeatable.
(ABV 4.9%) 0.5L $8
JAWS OF DAMNATION - RICE LAGER
It’s light! It’s crisp! It’s a lager so bold, it’ll leave you screaming for more - before it vanishes into the night with a finish that’ll haunt your taste buds.
(ABV 5.3%) 0.5L $7
PARTY TIME - BAVARIAN-STYLE PILSNER
Foam-crowned, lively beer with the fine hint of noble hops.
(ABV 5.3%) 0.5L $7
TERRIFICA - ITALIAN-STYLE PILSNER
Dry-hopped pils with Polaris, Tettnanger and Saaz. Aromatic, hop-forward, dry.
(ABV 4.7%) 0.5L $7
CORPO SECO - PUMPKIN ALE
Decocted Pumpkin Strong Ale, Notes of fall spices come from aging the beer in a barrel borrowed from our friends at Westward Whiskey
(ABV 6.5%) 0.5L $7.5
SMOKED SECRET SECRET - CZECH DARK LAGER
Secret Secret with a fall twist, smoked malt. This bewitching brew pours an obsidian black, evoking the mystery of a moonless night in the heart of Bohemia. Aromas of dark fruit, rich caramel, and subtle dark chocolate mingle with a gentle malt sweetness, while a whisper of smoke invites you on a journey into the unknown.
(ABV 5.1%) 0.5L $7
BEYOB - DOPPELBOCK
Quad decocted collaboration with doom metal band YOB.  Deep and intense strong lager; extensively cold-conditioned below freezing temps.  Epic, crushing, and heavy beyond words.
(ABV 7.7%) 0.4L $7.5
FUNERAL BOCK - 2X-DECOCTED BLACK BOCK
Brewed strongly with Münich & roast malts, fermented extremely cold with our secret heritage lager yeast and finished with an excessive, hibernative lagering schedule. This iteration of German bockbier is our dirge to the Fall.
(ABV 7%) 0.5L $7
WHISPERING ONE - WINTER LAGER
Winter lager with notes of slightly sweet malt, fruit, warm spices. Vacationed on staves from our neighbors at Westward Whiskey.
(ABV 7.3%) 0.4L $7
WINGED CREATURES - WC IPA
Behold the holy trinity of american hops: Citra, Simcoe & Mosaic. Tropical pink fruit, bright citrus and just enough dank.
(ABV 7.1%) 0.5L $7.5
FLOWER IN THE KETTLE - HAZY IPA
Bucketloads of juicy Mosaic hops balance Amarillo and grapefruit forward Simcoe.
(ABV 7.0%) 0.4L $7
ASK YOUR SERVER ABOUT OUR CANS TO GO!
CIDERS & SELTZER
ALCHEMY - DESOLATION DRY CIDER
Cider made  for those looking for elixirs with  zero added sugar. A hint of lemon juice  gives this cider a bit of brightness,  making it eternally crushable.
(ABV 5.6%) 0.4L $9.5
YONDER - FRESH HOP CIDER
Starting with a base of juicy culinary apples and flavorful cider fruit, this semi-dry cider is then steeped with fresh Loral hops and Sabro hop pellets from Loftus Ranches. On the nose, bright, floral aromatics lend way to earthy pepper notes. The first sip bursts with notes of honeysuckle, melon and juicy orange with a nice acidic bite.
(ABV 6.5%)  0.4 $9.50
FLORIDA SELTZER - PINEAPPLE & MANGO
Rotating Flavors - Ask your server!
(ABV 5%) 0.4L $9.5
N/A BEER & CIDER
HECK GENTLE PERSUASION - N/A LAGER
Heck’s Gentle Persuasion offers a timeless taste inspired by classic European lagers; crisp, bright, and refreshing
Portland, Oregon 12oz Can $5.50
HECK SILVER LININGS -  N/A IPA
Heck’s signature non-alcoholic west coast-style IPA: bitter, balanced and full-bodied, with notes of spruce, mandarin, and pineapple
Portland, Oregon 12oz Can $5.50
2 TOWNS SIDEKICK - PACIFIC PINEAPPLE N/A CIDER
PORTLAND, OR - 12oz Can $5.50
COCKTAILS
ROTATING BOOZY SLUSHY
- Ask your server for today’s tipple! $12

About us
Chez Jose
THE LEGACY
After 35+ unforgettable years, Chez José off Terwilliger Boulevard in Portland decided to close its doors on Oct. 8, 2022. Like many businesses, the COVID-19 pandemic changed how they were able to run things, directly impacting business.
Read more
about us
Skip Photo Gallery
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Betty J:
Wow, when we got to the table, the water 💦 was already there! So awesome! The lady was very cheerful. One of the salsas 🌶is warm and unique and really bomb!!! The peanut 🥜chicken🍗 dish - salsa de pollo de cachuate or something. Very different and huge portion!!! Leftovers all around!!! 🙌
Review by - Google
five star review by
Rett P:
Hands down, my favorite Mexican restaurant! The chips are perfection, the warm salsa is absolutely divine! I love the Lime Chicken enchilada, it's balanced, perfectly spiced and uber flavorful! If you haven't been, you must go and if it's been a while, go now!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Laura C:
Amazing food and big portions. I ordered a combo platter and my brother ordered the chimichanga dish. The chips and salsa aren't free but are cheap with free refills. We also ordered a spicy margarita that was delicious

OUR COCKTAILS
As of April, 2024
DELINCUENTE
Charanda, Bitter Aperitivo, Paranubes, Fernet, Banana, Pineapple Amaro
LA COSECHA
Tequila Reposado, Mezcal Espadín, Mezcal Barril, Nixta, Xtabentún, Demerera, Grapefruit Bitters
The Harvest.
​
An homage to the vast abundance of Mexico.
RAICILLA FALSA
Vago elote mezcal, Cocchi Rosa, Bergamot Liquor, orange bitters
BOLERITO
Mezcal, Brandy, Amaro Montenegro, Choco-Mole Bitters, Demerara, Cherry
A cocktail inspired by our Bar Manager's grandfather, who on Thursday evenings would pour himself a small glass of Mezcal, play Boléro, and watch with a quiet smile as his family moved about the house.
AGUIJON
Gracias a Dios gin, pisco, Suze, grapefruit, lime, agave
EL DELIRIO DEL SANTO
Cherry charanda, Del Santo, agricole rum, amargo vallet, orange, lime, orgeat, soda
NEGRONI SONORENSE
Early grey-infused bacanora, Bitter Bianco, Cocchi Americano, orange zest

Cherry charanda, Del Santo, agricole rum, amargo vallet, orange, lime, orgeat, soda

Birria fat-washed tequila, Nixta liquor, cilantro, japaleño, pineapple, lime, agave

celebrate with us
Our families are delighted to celebrate and share our rich heritage with you. We are proud to live and work here in Oregon. And we would like to introduce to you both new and old Mexican cuisine and traditions. Of course, we offer old favorites as well. It is our sincerest hope to give you a warm belly and a happy heart. Thank you for joining us.
– carlos ramos & carlos de luna

name: Matador East Portland
raw_text:
Matador | SE Portland | Restaurants, Happy Hour, Late Night Food
SE Portland
The Matador on East Burnside, on the border between SE and NE Portland, offers guests a chic, adventurous, yet easygoing restaurant experience, paired with a swanky bar scene. Our tight-knit staff welcomes a community of regulars, creating a homey feel that’s as fun and inspiring as the food and drinks we serve. With a local seasonal menu, late-night food options, happy hour specials, and local brews we love on tap, this is definitely a SE Portland neighborhood destination.
Order Online
Purchase Gift Card
Location
& Hours
Our restaurant is located on E Burnside Street between SE 24th Avenue and SE 26th Avenue in East Portland.
Get Directions
Sunday - Thursday:
11am - 12am
Friday - Saturday:
11am-2am
Happy Hour:
Daily 4-6pm and 10pm-Last Call
2424 E Burnside St
Portland, OR 97214
(503) 719-5757
21+ Guests only
Outdoor Seating
Happy Hour
Cocktails To Go
View Menus
Cocktails
Main Dine-In Menu
Happy Hour
Tequila
Wine
Private Events
Whether you’re planning a business meeting or celebration, our private party room in East Portland comfortably seats up to 35 guests, ages 21 and over. Easily accessible for those with physical limitations, this modern and quiet space is an extension of our restaurant’s intimate, yet casual atmosphere with large windows that can be opened up like garage doors to the side patio. Our staff is happy to help you plan every detail from a sit-down or buffet-style occasion.
Book an Event
Join Our Team
We are always looking for passionate people who want to help us create an extraordinary experience for our guests. If that sounds like you, you’ll love it here, and we want to meet you.
Follow the link below to tell us something about yourself below, or just call or stop by one of our restaurants to set up an interview.
Apply Now
More locations

Drop us a line!
Get directions
Our Burritos, simply delicious!
Burritos - Now Bigger and Better!
Carne Asada Burrito:
With: 14" Flour Tortilla, carne asada steak, whole beans, rice, pico de gallo, and avocado sauce.
Pastor Burrito:
With: 14" tortilla, spicy pork with pineapple, rice, chorizo refried beans and cheese
Carnitas Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, carnitas, pico de gallo, avocado sauce, rice and chorizo refried beans.
Chicken Tinga Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla shredded chipotle chicken, chipotle lime mayo, sour cream, whole beans and rice.
Bean and Cheese Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, your choice of whole beans or chorizo refried beans, and cheese.
Chorizo Con Papa Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, tator tots, chorizo, cheese, chipotle lime mayo and chorizo refried beans.
Chile Relleno Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, 2 chile relleno, sour cream, rice, whole beans and cheese.
Veggie Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, whole beans, lettuce, rice, avocado sauce and pico de gallo.
Soyrizo Burrito :
With: 14" Tortilla, whole beans, rice, homemade soyrizo, cabbage, and pico de gallo.
Birria Burrito:
With: `14" Tortilla, slowly cooked shredded beef, onions, cilantro, chorizo refried beans, and rice.
Fish Burrito:
With: 14" Tortilla, battered fried fish, diced cabbage, chipotle lime mayo, pico de gallo, rice, whole beans and cheese.
PINCHE BURRO!
With: 14" Tortilla packed with chorizo refried beans, your choice of protein, rice, lettuce, sour cream, cheese, avocado sauce and pico de gallo.
Burritos - Tacos - Cerveza

The Meddling Lime
Our inspired fare
The Meddling Lime, established in 2018, serves a harmonious blend of Mexican-style cuisine with Pacific Northwest ingredients.  Owner and chef Josh Schimmel-Bristow respectfully "meddles" between the two food cultures, creating an approachable and inventive dining experience.

Hello
Welcome to The Meddling Lime Food Cart
Satisfy your cravings with our fresh and delicious food. Our menu includes a variety of options that will leave you wanting more. Come visit us and taste the difference!
Find out more
The Meddling Lime Bio
Our Story
Since 2018, The Meddling Lime has been serving Mexican inspired cuisine while nodding to the ingredients, flavors and culinary traditions of the Pacific Northwest. Respectfully “meddling” and finding harmony between the two food cultures, striking a balance between inventiveness and approachability—owner and chef Josh Schimmel-Bristow has been establishing his own authentic tradition.
First opening in Sellwood-Moreland, The Meddling Lime quickly became a culinary standout and staple of the neighborhood. Josh organized the cart around a few simple ideas, which remain at its heart: cook with high-quality ingredients, deliver consistency and value with every dish, and always match it with friendly service.
Josh has cooked professionally for more than a fifteen years, including stints at various restaurants between Seattle and Portland.  Before opening up his own shop, he was the executive chef at the venerable Tasty N Alder,
Menu
The menu is built to have plenty of choices for everyone, with a variety of protein, seafood, and vegetable options.  Have an allergy or dietary restriction?  Let us know and we will do our best to accommodate.
Location
We are located at 6200 SE Milwaukie Ave Portlan, OR 97202.  Next to Moreland Dental.
We are a fixed location and do not do mobile catering.
Reviews
Our customers appreciate us!  Check out some of our glowing reviews on Yelp, Google, and Facebook.  We appreciate the time and consideration people put into them.
We take pride in forming a dialogue with our customers and if something is not right with your order feel free to reach out and we would love to make it right.
Contact Us
Have a question?  Get in touch with us! You can call us, email us, or send us a message on social media. We're always happy to hear from our customers.
Like what we do?
If you are interested in job opportunities, please feel free to reach out.  Our goal is to continue growing and finding people with a passion for the industry is key.
The Meddling Lime's Growth and Opportunity
Have an empty restaurant space?
We are looking to grow into a brick and mortar location.  Our goal is to find a location around our current neighborhood to expand.  As much as we love our food carts, the limitations are setting in and we'd like to offer more.
The opportunity to partner with an established brewery or taphouse would also be ideal.  If you have kitchen space and want to change up your cuisine, not run your food program, or just have available space, please reach out.
Seeking a Business Partner
It is no secret how hard it is to run a successful food business, and I am hitting my limit as to what I can do with my current set up.  I am looking to find someone(s) who can offer business guidance, financial resources, and a passion for the food service industry to help me achieve my vision.  If you fit the description and can offer insight into this, please get in touch.
Contact Us

BAR CASA VALE
Open 7 days a week
5-10pm Tuesday - Saturday
5-9pm Sundays & Mondays
215 SE 9th Avenue, Portland, OR  97214
MAKE A RESERVATION
Bar Casa Vale is a cozy, wood-fired, Spanish inspired restaurant. We built it to celebrate the bounty of the Pacific Northwest through the lens of tapas bars in Barcelona, sherry bodegas in Jerez, and pintxo crawls through San Sebastian. You will find only the freshest seafood from the Pacific Ocean, meats from our favorite northwest ranches, and vegetables grown on the farms located in the greater Portland area.
Our motto is simple: cooking perfect ingredients over hard wood creates the best tasting food.
Indoor + outdoor seating available.

About the Business
Business owner information
Andy K.
Business Owner
We specialize in affordable, drop-off catering! We do corporate events, office parties, and private events.

For over 20 years, Pepino's has been serving Portland's favorite authentic Mexican cuisine. We're family owned and always put our principles first; we even source a few of our fresh, quality ingredients from local vendors -- including some of our meat and dairy. We're also proud to be an environmentally sustainable business, composting and recycling 90% of our trash. Our made-from-scratch Mexican cuisine is calling your name. We can't wait to share with you!

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

Incredible Mexican Cuisine Near you!
Join us for dine in, and experience delicious Mexican Cuisine Near you!
You will hopefully see how we are working hard to be the Top rated Mexican Restaurant near Beaverton, Hillsboro, and Portland.  Our menus below have Lunch Specials served until 3pm. Our all-day dinner menu.
For catering, contact the manager at 503-629-1764.
Happy Hour 2pm-6pm Daily
All Day on Sunday!
Looking for the best Happy Hour in Beaverton, Hillsboro, or Portland? Join us at Allan's Authentic Mexican Restaurant from 2pm to 6pm daily, and all day on Sunday! Join us to explore our Happy Hour menu featuring amazing deals on your favorite Mexican dishes and drinks. Don’t miss out on the best Happy Hour in town—check out the menu now!
Lunch Menu Served until 3pm
Craving a delicious lunch in the Beaverton, Hillsboro, or Portland areas? Check us out & explore our mouthwatering lunch menu at Allan's Authentic Mexican Restaurant, featuring fresh, traditional Mexican dishes perfect for any midday meal. Don't miss out—discover your new favorite today!
All Day Full Menu
Ready for a flavorful dinner in Beaverton, Hillsboro, or Portland? Check us out and explore our dinner menu at Allan's Authentic Mexican Restaurant. Enjoy a variety of authentic Mexican dishes made with fresh ingredients, perfect for any evening meal. Discover your next favorite dish tonight!

Jam On Hawthorne
Portland's best breakfast, seven days a week!
Jam On Hawthorne
Jam on Hawthorne
About
Dine-In Menus
Specials
Hours & Directions
Social
Food Menu
EGGS & MORE
Egg dishes are served with toast & choice of hashbrowns, cheesy grits (not vegan), or green salad (mixed greens with carrots, tossed in rosemary maple vinaigrette)
Toast options: Sourdough (VEGAN), Wheat (VEGAN), Rye (VEGAN), English Muffin, Housemade Biscuit (+1.50), Gluten-Free** (+1)
Two Egg Breakfast
– Two eggs*, choice of toast, choice of side (hashbrowns, cheesy grits, OR salad), and your choice of bacon, chicken basil sausage (chicken sausage is in pork casing), veggie sausage patties, pork sausage links OR smoked tempeh strips (VEGAN). 15.50 (substitute seasoned tofu for eggs (VEGAN) on request)
Ed’s Scramble –
(VEGETARIAN) Spinach, mushrooms, roasted garlic & cheddar, scrambled with three eggs. Served with choice of side and toast. 17.50
Downtown Scramble –
(VEGETARIAN) Tomatoes, spinach, roasted garlic & zucchini, scrambled with three eggs, topped with feta cheese. Served with choice of side and toast. 17.50 Add avocado +2
Cheech & Chong Scramble –
(VEGETARIAN) Tortilla chips, house tempeh chorizo, red onion & ranchero sauce, scrambled with three eggs. Topped with cilantro & queso fresco. Served with choice of side and toast. 17.50 Add avocado +2
Bacon, Shroom & Cheddar Scramble
– Bacon, mushrooms, green onions, & cheddar scrambled with three eggs. Served with choice of side and toast. 18.50 Add avocado +2
Chicken Sausage Scramble
– Ground pork-apple sausage, kale, mushrooms, Meyer lemon-honey goat cheese. Served with choice of side and toast. 18.50
Denver Scramble –
Black Forest ham, bell peppers, red onions, & cheddar cheese scrambled with three eggs. Served with choice of side and toast. 18.50
Frank’s Scramble
– Ground pork-apple sausage, kale, mushrooms, Meyer lemon-honey goat cheese. Served with choice of side and toast. 18.50
Vegan Scramble
– (VEGAN) Seasoned tofu, kale, roasted cauliflower, mushrooms, tomatoes & zucchini, topped with vegan tarragon aioli. Served with choice of side and toast. 17.50
COMFORT FOOD
Bennie Hash
– Hashbrowns topped with bacon, ham, spinach, two poached eggs*, hollandaise* & green onions. Served with your choice of toast. 21
Smoked Steelhead Hash –
Hashbrowns topped with smoked steelhead, mushrooms & two poached eggs* topped with hollandaise & green onion. Served with toast. 25
Kimchi Hash
– Housemade kimchi grilled with hashbrowns, cheddar cheese, & roasted pork belly. Topped with two poached eggs*, spicy mayo, & green onion. Served with toast. (Kimchi contains shellfish. No substitutions) 22
Smoked Tempeh & Vegetable Hash
– (VEGAN) Hashbrowns topped with smoked tempeh, red onion, zucchini, bell pepper, & sautéed spinach, topped with vegan tarragon aioli. Served with your choice of toast. 18 Add an egg*, 2
Pulled Pork Huevos Rancheros
– House pulled pork, black beans and ranchero sauce layered in two corn tortillas with cheddar & pepperjack cheeses, topped with queso fresco, cilantro, & two scrambled eggs. Served with your choice of hashbrowns, cheesy grits, or salad. 20 Add avocado +2
Tempeh Huevos Rancheros
(VEGETARIAN or VEGAN)– House made smoked tempeh chorizo, black beans and ranchero sauce layered with two corn tortillas, cheddar & pepperjack cheeses – topped with queso fresco, cilantro and two scrambled eggs. For vegan, choose seasoned tofu and vegan cheddar substitutions. Served with your choice of hashbrowns, cheesy grits (not vegan), or salad. 19 Add avocado +2
Ty’s Big Breakfast
– (VEGETARIAN) Open-faced biscuit topped with two veggie sausage patties, smothered in vegetarian sausage gravy, topped with two eggs* any style and green onions. Served with choice of hashbrowns, cheesy grits, or salad. 18.50
Biscuits & Gravy
– (VEGETARIAN) Housemade biscuit split open and topped with our house vegetarian sausage gravy, topped with green onions. Single biscuit, 7.50. Two biscuits, 12.50 Add an egg*, 2
Loaded Bowl
– (VEGETARIAN) Hashbrowns loaded with cheddar and vegetarian sausage gravy, topped with one egg and green onions. 16.
WRAPS
Our wraps are served à la carte, the hashbrowns are inside! Add avocado +2
The Other One Wrap
– (VEGETARIAN on request) Three eggs* scrambled with hashbrowns, cheddar cheese and your choice of bacon OR veggie sausage. Served with salsa & sour cream. 15 Add avocado +2
Tommy’s Joint Wrap
– (VEGETARIAN on request) Three eggs* scrambled with hashbrowns, pulled pork OR house tempeh chorizo, pepperjack cheese, black beans, & cilantro. Served with salsa & sour cream. 15 Add avocado +2
Vegan Wrap
– (VEGAN) Smoked tempeh “bacon”, red onion, bell pepper, zucchini, & spinach on our hashbrowns, topped with vegan tarragon aioli. Served with toast. 15 Add avocado +2
BENEDICTS
All Benedicts are served on an English Muffin with two poached eggs*, our fresh housemade hollandaise* (contains raw egg yolks) & choice of hashbrowns, cheesy grits, or salad (mixed greens with carrots tossed in rosemary maple vinaigrette.)
Ham Bennie
–
Classic ham benedict. Served with choice of side. 18
Pork Belly Bennie
– Roasted pork belly topped with warm spicy/sweet tomato jam and green onions.
Served with choice of side.
19
Fall Bennie
– Roasted butternut squash, preserved lemon hollandaise*, Meyer lemon-honey goat cheese, crispy shallots. 19
SWEET STUFF
100% pure organic maple syrup from our friends at Baird Farm in Vermont is available with our sweets. It’s fancy.
Maggie Cakes
– Three lemon-ricotta pancakes topped with housemade blueberry compote & lemon curd. 16 One cake, 7.50
Marshall Cakes
– Three classic buttermilk pancakes with honey butter. 14. One pancake, 6. Add blueberries or chocolate chips +2.
Vegan Chai Pancakes
– (VEGAN) Hearty vegan pancakes made with Bob’s red mill oats and spelt flour, blueberries, kinglet chai, apple cider and spices. 15.50. One cake, 7.50.
Pumpkin French Toast
– Three slices of thick sliced challah dipped in Grand Marnier infused batter then grilled. Topped with pumpkin Bavarian cream, whipped cream and cinnamon sugar. Full order 16, One slice 6.50.
Pumpkin Gluten-Free Pancakes**
– (GLUTEN-FREE) Three buttermilk pancakes made with Bob’s Red Mill gluten-free flour, Topped with pumpkin Bavarian cream, whipped cream and cinnamon sugar. Three cakes, 16. One cake, 7.50.
SIDES & SUCH
Toast
2/slice – Sourdough, Wheat, Rye OR English Muffin
Udi’s Gluten-Free Toast
– 3/slice
Housemade Biscuit
– 3.50
Maggie Cake
– (topped with lemon curd and blueberry compote) – 7.50
Marshall Cake
– 6
Pumpkin French Toast –
6.50
Pumpkin Gluten-Free Pancake
** – (contains both egg and dairy) 7.50
Eggs
* any style – One, 2, Two 4
Hashbrowns
(VEGAN and GLUTEN-FREE) – 5.50
Cheesy Grits
(VEGETARIAN and GLUTEN-FREE) – 5.50
Green Salad
(VEGAN and GLUTEN-FREE) – Mixed greens with radish tossed in lemon poppy vinaigrette. 5.50
Chicken Basil Sausage
– 5.50 (chicken sausage is in pork casing)
Pork Sausage Links
– 5.50
Bacon
– 5.50
Veggie Sausage
(VEGETARIAN) – 5.50 (2 patties)
Veggie Sausage Gravy
(VEGETARIAN) – 5.50
Smoked Tofu Strips
(VEGAN) – 5.50
1/4 Avocado
– 2
KID’S MENU
Little food for littler appetites!
KID’S ONE EGG BREAKFAST
– One scrambled egg* OR tofu, hashbrowns, toast & one slice of bacon OR veggie sausage patty. 8.50
KID’S MARSHALL CAKES –
Three little buttermilk pancakes with whipped butter and maple syrup on the side. 6.50 Add blueberries or chocolate chips +2.
KID’S MAGGIE CAKES
– Three little lemon-ricotta pancakes with housemade blueberry compote on the side. 7.50
KID’S CHAI CAKES
(VEGAN) Two little vegan pancakes. 8.50
KID’S GLUTEN FREE PANCAKES**
– (GLUTEN FREE) Three little pancakes made with Bob’s gluten free flour. 7.50
*We are required by law and general decency to warn you that consuming undercooked eggs poses a higher risk of foodborne illness
**We do NOT have a gluten-free kitchen. Please inform staff of any food allergies.
Please keep modifications to a minimum. All substitutions and additions charged at market price.
No half orders or split plates, extra plates on request.
Limit of three transactions per table.
All gratuities at Jam are split between all non-management staff members. Every role in the restaurant plays a part in service and is integral to a good experience. Please do not hesitate to ask any of us for assistance - we're glad you're here!

About the Business
Swagat Indian Cuisine is the proud purveyor of North and Southern Indian delicacies.  

We specialize in a variety of handcrafted dosas (dosas are a savory Indian crepe that is made from lentils and is gluten free).  We also have many curries ranging in spice level from mild to extremely spicy.  If curries aren't your thing, never fear - we also have a wide assortment of tandoori dishes, biriyani, pakoras, and many other options.  

If you are vegan, vegetarian, or gluten free there is no need to feel left out! Swagat has you covered with many flavorful choices to excite your palette and match your lifestyle.

About the Business
Business owner information
Ishu K.
Business Owner
Our goal is to give eveyone great food with the mindset it can improve. We know how hard the living is starting to become in Oregon so if you are struggling, please let us know, we will always accommodate you and help you get food for a price you can afford. Let us serve you  food that will keep you healthy and taste like back home. 
Our food is all Vegetarian. Most of our curry dishes are Vegan, and others can be made vegan. The lunch special is most famous along with Aloo Prontha. Please note, the lunch Special is served mild, ask for a free hot sauce if you like. We make the hot sauce so it blends with the curry well.

All our curries can also be made to taste Mild, Medium, or spicy hot. 
 
Rather then us say how good the food is to talk the talk, we would rather you come try it for yourself and let the food speak for it's self.

Thank You

About the Business
Welcome to Vanakkam PDX where we bring the vibrant flavors and rich culinary heritage of India to Portland, Oregon. At Vanakkam Pdx, we are passionate about creating an authentic Indian Cuisine experience that tantalizes the taste buds and transports you to the bustling streets of Chennai, the royal courts of Lucknow, or the serene backwaters of Kerala, right here in Portland, Oregon
