SP01.  	Lentil Soup (16 oz)
Lentil Stew cooked with lentil, vegetables, tamarind
SP02. 	Rasam
Crafted from a flavorful base of tamarind juice, tomatoes, and aromatic spices
SP03. Tomato soup.
Crafted from ripe, sun-kissed tomatoes, simmered to perfection with aromatic spices and herbs
SP04.	Vegetable Soup (Sweet Corn etc)
Made from a medley of farm-fresh vegetables, including carrots, celery, potatoes, tomatoes, and peas, slow-cooked with aromatic herbs and spices
SP05. Hot and Sour Chicken Soup
Cooked with chicken broth, tomato, pepper, soy sauce & chicken meat
SP06. Nalli  (Goat Soup)
Prepared using goat trotters, Onion, garlic & ginger paste, combination of Indian spices, red chilli powder
AP01.  Bajji - Cut Mirch
The whole green Jalapenos, dipped in a zesty chickpea batter with Chettinad masala, and fried to golden perfection
AP02. Medhu Vada(3 pcs)
Vada (donut shaped south Indian snack) is made from a batter of urad dal, seasoned with finely chopped curry leaves, ginger, and black pepper.
AP03. Masala Vada(3)
Made from a blend of finely ground lentils, aromatic spices, and fragrant herbs. Fried in oil with crisp outside and crunchy inside
AP04. Dahi Vada(3)
Made from lentils, seasoned with aromatic masala, then fried to golden perfection. Once cooked, they are soaked in a bath of creamy, lightly-spiced yogurt.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP05. Rasam Vada(3)
Rasam Vada, a South Indian delicacy that combines the crispy goodness of vada (deep-fried lentil fritters) with the tangy, spicy kick of rasam, a traditional South Indian soup.
AP06.  Sambar Vada(3) - dip
Medhu Vada made from Urad dal is immersed in a piping hot bowl of sambar
AP07.  Gobi 65
Deep fried cauliflower pieces with red chilli, yogurt and Indian spices coating
AP08. Gobi Manchurian
Deep fried cauliflower Pieces tossed in savory and tangy sauce
Allergen warning: Contains Soy
AP09. Masala Papad
Papads sandwiched with a mixture of onion, cilantro, tomato, cabbage and chilli powder, Indian spices
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP10. Paneer Manchurian
Cubes of paneer are lightly coated in a flavorful batter and fried to golden perfection, then they are tossed in our signature Manchurian sauce
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP12. Spring Rolls
Crispy fried rolls with vegetable filling.
AP13. Pepper Corn Masala
Tender corn kernels cooked to perfection in a fragrant blend of spices, including cumin, coriander, and turmeric.
AP14. Veg Samosa (2)
Handmade with care, using a delicate pastry filled with a savory mixture of potatoes, peas, and aromatic spices. Each samosa is lovingly folded into a triangular shape and deep-fried to golden perfection
AP15. Vegetable Pakora
Fresh vegetables, including potatoes, onions, carrots, and cauliflower, are thinly sliced and coated in a savory chickpea flour batter infused with aromatic spices and deep-fried to golden perfection
AP16. Onion Pakora
Fresh onions are thinly sliced and coated in a savory chickpea flour batter infused with aromatic spices and deep-fried to golden perfection
Ap17. Egg Burji
Fresh eggs, whisked to perfection, are sautéed with a medley of aromatic spices, onions, tomatoes, and green chilies.
AP18. Egg Cheese Omelette
Made with farm-fresh eggs and spices whisked to perfection and gently cooked on a hot griddle, our Egg Omelette is light, fluffy, and bursting with flavor
AP19. Egg Masala Omlette
Whisked together farm-fresh eggs with a tantalizing blend of aromatic Chettinad masala, infusing the omelette with layers of depth and complexity.
AP20. Malai Tikka
Prepared with precision, our chefs grill the marinated chicken to perfection, infusing it with a tantalizing smokiness that enhances its creamy marinade.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP21. Chicken Tikka Dry (5 pcs)
Marinated Boneless chicken Pieces with yogurt and Indian spices grilled in tandoor oven.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP22. Hariyali Chicken
Boneless chicken Pieces with mint & cilantro paste, yogurt and Indian spices grilled in tandoor oven.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP23. Chicken Andhra 65
Tender pieces of chicken, marinated in a bold blend of traditional Andhra spices and aromatic herbs, are deep-fried to crispy perfection
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP24. Chicken Chennai 65
Tender pieces of succulent chicken, marinated in a secret blend of spices and herbs, are deep-fried to golden perfection, resulting in a dish that is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside
AP25. Chettinad Fish Fry
Fresh fillets of fish, sourced locally and marinated in a tantalizing Chettinad masala, are fried to golden perfection, resulting in a dish that is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside
AP26.  Salmon Fish Fry
Fresh fillets of Salmon, sourced locally and marinated in a tantalizing masala, are fried to golden perfection, resulting in a dish that is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside
AP27. Chettinad Mutton Fry(Sukha)
Tender pieces of mutton, marinated in a secret Chettinad masala, are pan-fried to perfection, resulting in crispy exteriors and succulent interiors.
AP28. Tandoori Chicken Half
Juicy chicken marinated in a harmonious blend of yogurt, aromatic spices, is slow-cooked to perfection in our traditional clay tandoor oven.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
AP29. Tandoori Chicken Full .
Juicy chicken marinated in a harmonious blend of yogurt, aromatic spices, is slow-cooked to perfection in our traditional clay tandoor oven
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
CH01. Chettinad Chicken Biryani
This iconic South Indian delicacy boasts a symphony of flavors and spices, meticulously layered to perfection. Tender pieces of marinated chicken, slow-cooked to perfection, are nestled between fragrant layers of long-grain Basmati rice infused with the rich aromas of our unique Chettinad masala.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH02. Chettinad Egg Biryani
This iconic South Indian delicacy boasts a symphony of flavors and spices, meticulously layered to perfection. Hard boiled eggs are nestled between fragrant layers of long-grain Basmati rice infused with the rich aromas of our unique Chettinad masala.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH03. Chettinad Goat Biryani
This iconic South Indian delicacy boasts a symphony of flavors and spices, meticulously layered to perfection. Tender pieces of marinated Goat meat, slow-cooked to succulent perfection, are nestled between fragrant layers of long-grain Basmati rice infused with the rich aromas of our unique Chettinad masala.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH04. Chettinad Lamb Biryani
This iconic South Indian delicacy boasts a symphony of flavors and spices, meticulously layered to perfection. Tender pieces of marinated Lamp meat, slow-cooked to succulent perfection, are nestled between fragrant layers of long-grain Basmati rice infused with the rich aromas of our unique Chettinad masala.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH05. Chettinad Veg Biryani
This iconic South Indian delicacy boasts a symphony of flavors and spices, meticulously layered to perfection. Marinated and cooked vegetables are nestled between fragrant layers of long-grain Basmati rice infused with the rich aromas of our unique Chettinad masala
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
CH06. Hyderabad Chicken Dum Biryani
Tender, marinated chicken is layered with fragrant, long-grain basmati rice, and an exquisite blend of hand-selected spices, all slow-cooked to perfection in the traditional dum style.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH07. Hyderabad Veg Dum Biryani
Basmati rice, cooked to fluffy perfection, forms the foundation of our biryani. Layered with a medley of seasonal vegetables—such as carrots, peas, potatoes, and bell peppers—that have been gently sautéed with fragrant special masala, our biryani is a symphony of flavors.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
CH08. Hyderabad Egg Dum Biryani
Flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked in hyderbad dum style served with egg
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH09. Hyderabad Goat Biryani
Flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked with goat in Hyderbad dum style.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH10. Gongura Chicken Biryani
Flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked with Chicken Pieces, sorrel leaves in Hyderabadi dum style.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH11. Gongura Goat Biryani
Flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked with goat, sorrel leaves in Hyderabad dum style.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH11. Chicken 65 Biryani
Dum Biryani infused with classic Chicken 65
CC01. Chettinad Chicken Curry Bone-in/boneless
Chicken pieces marinated in a secret blend of traditional Chettinad spices, are simmered to perfection in a luscious gravy bursting with flavor.
Allergen warning: May contain  nuts
CC02. Chettinad Goat Curry
Nicely cut pieces of goat meat, slow-cooked to perfection, are infused with a medley of traditional Chettinad masala.
Allergen warning: May contain nuts
CC03. Chettinad Lamb Curry
Nicely cut pieces of goat meat, slow-cooked to perfection, are infused with a medley of traditional Chettinad masala
Allergen warning: May contain contains nuts
CC04. Chettinad Egg Curry
The gravy, enriched with creamy coconut milk and tangy tomatoes, envelops each egg in a velvety embrace, imparting a richness and complexity that is simply irresistible.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CC05. Chettinad Fish Curry
Fresh and succulent pieces of fish are bathed in a sumptuous gravy bursting with flavor. Our curry boasts a harmonious blend of traditional Chettinad spices
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CH06. Chettinad Shrimp Fry
Each plump shrimp is marinated in a harmonious blend of aromatic masala, infusing it with a burst of flavor. Pan-fried to perfection,
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
CC07. Chettinad Chicken Fry
Tender pieces of chicken are marinated in a signature blend of Chettinad spices, then stir fried in low heat to retain the true flavor of masala.
Allergen warning: Contains nuts
CC08. Chettinad Veg Curry
Fresh vegetables are slow cooked to perfection, are infused with a medley of traditional Chettinad Masala
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
DA01. Plain Dosa
Thin, crispy pancake made from fermented rice and urad dal batter.
DA02. Set Dosa
Made from a blend of rice and lentil batter, our Set Dosa is expertly fermented to achieve the perfect balance of tanginess and fluffiness. Our set dosa is accompanied by a medley of flavorful accompaniments, including coconut chutney, tangy sambar and tomato chutney
DA03. Paper Roast Dosa .
Crafted from a delicate blend of fermented rice and lentil batter, our Paper Roast Dosa is skillfully spread thin on a hot griddle, resulting in a beautifully lacy and golden-brown dosa that's as thin as paper.
DA04. Ghee Dosa .
Thin, crispy pancake topped with ghee.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
DA04. Paneer Dosa
Thin, crispy pancake topped with ghee.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy
DA05. Masala Dosa
Crafted from a batter of fermented rice and lentils, our dosa is expertly spread thin on a hot griddle to achieve its signature crispness. Sprinkled with potato masala and fresh cilantro before being folded, our masala Dosa is cooked until golden brown and served hot off the griddle.
DA06. Onion Dosa
Crafted from a batter of fermented rice and lentils, our dosa is expertly spread thin on a hot griddle to achieve its signature crispness. Generously sprinkled with finely chopped onions and fresh cilantro before being folded, our Onion Dosa is cooked until golden brown and served hot off the griddle.
DA07. Plain Uthappam
Handcrafted from a blend of rice and urad dal (black gram), our Uthappam batter is carefully fermented to achieve the perfect balance of tanginess and texture. Cooked on a hot griddle, our Uthappam forms a thick, pancake-like base with a slightly crispy exterior and a soft, pillowy interior.
DA08. Veg Uthappam
Made from a batter of fermented rice and lentils, our Uthappam is cooked to perfection on a hot griddle, resulting in a thick and fluffy pancake with a crisp golden exterior. Topped with a vibrant array of diced tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, and fresh cilantro
DA09. Rava Dosa
Crafted from a unique blend of rava, rice flour, our dosa batter is expertly poured onto a hot griddle, creating a lacy, golden-brown masterpiece that's as visually stunning as it is delicious. Served with Sambar and chutneys
DA10. Rava Masala Dosa
Our Rava Masala Dosa features a delicate, thin crepe made from a batter of rava, expertly cooked on a hot griddle. Inside, it's generously filled with a flavorful potato masala, with onions and aromatic spices. Served hot and crispy, accompanied by a trio of delectable chutneys - coconut, tomato, and coriander - along with tangy sambar
DA11. Onion Rava Dosa
Prepared using a batter of Rava (Sooji), rice flour, and a medley of spices, this dosa boasts a blend of crispy and crunchy texture. Our chefs expertly infuse the dosa with finely chopped onions.
DA12. Appam with Coconut Milk
Fluffy pancake from Kerala cuisine, with rice, coconut and served with coconut Milk.
DA13. Appam with Veg Kurma
Fluffy pancake from Kerala cuisine, with rice, coconut, served side of vegetable curry.
Allergen warning: Contains nuts
DA14. Chicken Tikka Dosa
Our dosa is made from a delicate batter of fermented rice and lentils, cooked to crispy perfection on a hot griddle. Inside, tender pieces of marinated chicken tikka, infused with aromatic spices and grilled to perfection in a tandoor oven.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
DA15.	Egg Dosa
Crafted with care and expertise, each dosa is a thin, crispy crepe infused with the richness of wholesome eggs and a medley of aromatic spices
DA16.	Appam with Chicken Kurma
Fluffy pancake from Kerala cuisine, with rice, coconut, served with a choice non-veg(chicken/goat/lamp) curry.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts
SI01. Sambar Idly
A delightful fusion of soft, fluffy idlis (steamed rice cakes) immersed in a savory and aromatic sambar, a traditional lentil-based vegetable stew
SI02. Rasam Idly
Soft, Steam cooked fluffy dumplings served with a side of rasam.
SI03. Podi Idly
Soft, Steam cooked fluffy dumplings with red chili, roasted split gram powder Sauce as topping.
SI04. Mini Podi Idly
Small, steam cooked fluffy dumplings with red chili, roasted split gram powder Sauce as topping.
SI05. Upma
Made from Sooji (Rava) gently roasted to golden perfection, each grain of Upma is infused with the fragrant flavors of curry leaves, mustard seeds, and aromatic spices
Allergen warning: Contains nuts
SI06. Plain Rice
Made from premium quality basmati rice, each grain of our Cooked Rice is carefully steamed to perfection, resulting in a fluffy texture and a delicate aroma that's sure to whet your appetite
SI07. Poori Masala(2 pcs)
Our Poori Masala features fluffy, deep-fried pooris - golden-brown, puffed bread - served alongside a hearty serving of masala, a flavorful potato curry infused with a medley of aromatic spices
SI08. Ghee Jeera Rice
Flavorful cooked Basmati rice mixed with ghee and cumin seeds and Indian spices.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
SI09. Ghee Pongal
Made with rice, yellow lentil, ghee, and spices.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
SI10. Sambar Rice
A wholesome and aromatic dish that combines the richness of rice with the robust flavors of sambar, a tangy lentil-based vegetable stew and served with papad.
S11. Chicken Manchurian
A beloved Indo-Chinese delicacy that combines chicken with a tangy and flavorful sauce. Tender pieces of chicken are marinated in a delicate blend of spices and herbs before being deep-fried to crispy perfection. They are then tossed in a luscious Manchurian sauce made from a fusion of soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and red chili paste.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, egg, nuts, Soy
S12. Fish Apollo
Fresh fish fillets are marinated in a fiery blend of aromatic spices, including cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili powder, infusing them with layers of depth and complexity. The fish is then grilled to perfection, ensuring a tender and flaky texture that melts in your mouth..
S13. Tawa Fish
Fresh fish fillets, marinated in a symphony of aromatic spices and zesty lemon juice, are expertly seared on a traditional tawa (griddle) to perfection
NI01. Aloo Gobi Masala
Classic north Indian dish cooked with potato, cauliflower and tomato-based gravy.
NI02. Aloo Saag
Classic north Indian dish cooked with Potato chunks and Spinach based gravy.
NI03. Bhindi Masala
Classic north Indian dish cooked with cut okra and tomato, onion-based gravy.
NI04. Chana Masala
Tender chickpeas are simmered to perfection in a tantalizing blend of tomatoes, onions, and aromatic spices.
NI05. Channa Saag
Flavorful curry made with chickpeas, spinach gravy and aromatic spices.
NI06. Chole Batura(2 pcs)
A classic combination of spicy chickpea curry and fluffy deep-fried bread. Our Chole is a rich and flavorful curry made from tender chickpeas simmered with aromatic spices along with tangy tomatoes and fragrant ginger-garlic paste.
NI07. Spinach Dal
Prepared using a hearty blend of yellow lentils (dal) and fresh spinach leaves, our Spinach Dal is simmered to perfection with aromatic spices, including cumin, garlic, and turmeric.
NI08. Dal Tadka
Made from tender lentils simmered to perfection, our dal is infused with a symphony of special masala. The dal is then tempered with a fragrant tadka of sizzling ghee, garlic, etc infusing it with a delightful smokiness and depth of flavor.
NI09. Kadai Paneer
Indian cottage cheese chunks cooked in rich onion, tomato gravy.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
NI10. Mutter Paneer
Rich creamy curry cooked with paneer and green peas.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
NI11. Malai Kofta
Koftas from a velvety mixture of paneer, spices, and a blend of nuts and raisins, creating soft, melt-in-your-mouth dumplings. These koftas are then fried to a golden-brown perfection, then, simmered in a luscious tomato-based gravy enriched with cashew nuts and cream.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy, nuts
NI12. Navratan Kurma
Rich creamy gravy made with onion and cashew nut, tossed with 9 types of vegetables.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
NI13. Palak Paneer
Delicious Indian cottage cheese chunks cooked with spinach gravy and aromatic spices.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
NI14. Paneer Butter Masala
Crafted from a decadent sauce infused with a medley of aromatic special masala. Tomatoes are slow-cooked, while cream and butter are added to impart a luxurious silkiness to the dish. Tender cubes of paneer cheese are then gently folded into the sauce.
Allergen warning: Contains dairy,  nuts
NI15. Paneer Tikka Masala
Paneer is simmered in a velvety tomato-based gravy, infused with a symphony of flavors including ginger, garlic, and a special blend of masalas.

SOFT DRINKS
DESSERTS
OUR STORY
WHERE IT ALL BEGAN
Welcome to Chettinad Indian Cuisine, an upscale Indian cuisine where we bring the rich and diverse flavors of Southern & Northern India to your table. Our restaurant is dedicated to providing an authentic culinary experience inspired by the traditional dishes and cooking techniques of the Chettinad region in Tamil Nadu.
Our Heritage
Chettinad cuisine is renowned for its bold use of spices and aromatic ingredients. Originating from the Chettinad region, this cuisine is a cornerstone of Tamil Nadu's gastronomic culture. Known for its complexity and depth of flavor, Chettinad cuisine is a symphony of taste that features an array of spices such as star anise, kalpasi (black stone flower), cinnamon, cloves, and bay leaf.
Our Commitment
At Chettinad Indian Cuisine, we are committed to preserving the authenticity of our heritage while providing a modern dining experience. Our chefs, hailing from the heart of Chettinad, bring their extensive knowledge and passion for traditional cooking to every dish we serve. We use the freshest ingredients and carefully blend spices to create meals that are not only delicious but also reminiscent of home-cooked Chettinad food.
Our Menu
Our menu offers a wide variety of dishes that cater to every palate. From the fiery Chicken Chettinad to the subtly spiced Vegetarian Kurma, each dish is prepared with meticulous attention to detail. We also offer an array of freshly made breads, rice dishes, and traditional desserts that complete the Chettinad dining experience.
Our Ambiance
Step into our restaurant and be transported to the vibrant streets of Tamil Nadu . Our decor reflects the rich cultural heritage of the Chettinad region, with traditional artwork and warm, inviting colors. Whether you're dining with family, friends, or colleagues, our welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff ensure a memorable experience for all.
Our Vision
At Chettinad Indian Cuisine, our vision is to be the premier destination for authentic Chettinad food outside of India. We aim to create a space where the love for traditional Indian cuisine is celebrated and shared with our community. Join us and embark on a culinary journey that promises to tantalize your taste buds and leave you craving for more.

ABOUT
DEEPAK KAUL
Deepak Kaul and his parents immigrated to the United States in 1980 from Kashmir, India. He grew up in New Jersey and attended Boston University as a Biology major. Following graduation, he found his true calling in the culinary field, leaving behind his pre-med degree. Bucking cultural expectations, he started his culinary career in Cambridge, Massachusetts. From there, he worked in San Francisco, New York City and London at restaurants Jardiniere and Union Pacific. After more than 20 years of dedication and mastering the complexities of the hospitality industry, he has decided to pursue his dream and follow his cultural roots. This dream is to reimagine and share the cuisine of his heritage in his next culinary adventure, Bhuna Restaurant.
704 NW 21st Avenue  ·  Portland Oregon 97209  ·  (971) 865-2176  ·
Hello@bhunarestaurant.com

Menu
Using time tested recipes as our starting point, we have created an eclectic menus of the classics of Indian Cuisine. Subtle complex marinades using time honored Indian grilling methods created by seasoned master chefs reflect the food trends in today’s India. The taste is authentic with innovative combinations and intricate spicing served with verve and style.  All this along with our hospitality and innovative signature cocktails make for a unique dining experience.

Traditional Entrees

Choice of
Makhani (gf)
The word "makhani" comes from "makhan" which means butter. The origin of this sauce is in Punjab and is an aromatic butter based tomato cream sauce seasoned with spices and herbs.
Vindaloo
This popular dish from the Goan region with Portugese influence is the spiciest curry on our menu.  A blend of red chilis, vinegar, ginger, cumin, and mustard seeds.
Korma
This is a characteristic Indian dish which can be traced back to the 16th century. The flavor of a korma is based on a mixture of spices along with cashew nuts, fresh ginger, green chilies and cream.
Saag
Saag, or palak, dishes are spiced spinach with onions & tomatoes, common in northern India. Saag makes for a tasty and healthy dish.
Kerala Masala
This famous dish from the southern state Kerala, is made with coconut milk, curry leaves, red chilies & spices.
Tikka Masala
A timeless favorite which consists of a rich creamy tomato, onion, and coriander gravy served with Tandoori protein.

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

Joyous is LOCAL.
When you order through Joyous, you’re supporting local restaurants directly, not billion-dollar corporations. Unlike big platforms, we focus exclusively on helping small, independent restaurants thrive. By ordering with Joyous, more of your money goes to the restaurant, not to excessive fees.

Plus, you’ll enjoy a personal connection to your favorite local spots and access to exclusive deals and loyalty rewards.

Joyous makes it easy to discover and support the unique flavors of your community while ensuring your favorite restaurants can keep doing what they do best—serving great food. Choose Joyous and support your local dining scene!

About the Business
Amir’s Motherland Dish is an East African restaurant offering a journey into a vibrant culinary landscape, characterized by bold flavors, aromatic spices, and a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients.  Our signature dishes are japati or anjara with chicken or goat.  Rice with chicken, fish, goat, or beef and, of course, homemade sambusas and mendassi.

Menu
ABOUT US
I Heart Gyro is two brothers serving up hearty portions of your favorite Mediterranean food for a great price. We’re proud to bring the authentic gyros, kabobs, hummus, falafel and more to Vancouver. Check out our reviews on
Google
,
Yelp
and
Facebook
then stop in to see us!
CONTACT
FEATURED ITEMS
Our Customers "Heart" These Dishes

Delicious & Authentic Mediterranean Food

Appetizers
HUMMUS PLATE – $9
Garbanzo beans, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, garnished with
olive oil, paprika & green olives. Served with pita bread.
*Add lamb or chicken gyro meat $4.50
BABA GHANOUJ PLATE – $9
Roasted eggplants tahini, lemon juice, garlic, garnished with olive oil, paprika & green olives. Served with pita bread.
*
Add lamb or chicken gyro meat $4.50
LABNEH – $8
Thick & sour yogurt cheese dip garnished with olive oil,
paprika and black olives. Served with pita bread.
*Add lamb or chicken gyro meat $4.50

6 grape leaves stuffed with rice, tomatoes, and lemon juice.
VEGGIE MAZA PLATE – $17
Combination of hummus, baba ghanouj, tabouleh salad,
falafel and dolma. Served with pita bread.
Soups & Salads

Green peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions,
kalamata olives, and feta cheese with tzatziki.

Red lentils mixed with onions and Mediterranean spices.
TABOULI SALAD – $10
Chopped parsely, green onions, tomatoes, & bulgur
with lemon juice.

Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, tzatziki sauce.
FATOUSH SALAD – $10
Romaine lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, parsley
lemon juice, spiced with sumac & fried pita.
Gyros & Sandwiches
Gyro & kabob wraps come with tzatziki sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, and topped with your choice of more tzatzik, regular garlic or spicy garlic.
LAMB GYRO WRAP – $11.95
Fresh shaved lamb and beef with feta.
CHICKEN GYRO WRAP – $11.95
Grilled chicken breast marinated in a special seasoning blend with feta.
LAMB KABOB WRAP – $13.95
Freshly marinated & grilled lamb kabob cubes.
CHICKEN KABOB WRAP – $13.95
Freshly marinated & grilled chicken kabob cubes.
FALAFEL GYRO WRAP – $10
Deep fried balls with tahini sauce. Served with lettuce,
tomatoes, onions & pickles.
*Add hummus $1.00
DOLMA GYRO WRAP – $9
Baba ghanouj, tomatoes, onions, cucumber and tzatziki.
KAFTA KEBAB SANDWICH – $13.95
Marinated & grilled beef served with lettuce, tomatoes,
onions, pickles and tahini.
JIBNAH SANDWICH – $8
Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, and onions topped with
melted feta cheese & wrapped in a warm pita.
Plates & Platters
LAMB GYRO PLATE – $17
Freshly shaved lamb & beef slices served with basamti rice and greek salad. Add fresh, warm pita for $1.25
CHICKEN GYRO PLATE – $17
Grilled chicken breast marinated in a special seasoning blend, served with rice & greek salad. Add fresh, warm pita for $1.25
ISKANDER PLATE – $17
Lamb Gyro meat mixed with tomato sauce. Served with cut pita & topped with healthy portion of tzatziki.
FALAFEL PLATTER – $18
Falafel balls served with basmati rice, Greek salad, side of hummus with pita bread.
*Ask for vegan option.
All of our kabobs are marinated in house seasoning and served with basmati rice, Greek salad & your choice of spicy garlic, regular garlic, or tahini sauce.
LAMB SHISH KABOB PLATE – $22

KAFTA KABOB PLATE – $19

Two skewers of freshly grill tomatoes, onions, green peppers, & mushrooms. Served with basmati rice, Greek salad & side of hummus with pita bread.
*Ask for vegan option

Meal Kits

Our Menu
You're on your way to unwrap something delicious.
Food
Khao Man Gai
Thai Chicken & Rice (Mary’s non-GMO) served with Nong’s Sauce, cucumbers, cilantro, and a side of soup. It’s simple, delicious, and what we’re known for.
Gluten free and Paleo available.
Khao Man Gai Piset (Large Size)
Everything you get with our regular Khao Man Gai, only with more chicken, more rice, more sauce, and chicken livers if you want them.
Gluten free and Paleo available.
Veggie Khao Man Gai (V/VG)
Tofu-based Khao Man Gai with no animal products used anywhere. Steamed OTA tofu and steamed broccoli served on jasmine rice with Nong’s sauce.
Vegetarian and Vegan-friendly.
Khao Kha Muu
Thai Pork & Rice (Carlton’s Farm), pickled mustard greens, and boiled egg served on jasmine rice with Thai chili sauce.
Chicken, Rice & Peanut Sauce
Chicken (Mary’s non-GMO) and steamed broccoli served on jasmine rice with Nong’s peanut sauce.
Tofu Peanut
Steamed OTA tofu and steamed broccoli served on jasmine rice with Nong’s peanut sauce.
Kids Meal
A kiddie-sized sampler of Chicken & Rice, steamed broccoli, OTA Tofu, cucumbers and cilantro.
Super Soup
The Chicken & Rice from our Khao Man Gai, served in a large bowl of soup. It’s exactly what you want on a rainy day.

View Menu
Explore new dishes & earn a special
reward
For a limited time only, Bao Bao’s Passport invites our youngest guests on an adventure to explore our menu. Pick up a Passport when you dine in or collect takeout, then use it to check off the dumplings your child tries in the restaurant or at home. After five new tastes, bring the completed passport back to your server or cashier to receive limited-edition Bao Bao iron-on patches to celebrate the adventure. While supplies last.
Learn more

Dumplings & Buns

Specialties

Beverages
Din Tai Fung offers vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free dishes, but please be aware that cross-contact with meat and allergens may occur due to shared cooking
equipment.
View Allergen Guide
Appetizers
Cucumber Salad
Crisp Persian cucumbers combined with cuts of mild fresno chili peppers and sliced, fresh garlic—all tossed together with drizzles of sesame oil and our signature DTF chili
oil.
Learn more
Seaweed & Beancurd
Salad
Crisp bean sprouts, smooth glass noodles, springy beancurd, and thin strips of seaweed tossed in our traditional vinegar dressing. A light touch of our signature DTF chili oil gives this appetizer layers of flavor and
texture.
Learn more
Soy Noodle
Salad
Thin sheets of tofu are carefully sliced to mimic noodles and tossed with julienned carrots and celery for a bit of
crunch.
Learn more
Wood Ear Mushrooms in a Vinegar
Dressing
Our nutrition-packed wood ear mushrooms are soaked in our special vinegar dressing until tender and juicy, then topped with goji berries and finely shredded ginger. Fragrant sesame oil and a splash of lemon juice bring sweet, tangy
flavor.
Learn more
Sweet & Sour Pork Baby Back
Ribs
A classic Shanghainese appetizer, these fresh, tender baby back ribs are evenly coated with our house-made sweet and sour
sauce.
Learn more
Hot & Sour Soup
(Pork)
Our delicious, thick Hot & Sour Soup is chock full of fresh ingredients, including sliced bamboo shoots, silky eggs, crunchy wood ear mushrooms, and buttery-soft tofu. Topped with fresh green onion and our house seasoning, it’s perfect for any occasion. (Contains egg, a vegetarian option is available upon
request)
Learn more
Steamed Soup with Bone-in
Chicken
Choice cuts of chicken are steamed for hours with fresh ginger and green onion. This signature Din Tai Fung dish is light, but packs a rich
aroma.
Learn more
Steamed Soup with Bone-in Beef Short
Ribs
A light and delicious steamed beef broth with tender slices of beef short
ribs.
Learn more
Xiao Long Bao
Kurobuta Pork Xiao Long
Bao
Each of our Xiao Long Bao is carefully weighed and folded by hand to achieve our signature Golden Ratio of 18 folds and stuffed with top-quality Kurobuta pork marinated in a blend of carefully-selected seasonings. Paired with the piquant aromas of fresh ginger and green onion, every bite is the perfect
bite.
*Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Crab & Kurobuta Pork Xiao Long
Bao
This delicious twist on our traditional Xiao Long Bao is filled with juicy Kurobuta pork and crab. The pork’s rich flavor is enhanced by the natural sweetness of crab, for a seafood flavor that’s rich but mellow. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Chicken Xiao Long
Bao
A classic reinvented, with fresh chicken, ground daily in-house, sweet notes of carrot, celery and hints of aromatic ginger and green onion. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Dumplings & Buns
Chicken Dumplings
Our delicately hand-folded dumplings are filled with premium chicken and sweet onions. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Vegan Dumplings
Filled with a carefully balanced mixture of bean curd, baby bok choy, shiitake mushrooms, wood ear mushrooms, glass noodles, and jicama. Freshly squeezed spinach juice is rolled into our signature dumpling skin to give these savory dumplings their vibrant, verdant hue. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.
Learn more
Cod Dumplings
Filled with a perfected ratio of Alaskan cod to Atlantic cod, these dumplings have a light, delicate flavor. Taiwanese cabbage, celery, and water chestnuts add extra springiness and crunch. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot broth. *Contains chicken
broth.
Learn more
Shrimp & Kurobuta Pork
Dumplings
Freshly-peeled shrimp combine with high-quality Kurobuta pork for a taste and texture that are hard to beat. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.
Learn more
Kimchi & Kurobuta Pork
Dumplings
Authentic Korean kimchi, chives, and glass noodles are finely chopped and folded into our savory Kurobuta pork filling. Fresh kimchi juice is rolled into the dough, giving them their signature orange hue. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Contains
shellfish.
Learn more
Shrimp & Kurobuta Pork Shao
Mai
For this classic Shanghainese dish, our Shao Mai skin is made thicker than our other dumpling skins to give a nice chewy texture, complementing a filling of our signature Kurobuta pork. A single juicy shrimp tops it all off. *Caution: very hot
broth
Learn more
Sticky Rice Shao Mai with Kurobuta Pork &
Mushroom
Savory sticky rice is seasoned with soy sauce, bits of earthy shiitake mushroom, and rich Kurobuta pork for full-bodied flavor in every
bite.
Learn more
Kurobuta Pork
Buns
Our signature Kurobuta pork filling is tucked into a soft, fluffy
bun.
Learn more
Chicken & Mushroom
Buns
Our premium chicken is carefully seasoned and mixed with chopped carrots, celery, and oyster mushrooms—all wrapped up in our fluffy
bun.
Learn more
Vegan Buns
This delicious, healthy take on our classic fluffy bun is filled with bean curd, baby bok choy, shiitake mushrooms, wood ear mushrooms, glass noodles, and
jicama.
Learn more

Wontons

favorite.
Learn more

Wontons
Served with our signature house spicy sauce and topped with garlic and green onion, our handmade wontons are always a fan
favorite.

Wontons

Freshly squeezed spinach juice is rolled into our house-made dough to give these wontons their vibrant, verdant

Soup

oil.

Freshly squeezed spinach juice is rolled into our house-made dough to give these wontons their vibrant, verdant hue. Garnished with green onion and a drizzle of sesame

Learn more

Oil

texture.

Garlic

oil.

Garlic

Bao

inside.

Kurobuta Pork Sticky Rice
Wrap
Locally-grown sticky rice stuffed with stewed Kurobuta pork belly, wrapped in bamboo leaves. A traditional dish that's hard to pass
up.
Learn more
Signature Cocktails
Pear Lychee Martini -
2oz
Grey Goose La Poire Vodka, St-Germain, fresh lemon juice, and lychee
fruit.
Learn more
Lychee Mojito -
2.5oz
Bacardi Light Rum, lychee liqueur, fresh lime juice, and
mint.
Learn more
Yuzu Margarita -
1.75oz
Patron Silver tequila, yuzu juice, Grand
Marnier.
Learn more
Cucumber Gimlet -
2.25oz
Roku Gin, St. Germain, fresh lime juice, fresh cucumber, and
mint.
Learn more
DTF Old Fashioned -
2oz
Kavalan Taiwanese single malt whiskey, house-made Oolong tea syrup, orange bitters, and Luxardo
cherry.
Learn more
Desserts
Shaved Snow with Fresh
Mango
Soft, fluffy shaved snow made with whole milk, crowned with fresh mango and a drizzle of our signature sweet & tart mango sauce and creamy condensed
milk.
Learn more
Chocolate & Mochi Xiao Long
Bao
Decadent, premium chocolate truffle enveloped in a thin layer of mochi—wrapped with painstaking attention into our signature 18 folds. A burst of chocolate lava in every bite. *Caution: hot filing inside *May contain
peanuts.
Learn more
Red Bean & Mochi Xiao Long
Bao
Our velvety-smooth red bean paste folded into our signature Xiao Long Bao skin. A thin layer of mochi adds a satisfying, chewy texture. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.
Learn more
Sweet Taro Xiao Long
Bao
Silky smooth taro filling wrapped in our signature delicate Xiao Long Bao skin—perfect for those who prefer their desserts nuanced and subtly sweet. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.
Learn more
Sesame & Mochi Xiao Long
Bao
Black sesame paste is wrapped with mochi in a delicately hand-folded dumpling skin. If you have a sweet tooth, this dessert will be hard to pass up. 
*Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *May contain
peanuts.
Learn more
Chocolate Buns
Decadent chocolate truffle enveloped in a soft, fluffy bun. A burst of chocolate lava in every bite. *Caution: hot filing inside *May contain
peanuts.
Learn more
Red Bean
Buns
A fluffy, soft bun filled with smooth, sweet red bean paste—this is a Din Tai Fung fan
favorite.
Learn more
Sweet Taro
Buns
Silky-smooth taro filling is wrapped in our signature soft, airy
bun.
Learn more
Sesame Buns
Rich sesame paste wrapped in a black-sesame infused steamed bun. These buns offer a deep, nutty flavor with subtle toasty notes and a light, airy texture. *May contain
peanuts.
Learn more
Red Bean Sticky Rice
Wrap
Smooth, lightly-sweetened red bean paste enveloped in sticky rice and wrapped in bamboo leaves to retain its moisture and aromatic bamboo
flavor.
Learn more
Beverages
Milk Teas
Our premium Assam black tea, cultivated and imported from Taiwan, is freshly brewed in-house. Each order is hand-shaken to aerate the tea, also available with Jasmine green tea for a lighter and slightly floral version of this delicious and milky Taiwanese
staple!
Learn more
Matcha Milk
Tea
Earthy Japanese matcha, lightly sweetened and
hand-shaken.
Learn more
Iced Black
Teas
Freshly brewed and full-bodied Assam black tea, hand-shaken to order to bring out its subtle notes of cocoa with a hint of spice. Enjoy this Taiwan-grown tea on its own or sweetened with a fruit
flavor!
*Honey Black Tea is not
vegan.
Learn more
Iced Green
Teas
Freshly brewed Jasmine green tea, hand-shaken to order to bring out its subtle floral notes. Enjoy this Taiwan-grown tea on its own or sweetened with a fruit
flavor!
*Honey Green Tea is not
vegan.
Learn more
Sea Salt Cream Iced
Teas
Delightful hand-whipped cream atop lightly-sweetened house-brewed tea. Choose green tea for a lightly floral and fragrant flavor or black tea for a rich and chocolatey
finish.
Learn more
Fresh Orange Green Iced
Tea
Made fresh daily from Taiwan-grown Jasmine tea. Freshly hand-squeezed orange juice complements the subtle floral notes of the
tea.
Learn more
Fresh Lemon Iced
Teas
Bright bursts of lemon with a smooth, sweet finish. This balanced and refreshing beverage is made with fresh-squeezed lemon juice. Choose from our selection of house-brewed Jasmine green or Assam black
tea.
Learn more
Honey Lemonade
Lemonade that is made to order and hand-shaken with crushed ice, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and a drizzle of honey. Sweet, tart, and a refreshing complement to any of our flavorful
dishes!
Learn more
Taiwanese Hot
Teas
No meal is complete without a hot cup of our Taiwan-grown tea. We offer Jasmine and Oolong
tea.
Learn more
Fresh Squeezed Orange
Juice
Our orange juice is made with navel oranges that are famous for their sweetness and freshly squeezed-in house every
day.
Learn more
SIGN UP FOR
Bao Bao Insiders
Your monthly bite of Din Tai Fung exclusives, news and delicious surprises. We've saved a seat at the table for you.

Where We Started
Our Story
Steam Rice Roll King Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine and Dim Sum in Portland, OR. Steam Rice Roll King's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Portland community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

Code: 5OFF

What our customers say
Reviews
The food is fantastic. This is the real deal and y'all need to try it if you like this Cheun Fun. The owners/staff are so friendly and when we went, service was very quick. We will be back.
Sara Garrison
I loved everything about this place! The authentic food truly captures hometown flavors. I highly recommend this restaurant for its exceptional food! Worth a bit of a drive to get there.
Sam Cen
This is probably the best place to get some steam rice roll. The rice rolls are made perfectly with the texture being thin and having a nice chewiness to them. The portions are of good size.
Charlie Te
The food is delicious. I have been here twice. It is consistent and the service is so nice. The egg steamed rice noodle roll was the crowd favorite, but I’ve also had the ground pork.
Stephanie A.
I have stopped here twice and the rice noodle rolls have been amazing both times. It's the perfect spot to stop for a quick lunch break. The rice noodles are the perfect texture.
Mia Simpson
Best rice roll noodles in town. Currently long wait times but worth it as the food is fresh and delicious. The owner actually grinds their own rice to make the noodles. I would recommend!!
Edison Wu

About the Business
We use all fresh ingredients. Our vegetables are delivered every 3 days to ensure freshness. Water chestnuts are the only vegetable  that comes out of a can(sorry can't find it fresh),no baby corn or bamboo shoots or wierd looking  mushrooms. Our Shittake Mushrooms are fresh, not dehydrated or canned like other restaurants. Our specialties are 1) we make all of our appetizers fresh. we don't buy frozen foods pre-made and try to pass them off on you as our own. 2) we cook all dishes to order. we don't have a steam table and scoop your food to order. 3) We don't use "Fillers" to enlarge our portion sizes. We feel that the customer should get what they pay for. When you come in for service, we will give you our utmost attention and give you an experience that is worth a 5 star Yelp.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Has the restaurant been sold recently?  I have been going here for years and love the food. The food is still good, but the vibe has changed dramatically.  The host/server has no personality.  Staffing is very limited. Service has gone down hill
A:
Yes it was sold and had new management take over. They hire only family. Let go all the long term waiters they had.
Jodi W.
See question details
Q:
Anyone here familiar with the term "wok flavor"?  I would like to know if this restaurant has any chefs who know how to toss the food in the wok to get the flames in the pan which gives food a  very delicate smoky flavor "of the wok".  I crave it!
A:
I’d suggest calling the restaurant. Thy would be happy to answer your question and they would know best
Kim G.

We are a small, family-owned Taiwanese restaurant specializing in handmade noodles, dumplings, beef noodle soup and more nostalgic Taiwanese dishes we ate before moving to the United States.

Q:
Is this restaurant noisy?
A:
It is a very small restaurant - with seating for about 6 at a counter next to the window plus roughly 8 tables.  I have eaten there 2x and did not find it noisy at all.

HK Cafe Menu (Updated October 2025)
Welcome to
HK Cafe
, Portland's premier destination for authentic Chinese cuisine and a dynamic dim sum experience. Located at
4410 SE 82nd Ave
, HK Cafe has earned rave reviews from food lovers who cherish quality, variety, and exceptional service.
The menu boasts a rich selection of dim sum that will tantalize your taste buds. From the tender
Steamed Chicken
($23.50) to the crispy
Fried Shrimp
($12.00), every dish is crafted with care. Don't miss the delightful
Egg Tart
($8.00) or the savory
Jindo Pork Chop
($21.00), which adds a unique twist to your dining experience. For those seeking something heartier, the
Lamb with Bean Curd Sheet in Clay Pot
($35.00) is a must-try.
Vibrant Atmosphere:
The lively ambience enhances your dining pleasure, making it ideal for gatherings with friends or family.
Great Service:
Reviewers consistently praise the attentive and friendly staff who ensure timely service and offer complimentary tea.
Family-Friendly:
A fun balloon artist entertains children, making it a delightful destination for families.
Join us at HK Cafe and indulge in a unique culinary journey that captures the essence of Chinese dining. Prepare for a satisfying feast—you might just find yourself returning for more!

raw_text:
Khao Moo Dang | Experience Authentic Thai Flavors – Order Now

Rukdiew Cafe
Catering
Order now
What is Khao Moo Dang
?
Driven by a desire to share the flavors of our youth,
Khao Moo Dang
is a tribute to the affordable,
everyday comfort meals beloved by Thais
— especially popular by students and working-class communities across Thailand.
While Khao Moo Dang is undeniably part of Thai street food culture today, it was introduced to Thailand by Chinese immigrants and gradually adapted with local flavors and presentation, resulting in the “
dirty delicious
” dish we enjoy today.
Steamed jasmine rice piled with juicy red pork, Chinese sausage, crispy pork belly, and a hard-boiled egg, drizzled with sweet, savory gravy made from pork drippings, soy sauce and spices.  Served with cucumber, cilantro, and a kick of chili in black soy vinegar.
Ba Mhee Moo Dang
While Khao Moo Dang is loved for its comforting rice version, many stalls also serve
Ba-Mhee Moo Dang
— red pork egg noodles — giving locals a tasty choice between rice or noodles, a variation that has become a beloved favorite among Thais.
KMD in portland
Since 1999
"What started as conversations over a few beers turned into the rice-and- pork shop we all missed from our childhood. Despite the misconception that people aren't adventurous eaters, the response and support from our locals have proven that Portland is a true food city, full of people with experienced and adventurous tastes," said
Pork and Rice Head Members
.
Khao Moo Dang Commitment
Our goal is to faithfully represent these pork-based dishes found on every street in Bangkok and throughout Thailand.
We are a locally Asian-owned restaurant with a commitment to buy produces from local vendors and organizations.  We cook our five spice pork loin and crispy pork belly fresh daily using steam and air-fry process without using oil.
Reservation
in Khao Moo Dang restaurant
We are a walk in, first come, first serve restaurant. Our space are limited and can fill up fast. Reservation system just does not fit with our space and our style of service.
Thai listed restaurant in Portland
A Thai-owned and listed restaurant in Portland bringing authentic Thai street food flavors like Khao Moo Dang and Ba Mhee Moo Dang to the local dining scene, offering comfort meals loved in Thailand to the heart of the city.

Where We Started
Our Story
Taste of Szechuan Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Portland, OR. Taste of Szechuan's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Portland, OR community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
And we were not disappointed. Some of the freshest most delicious dishes I’ve ever had. Vegetables especially were amazing. One of the best Chinese restaurants in Portland.
John Kitchener
What a great new addition to the area! We had the spring rolls which tasted very fresh and shared the dry fried green beans which were DELICIOUS. The portions are large and very filling.
Erika Abdelatif
We’re so happy to finally find an authentic Szechuan food restaurant in NE Portland. The Mapo Tofu is the best with real tender diced beef. We will definitely come back again.
Mei Chen
Delicious stop that we are so glad we tried! The food is so well done. Bold flavor and fresh. The lunch special is very good value. We ordered General Tso’s chicken and Double Pepper Beef!
Courtney Lee
Everything was VERY good! The food was FRESH and the restaurant space is a comfortable. We had 2 lunch specials. It is a crazy amount of food too. I will be back and highly recommend!
Jakki J.
Outstanding Szechuan food. It beats my favorite Szechuan restaurant at home. 100 percent recommend this place if you are in Portland and are looking for delicious Szechuan food.
Jenny Higginbotham

Is Jade Bistro and Teahouse in sellwood  open for takeout?
A:

Julia S.

name: Din Tai Fung
address: 9724 SW Washington Square Rd, Tigard, OR 97223
raw_text:
Menu | Din Tai Fung
Menu
Locations
Gift Cards
Discover
Careers
Reserve
Order
SHAPED
by
TRADITION,
CRAFTED
by HAND
*
With the highest quality ingredients
View Menu
Explore new dishes & earn a special
reward
For a limited time only, Bao Bao’s Passport invites our youngest guests on an adventure to explore our menu. Pick up a Passport when you dine in or collect takeout, then use it to check off the dumplings your child tries in the restaurant or at home. After five new tastes, bring the completed passport back to your server or cashier to receive limited-edition Bao Bao iron-on patches to celebrate the adventure. While supplies last.
Learn more
Appetizers
Xiao Long Bao
Dumplings & Buns
Wontons
Greens
Specialties
Noodles
Noodle Soups
From the Wok
A La Carte
Signature Cocktails
Desserts
Beverages
Din Tai Fung offers vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free dishes, but please be aware that cross-contact with meat and allergens may occur due to shared cooking
equipment.
View Allergen Guide
Appetizers
Cucumber Salad
Crisp Persian cucumbers combined with cuts of mild fresno chili peppers and sliced, fresh garlic—all tossed together with drizzles of sesame oil and our signature DTF chili
oil.
Learn more
Seaweed & Beancurd
Salad
Crisp bean sprouts, smooth glass noodles, springy beancurd, and thin strips of seaweed tossed in our traditional vinegar dressing. A light touch of our signature DTF chili oil gives this appetizer layers of flavor and
texture.
Learn more
Soy Noodle
Salad
Thin sheets of tofu are carefully sliced to mimic noodles and tossed with julienned carrots and celery for a bit of
crunch.
Learn more
Wood Ear Mushrooms in a Vinegar
Dressing
Our nutrition-packed wood ear mushrooms are soaked in our special vinegar dressing until tender and juicy, then topped with goji berries and finely shredded ginger. Fragrant sesame oil and a splash of lemon juice bring sweet, tangy
flavor.
Learn more
Sweet & Sour Pork Baby Back
Ribs
A classic Shanghainese appetizer, these fresh, tender baby back ribs are evenly coated with our house-made sweet and sour
sauce.
Learn more
Hot & Sour Soup
(Pork)
Our delicious, thick Hot & Sour Soup is chock full of fresh ingredients, including sliced bamboo shoots, silky eggs, crunchy wood ear mushrooms, and buttery-soft tofu. Topped with fresh green onion and our house seasoning, it’s perfect for any occasion. (Contains egg, a vegetarian option is available upon
request)
Learn more
Steamed Soup with Bone-in
Chicken
Choice cuts of chicken are steamed for hours with fresh ginger and green onion. This signature Din Tai Fung dish is light, but packs a rich
aroma.
Learn more
Steamed Soup with Bone-in Beef Short
Ribs
A light and delicious steamed beef broth with tender slices of beef short
ribs.
Learn more
Xiao Long Bao
Kurobuta Pork Xiao Long
Bao
Each of our Xiao Long Bao is carefully weighed and folded by hand to achieve our signature Golden Ratio of 18 folds and stuffed with top-quality Kurobuta pork marinated in a blend of carefully-selected seasonings. Paired with the piquant aromas of fresh ginger and green onion, every bite is the perfect
bite.
*Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Crab & Kurobuta Pork Xiao Long
Bao
This delicious twist on our traditional Xiao Long Bao is filled with juicy Kurobuta pork and crab. The pork’s rich flavor is enhanced by the natural sweetness of crab, for a seafood flavor that’s rich but mellow. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Chicken Xiao Long
Bao
A classic reinvented, with fresh chicken, ground daily in-house, sweet notes of carrot, celery and hints of aromatic ginger and green onion. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Dumplings & Buns
Chicken Dumplings
Our delicately hand-folded dumplings are filled with premium chicken and sweet onions. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot
broth.
Learn more
Vegan Dumplings
Filled with a carefully balanced mixture of bean curd, baby bok choy, shiitake mushrooms, wood ear mushrooms, glass noodles, and jicama. Freshly squeezed spinach juice is rolled into our signature dumpling skin to give these savory dumplings their vibrant, verdant hue. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.
Learn more
Cod Dumplings
Filled with a perfected ratio of Alaskan cod to Atlantic cod, these dumplings have a light, delicate flavor. Taiwanese cabbage, celery, and water chestnuts add extra springiness and crunch. *Las Vegas location serves 6 pieces. *Caution: very hot broth. *Contains chicken
broth.
Learn more
Shrimp & Kurobuta Pork
Dumplings
Freshly-peeled shrimp combine with high-quality Kurobuta pork for a taste and texture that are hard to beat. *Las Vegas location serves 6
pieces.

Tea

hand-shaken.

About the Business
The Journey of Smoke and Fire
Nothing speaks more to the Chinese food experience than street food. And among all the Chinese street foods, BBQed skewers hold a special place in people's heart. The word 烟火, literally translated as "smoke and fire" refers to the authentic nature of everyday living in the bustling cities of China. The fire that feeds and sustains. The smoke that pushes and pulls. These are what we strives to bring to the table, and to you.
…

Cafe & Delicatessen
Take-out, Delivery & Dine-In
We’re open for take-out, delivery, and limited indoor dining! We just ask that you please continue masking when visiting us. Please click below to place an order or call us at
503-641-2700
.
Order Now
Welcome to Tan Tan
Authentic Vietnamese Cuisine and Sauces
Tân Tân Café & Delicatessen has been serving authentic Vietnamese cuisine in Beaverton, Oregon for over 20 years. Our family-owned restaurant specializes in a variety of dishes including traditional Vietnamese-style sandwiches (Bánh Mì), beef noodle soup (Phở), and an assortment of house-made delicatessen hams and pâté. We also offer freshly brewed bubble tea and a medley of traditional Vietnamese desserts.
In 2017, we launched our own line of Tân Tân Vietnamese sauces based on our family’s recipes that we have been serving at the restaurant. Our Peanut Sauce, Hoisin Sauce, and ever-popular Mom’s Hot Chili Sauce are the first line of Vietnamese sauces made in Oregon and can be used as dipping sauces, marinades, glazes, and in stir-fries. Tân Tân means New Beginnings and we are excited to share our flavors with you.
Authentic Vietnamese sauces for home cooks
Peanut Sauce
Luxuriously creamy, our Peanut Sauce is perfect for salad rolls or glazing meat and vegetables. Our peanut sauce is certified vegan and certified gluten-free.
Buy Now
Hoisin Sauce
Sweet, tangy and easy to caramelize, our Vietnamese Hoisin Sauce is versatile in many dishes. Our hoisin sauce is certified vegan and certified gluten-free.
Buy Now
Vegan Fish Sauce
The foundation of any Vietnamese kitchen, our family’s Sweet “Fish” Sauce is made without fish but with all the flavor. Our fish sauce is certified vegan and certified gluten-free.
Buy Now
Hot Chili Sauce
Packing a flavorful punch, our Mom’s Hot Chili Sauce is the new addictive pantry staple. Our hot chili sauce is certified vegan and certified gluten-free.
Buy Now

Assorted Tan Tan Meats
Please inquire for varieties and pricing
Our Story
TAN TAN MEANS “NEW BEGINNINGS”
Escaping Vietnam after the fall of Saigon in 1976, Vinh and Mai sought a New Beginning. Their daughter Lisa was born in an Indonesian refugee camp and the family arrived in Oregon in 1981.
In the years since, our family’s Tân Tân Cafe & Delicatessen restaurant has become a local favorite and provided a welcoming space to unite a wonderful community where we have been so honored to share our family’s recipes. Tân Tân’s authentic menu highlights our family’s Southern Vietnamese-style cooking through bright, herbaceous and flavorful dishes that may be off the beaten path but are sure to become your comforting favorite as well.
With the support of our amazing customers, we were encouraged to embark on another New Beginning in 2017. We introduced a trio of our most popular house sauces for home cooks and have since expanded to retail markets internationally. We are committed to keeping our sauces certified vegan and gluten-free. Our beautifully packaged products are reminiscent of our family’s heritage.
Our family looks forward to welcoming you with our flavors and we wholeheartedly thank you and welcome you to join us on your own New Beginning with us!
Warmly Yours,
Vinh, Mai & Lisa

Where We Started
Our Story
August Moon Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Portland, OR. August Moon's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Portland community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
This restaurant is so underrated. The egg drop soup is the best I’ve tried in Portland. It’s the classic, bright yellow egg drop soup and adding the crispy wontons makes it perfect. Definitely my new go-to spot.
Sage Rose
This is my go to lunch spot and the fact that they are open on Holiday's means it is also becoming my go to Holiday spot. I love the food and prices and the temperature is always perfect for those cold days.
Jeff Lords
Makes the best egg foo young ever on this planet. We have eaten out at many Chinese restaurants and this is one of the finest in Portland. Every dish was fresh cooked from scratch. Would definitely recommend.
Carlee Smith
Classic, reliable, and delicious. We've been eating here and getting takeout regularly for almost 15 years. Especially love the sesame beef, general tso's chicken, the lo meins, green beans, and the eggplant dishes .
Peter Sergienko
Wonderful place with wonderful food. We keep going back for the food. The Moo Goo Gai Pan is great, and I highly recommend the Garlic Chicken. They have an entire section of the menu dedicated to vegetarian dishes.
Jeffrey Hinman
Such a nice place! Everything was delicious, we ordered chicken with honey walnuts and the sesame beef. Both were fantastic! The beef was perfectly cooked and the chicken was fresh. We can’t wait to return and try more dishes.
Beverly Walker

House Specials
Green Onion Pancake 葱油饼
Our famous Green Onion Pancake is made with flaky dough layered with chopped scallions. Pan fried with scallion-infused oil to create a crispy texture.
Vegetarian
Spicy Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (不辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our savory house sauce.
Spicy Beef Pancake Roll 麻辣牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Pancake Roll 酱香牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our savory house sauce.
Pan Fried Chive Dumplings 韭菜盒子
Minced aromatic chives, egg, and glass noodles stuffed into a dumpling, pan fried for a crisp finish.
Pan Fried Beef Pies 牛肉馅饼
Juicy, seasoned beef wrapped in a savory crust and pan fried to perfection, served on a bed of shredded greens.
Five Spice Beef Shank 五香牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with a fragrant blend of Five Spice, served cold with sliced cucumber.
Spicy Beef Shank 麻辣牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with our mala spice blend, served cold with sliced green onion and cilantro.

About the Business
Business owner information
Pop S.
Business Owner
Not your typical Thai. We are Thai New Generation focusing on bringing you adventurous, bold flavor of traditional and non-traditional dishes using the freshest ingredients. Look out for our nightly specials from regional home cooked dishes to market fried grasshoppers.

Our wine list focuses on small production and farming with thoughts towards the future. Cheers! 

Our first location, San Francisco, is honored with the Michelin Bib Gourmand 2016 - present.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
What is the parking situation?
A:
Street parking. Be prepared to parallel park in tight neighborhood streets.
Karen K.
See question details
Q:
I tried calling several times with no answer... Do you guys currently offer indoor seating?
A:
This may be a bit late, but I visited in person about 2 months ago. At the time of my visit, both indoor and outdoor seating were avabile. They did a temperature check and masks *might* be required when not eating.
Grace H.

Breaking Buns PDX
About
Contact
Open Menu

About
Contact
Our food truck offers a variety of your favorite types of Asian fusion food.
Hours:
Mon-Thurs 3-11pm
Friday-Sat 12-11pm
Breaking Buns was founded in March 2021.  Serving steamed buns, yakisoba noodles, and fried rice.  Only using the finest local ingredients such as St. Helen’s Ranch and S&D produce.
Menu
Breaking Buns
Gua Bao
Open-face style large steamed buns generously filled and served with an 8 oz. side of house-made Napa cabbage slaw tossed in Sake-Ginger dressing.  All Bao fillings are prepared fresh to order
OTA TOFU BAO
2-$8, 3-$11, 4-$14
Ota Tofu coated in rice flour and house made togarashi and fried crisp, topped with Namasu, Edamame, Cilantro, Sweet Soy Sauce and Szechuan Mayonnaise
CHICKEN PHILLY CHEESESTEAK BAO
2-$8.5, 3-$11.5, 4-$14.5
Chicken thighs, sauteed Bell Peppers, Mushrooms and Onions topped with Cheddar cheese, Szechuan mayonnaise and Thai basil
SZECHUAN CHICKEN BAO
2-$8, 3-$11, 4-$14
Chicken thighs, Mushrooms and Napa Cabbage simmered in Szechuan sauce and topped with Scallions and Chopped Peanuts
SWEET & SPICY ORANGE CHICKEN BAO
2-$8.5, 3-$11.5 4-$14.5
Chicken thighs, Bell Peppers and Onions simmered in Sweet Thai Chili sauce and topped with Korean Fire sauce, Fried Shallots and Cilantro
PORK BELLY BAO
2-$9.5, 3-$12.5, 4-$15
Oven Roasted Pork Belly sauteed with Mushrooms and Napa Cabbage, glazed with Sweet Soy sauce and topped with Scallions, Chopped Peanuts and Szechuan Mayonnaise
BBQ PORK RODEO BAO
2-$9.5, 3-$12.5, 4-$15
Oven Roasted Pork Belly sauteed with Mushrooms and Onions then simmered in Plum Tonkatsu and topped with Cheddar Cheese, Szechuan mayonnaise, Fried Shallots and Thai Basil
SZECHUAN COW BAO
2-$9.5, 3-$12.5, 4-$15
Braised Beef simmered in Szechuan sauce and topped with Namasu, Fried Shallots and Cilantro
BRAISED BEEF TONKATSU BAO
2-$9.5, 3-$12.5, 4-$15
Braised Beef simmered in Plum Tonkatsu and topped with Pickled Onions, Cilantro, Szechuan mayonnaise and chopped Peanuts
SPICY SHRIMP BAO
2-$9.5, 3-$12.5, 4-$15
Mirin Poached Shrimp simmered in Szechuan sauce and topped with Daikon Radish, Edamame, Cilantro, Szechuan Mayonnaise and Sweet Soy Sauce
Noodles
YAKISOBA  $11
Locally made Japanese Yakisoba noodles, Mushrooms, Onions, Bean Sprouts and Napa Cabbage wok fried in traditional house made Yakisoba sauce and topped with Namasu, Scallions, Cilantro and chopped Peanuts
Substitute Vermicelli Noodles (gluten free) for Yakisoba noodles as a lower gluten option (sauce contains gluten)
VIETNAMESE COLD NOODLE SALAD $8
Vermicelli, bean sprouts, cucumber, cilantro, scallion, and Thai basil, tossed in house made Shallot-Lime Vinaigrette and garnished with chopped Peanuts and Sweet Soy sauce
ADD PROTEIN
Ota Tofu coated in rice flour, togarashi and fried crisp +$2.5
Raw Ota Tofu + $2.5
Chicken- Hand trimmed fresh chicken thighs seasoned in house made Togarashi, Wok seared and shredded +$3.5
Pork Belly- Japanese cut, lean Pork Bellies seasoned with Asian chili’s and spices, oven roasted then Wok seared +$4.5
Shrimp- Large shrimp poached in Michu +$4.5
Braised Beef-Hand trimmed till very lean, regionally raised beef slow braised in aromatics till exceptionally tender +$5
Breaking Buns
Made with
Squarespace

5523 SE 28th Ave
Portland, OR 97202

breakingbunspdx@gmail.com
(503) 728-8207
