What Our Clients Say
John B. Castro
If your looking for a great place to enjoy atmosphere with your meal, check out Sam's place!!!
07.22.2022
Ariel G.
Yummy Thai food, lovely little quaint place! I'll be coming back. Food - very good. Just what I expected and wanted. We had salad rolls (the peanut sauce was soo good), pad Thai, and drunken noodles. All hit the spot! Service - Our server was nice and attentive! Price - lunch was a really good deal! The plates are only $7!! With big portions that's a steal.
07.22.2022
Brittany J.
Every time I have gotten delivery it's been 10/10 also while being some of the most inexpensive Thai food around. I've tried the pad Thai and the curry and they've both been amazing. the pad Thai is a generous portion and the flavor is great, and their yellow curry is my favorite. You really can't go wrong with Sunee Thai & Lao Kitchen.
07.22.2022
Ian B
Sunee Thai is a good neighborhood restaurant for a bit to eat or a take out binge. Value for money is solid. They don't skimp on the goodies when it comes to curries and noodle dishes. The fresh chili spice option is the way to go. It packs a punch but I find the balance of the spice to flavor satisfying
07.22.2022
Dawn P
I've eaten here four times and each time it's been delicious. Their veggies are so fresh, varied, and plentiful. My go-to is the cashew chicken, but I recently tried the lemongrass chicken, and it was so good! I wasn't sure how lemongrass and peanut sauce would go together. Let me say...superb. Perfectly balanced and delicious.
07.22.2022
Chase M.
I love this place, the Groupon doesn't hurt either. Right across from my lil sister's house so it's great for to go. Pad kee mao and other noodles, pad thai etc are lovely. Curry is great and they have a good spice. Some use just chili flakes to spice where they also have the fine ground thai spices here, and they kick butt! Always get some extra on the side. Get it spicy, it's good here.
07.22.2022
Josephine S.
Very good Tom Yum and this shredded chicken salad (Larb Gai). Will definitely be back to try new items on the menu. Price is reasonable; staff is very friendly, an intimate setting for a date, dinner with friends, or just stopping by for pick up.
07.22.2022
Jhon H
I had lunch here and went with the Pad See-Eew. I love the thick noodles and the shoyu sauce was delicious. I could taste the garlic as well and that's always a great thing for me. There was a perfect amount of broccoli and carrots with the dish. I'll definitely be back to try more dishes!
07.22.2022
John B. Castro

07.22.2022

$2.50
Canned Soda 12oz
$2.50
Coke, Diet Coke, Barq’s Root Beer, Fanta Orange, Minute Maid Lemonade, and Sprite.
Juices
$6
Apple, Coconut, Mango, Pineapple, or Orange
Milk / Chocolate Milk 2%
$4
Root Beer by the Bottle
$7
Phuket Sunset
$6
As colorful as its namesake, this refreshing fruit punch combines mango, cranberry, and orange juices with a splash of Sprite.
Hot Tea (by the pot)
Puer Tuocha
$10
A compressed tea with dark and smooth flavor over fermented sweet notes that pair perfectly with savory foods.
Zhu Oolong
$7
A lower baking temperature makes for a crisp and clear tea with notes of lilac and bamboo.
Toasted Rice Flower (Green)
$7
The rich fragrance of toasted, partially puffed brown rice blends beautifully with this large-leaf sencha.
Green Kukicha
$7
Harvested from the veins of matcha leaves, this tea has a sweetness similar to mangoes.
Lotus
$7
A rich floral and fruit aroma with notes of anise.
Rose Petal Black
$7
A blend of Qimen and rose petals cools the palate for the perfect pairing for spicy foods.
Ginger Peach (Black)
$7
Fabulous blend of Ceylon tea, natural peach juices and top-grade ginger. Pairs wonderfully with Thai cuisines.
Body Armor (Herbal)
$10
Organic blend designed to strengthen the immune system; includes rose hips, peppermint leaf, echinacea, purpurea, calendula flower, red clover blossoms, Oregon Grape Root, and goldenseal root.
Grand Qimen
$8
A premier example of Chinese black tea made from the small tip leaves for a sweet, full-bodied flavor.
Jasmine Tea
$7
Classic Thai tea scented with jasmine flowers.
Magnolia Oolong
$7
A light-bodied tea with a sweet and floral aroma similar to
Jasmine tea.
Chrysanthemum Flower
$8
A classic tea with clear light flavor and a pleasant spice.
Coconut Heaven (Black)
$7
Premium Black tea with slightly toasted coconut flakes.
Chamomile Lavender
$8
Egyptian chamomile and lavender soothes the stomach and the nerves with this aromatic herbal tea.
Bottled Beer
– $7
Singha
A premium quality lager beer brewed from the finest ingredients with 100% Barley Malt and Saaz Hops. the highest quality hops in the world. Full-bodied and rich in taste, with strong hops character.
Tsing Tao
A well-hopped standard pale lager of 4.7% abv, is the flagship brew. The China's second largest brewery.
Sapporo
A Premium Beer is a refreshing lager with a crisp, refined flavor and a clean finish. Sapporo is the oldest beer brand in Japan.
Full Sail Amber Ale
A sweet, malty, medium-bodied ale with a spicy, floral hop finish. It's brewed with 2-row Pale, Crystal and Chocolate malts. And hop it with Mt. Hoods and Cascades. One of Oregonian Favorites since 1989.
Black Butte Porter
A dark beer as the first and flagship brand, Black Butte is produced in Deschutes . A slight hop bitterness up front enhances the distinctive chocolate and roasted finish. It's prized for its creamy mouthfeel and intense complex flavors.
Asahi
(Rice Lager) Sapporo, Japan - Dry and crisp rice lager makes for a refreshing light beer.
Level ‘s Sweep the Leg
(Rice Lager) Portland, Oregon - A session lager with a subtle tropical coconut hop character.
White Claw
(Hard Seltzer) Glendale, Arizona - The classic hard seltzer. Available in Mango or Black Cherry
Heineken (Non-Alcoholic)
(Lager) Netherlands - A gentle fruity flavor and slight malty notes with zero-alcohol.
Avid’s Dragon Fruit Cider
(Cider) Bend, Oregon - Sweet and fierce, this cider is balanced with raspberry and dragon fruit.
Draft Beer
– 16oz/22oz $8/$10
Draft beers will now be on a rotating schedule, please ask your server for the current draft beer selection.
*Selections vary between locations depending on the number of taps.
House Cocktails
– $15
Siam Tea
A tropical delight of citrus vodka, rum, gin, and Triple Sec paired with house sweet and sour, raspberry liqueur, and fresh raspberries.
Mojito
Choice of four flavors: classic, lemongrass, mango or pineapple. Each is mixed with white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and fresh mint.
One Night in Bangkok
A memorable Bangkok blend of smooth Bourbon whiskey, Thai iced coffee, and sweet cream.
Raspberry Lemon Drop
Your favorite lemon drop sweetened with fresh raspberry. Made with citrus vodka, Triple Sec, and served with a sugar rim.
Coconut Elixir
Muddled lime and coconut vodka, served up martini style.
House Martini
Our own Thai Bloom! version of the classic martini: Monopolowa vodka, paired with a spicy jalapeno olive.
Pineapple Express
An exotic cocktail combining the sweetness of coconut vodka, banana liqueur and pineapple juice.
Spicy Cosmo
A spicy Cosmo twist featuring vodka infused with lemongrass and Thai chili, served with a sweet sugar rim.
Thai Tea Kicker
A Thai Bloom! original cocktail features sweet vanilla vodka, almondy amaretto, Thai Iced Tea and whipped cream.
Manhattan
Thai Whiskey with sweet vermouth, freshly brewed Jasmine tea, and drops of bitters. Shaken cold and served up with a cherry garnish.
Mai Thai
Dark rum and coconut rum with grenadine, orange juice, pineapple juice with a peach schnapps float.
Cucumber Cocktail
A uniquely refreshing combination of gin, muddled lime, cucumber, and mint, shaken up cold.
Tamarind Margarita
Thai-style margarita with tamarind (a popular tropical fruit) mixed with tequila, Triple Sec, lime, and house sweet and sour. Served on the rocks with a sugar rim. Garnished with cinnamon and orange slice.
Mimosa
Korbel Prosecco with choice of orange or mango juice.
Wine
House Wine
A rotating selection of red and white.
House Plum Wine
Subtly sweet, natural plum flavor has just a hint of tartness.
Ponzi
Pinot Gris - Willamette Valley, OR. Tart fruit flavors; off dry. Historic Oregon winery is restoring interest in this varietal.
Stoneleigh Sauvignon Blanc
Marlborough, New Zealand - Bright and expressive wine with notes of tropical flavors.
King Estate Chardonnay
Yellow pear and lemon oil with hints of toast, allspice and oak.
Alta Vista
Malbec - Spicy and red fruit notes with soft tannins.
Momokawa Sake
Served warm or chilled, Nestled into Oregon Wine Country in Forest Grove, this Sake taps into some of the country’s best water with each premium craft brew it produces
Willamette Valley
Pinot Noir - A medium-bodied silky texture, and a fruit - forward nose of ripe red cherry, raspberry and cranberry accented. A well balancing of acidity & vibrancy wine.
Charles Krug
Cabernet Sauvignon - Napa, CA. Ripe black cherry, blackberry and black currant flavors precede hints of dried blueberry and cocoa.
King Estate
Pinot Noir - Willamette Valley, OR. Full-bodied, blackberry and black cherry with a subtle clove flavors.
Willamette Valley
Riesling - Willamette Valley, OR. Balance of sweet and refreshing crispness with aromas of citrus and tropical fruits.
Willamette Valley
Pinot Gris - A bright medium-bodied profile, the wine is clean, crisp and refreshing from fresh pear, green apple and citrus accented by a hint of vanilla.
Seven Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
Walla Walla, WA - Medium body wine with firm tannins and balanced acidity
Seven Hills Merlot
Walla Walla, WA - Strawberry, black plum and spice with a juicy, firm finish.
After Dinner Cocktails
Death by Chocolate
The ultimate chocolate martini with vanilla vodka and Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur.
Salted Caramel Martini
Truly indulgent, enjoy real Ghirardelli Caramel shaken up with vanilla vodka. Served with a sweet & salty rim.
White Thai Affair
A Thai twist on a classic white russian, featuring our famed Mekhong Whisky and Cinnamon Vanilla Baileys.
Raspberry Béret
A decadent treat: Chambord, Kahlua, Frangelico, vanilla vodka, and raspberry purée with freshly brewed coffee. Whipped cream is optional but encouraged.
Hot Damn!!!
The name says it all. Our own spice-infused tom yum vodka with cinnamon liqueur, served chilled. Note: one spice level only, no adjustments may be made.
Beautiful
A perfectly beautiful blend of Hennessy and Grand Marnier. Served in a brandy sniffer with a fresh peel of orange.
Prices are subject to change without notice.

Privacy Policy
Last modified: 02/22/2022
Introduction
SmilePOS, LLC ("
Company
" or "
We
") respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. We provide point of sales systems and related products and services (collectively "
Product
" or "
Products
") that help our restaurant customers better manage their business.
This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the websites, Smilepos.com and SmileDining.com (collectively, "
Websites
") or through our Products and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
This policy applies to information we collect:
On the Websites.
In email, text, and other electronic messages between you and the Websites.
Through mobile and desktop applications you download from the Websites, which provide dedicated non-browser-based interaction between you and the Websites.
through our Products used or accessed by us or our Product users.
It does not apply to:
information collected by us offline or through any other means not described in this policy;
information collected by any third party, including through any application or content (including advertising) that may link to or be accessible from the Websites or Products; or
Any third-party websites, products, or services (including those of Product users and their vendors) even if they link to our Websites or Products, and we encourage you to review the applicable privacy policy of those third parties to learn how your information will be collected and used.
Please read this policy carefully to understand our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, your choice is not to use our Websites or Products. By accessing or using the Websites or Products, you agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time (see Changes to Our Privacy Policy). Your continued use of the Websites or Products after we make changes is deemed to be acceptance of those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.
Information We Collect About You and How We Collect It
We collect several types of information from and about users of our Websites and Products (including users of our Websites and Products and customers of our Products users), including information:
By which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number (“
Personal Information
”);
About your internet connection, the equipment you use to access our Websites or Products, and usage details.
We collect this information:
Directly from you when you provide it to us.
Automatically as you navigate through the Websites. Information collected automatically may include usage details, IP addresses, and information collected through cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies.
From third parties, for example, our business partners.
Information You Provide to Us
The information we collect on or through our Websites and Products may include:
Information that you provide by filling in forms on our Websites or provided by our Product users. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our Websites or Product user’s merchandise, subscribing to our Products, or requesting further Products. We may also ask you for information when you report a problem with our Websites or Products, including, without limitation:
Records and copies of your correspondence (including email addresses) if you contact us.
Your responses to surveys for research purposes.
Details of transactions you carry out through our Websites or Products and of the fulfillment of your orders. You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order through our Websites or Products.
Your search queries on the Websites.
Information We Collect Through Automatic Data Collection Technologies
As you navigate through and interact with our Websites, we may use automatic data collection technologies to collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions, and patterns, including:
Details of your visits to our Websites, including traffic data, location data, logs, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites.
Information about your computer and internet connection, including your IP address, operating system, and browser type.
The information we collect automatically does not include Personal Information. It helps us to improve our Websites and to deliver a better and more personalized service, including by enabling us to:
Estimate our audience size and usage patterns.
Store information about your preferences, allowing us to customize our Websites according to your individual interests.
Speed up your searches.
Recognize you when you return to our Websites.
The technologies we use for this automatic data collection may include:
Cookies (or browser cookies).
A cookie is a small file placed on the hard drive of your computer. You may refuse to accept browser cookies by activating the appropriate setting on your browser. However, if you select this setting you may be unable to access certain parts of our Websites. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you direct your browser to our Websites.
Flash Cookies.
Certain features of our Websites may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from, and on our Websites. Flash cookies are not managed by the same browser settings as are used for browser cookies. For information about managing your privacy and security settings for Flash cookies, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information.
Web Beacons.
Pages of the Websites and our e-mails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of certain website content and verifying system and server integrity).
Children Under the Age of 13
Our Websites or Products are not intended for children under 13 years of age. No one under age 13 may provide any information to the Websites or Products. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 13. If you are under 13, do not use or provide any information on the Websites or through our Products. If we learn we have collected or received Personal Information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at
[email protected]
.
How We Use Your Information
We use information that we collect about you or that you provide to us, including any Personal Information:
To present our Websites and its contents to you.
To provide you with information or Products that you request from us.
To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it.
To provide you with notices about your account/subscription, including expiration and renewal notices.
To carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered between you and us, including for billing and collection.
To notify you about changes to our Websites or any Products we offer or provide though it.
To allow you to participate in interactive features on our Websites.
In any other way we may describe when you provide the information.
For any other purpose with your consent.
We may also use your information to contact you about our Products and third-parties' goods and services that may be of interest to you. If you do not want us to use your information in this way, or if you want to change your information with us, adjust your user preferences or change your information in your account profile, or contact us as stated in Contact Information.  You may also delete your information by clicking the delete button in your account profile or contacting us as stated in Contact Information.  For more information, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information and Contact Information.
Disclosure of Your Information
We may disclose aggregated information about our users and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
We may disclose Personal Information that we collect, or you provide as described in this privacy policy:
To our subsidiaries and affiliates.
To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business and who are bound by contractual obligations to keep Personal Information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them.
To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Company’s assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by Company about our Websites and Product users is among the assets transferred.
For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
With your consent.
We may also disclose your Personal Information:
To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
To enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety of the Company, our customers, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information
We strive to provide you with choices regarding the Personal Information you provide to us. We have created mechanisms to provide you with the following control over your information:
Tracking Technologies and Advertising.
You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent. To learn how you can manage your Flash cookie settings, visit the Flash player settings page on Adobe's website. If you disable or refuse cookies, please note that some parts of this site may then be inaccessible or not function properly.
Data Security
Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee the security of your Personal Information transmitted to our Websites or through our Products. Any transmission of Personal Information is at your own risk. We are not responsible for circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the Websites or the Products.
Changes to Our Privacy Policy
It is our policy to post any changes we make to our privacy policy on this page. If we make material changes to how we treat our users' Personal Information, we will notify you by email to the email address specified in your account or through a notice on the Websites. The date the privacy policy was last revised is identified at the top of the page. You are responsible for ensuring we have an up- to-date active and deliverable email address for you, and for periodically visiting our Websites and this privacy policy to check for any changes.
Contact Information
To ask questions or comment about this privacy policy and our privacy practices, contact us at:
SmilePOS, LLC, PO Box 2653, Lynnwood, WA 98036 or
[email protected]
.
Accessibility Statement
SmilePOS LLC (“SmilePOS,” “we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities.  We are continually improving the user experience for everyone, and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
Measures to Support Accessibility
SmilePOS takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website:
Incorporate accessibility considerations into our digital resource design process.
Ensures accessibility is part of our continuous improvement process.
Follow reasonable technical practices for digital accessibility.
Conformance Status
The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG)
defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities.  It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA.  Smile Dining website is conformant with WCAG 2.0 level AA and partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA.   Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.
Feedback
We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Smile Dining website.  Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
Phone: (206) 905-9025
E-mail:
[email protected]
Compatibility with Browsers and Assistive Technology
Smile Dining website is designed to be compatible with assistive technologies and the last two versions of major browsers, including Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Safari, and Firefox.
In Internet Explorer 10, 11, and older browsers, some aspects of the website may not display optimally.  Smile Dining website is not designed for Internet Explorer 9 and earlier versions.
Technical Specifications
Accessibility of Smile Dining website relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:
HTML
CSS
JavaScript
SVG
These technologies are relied upon for conformance with the accessibility standards used.
Limitations and Alternatives
Despite our best efforts to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website, there may be some limitations.  Please contact us as described in “Feedback” above if you encounter any issues in accessing our website.
Assessment Approach
SmilePOS assessed the accessibility of Smile Dining website by self-evaluation.
Formal complaints
If you wish to send us a formal complaint regarding accessibility accommodations of this website, please contact us as described in “Feedback” above.
Formal Approval of this Accessibility Statement
This Accessibility Statement is approved by:
SmilePOS LLC

PRIVACY STATEMENT
SECTION 1 - WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION?
When you purchase something from our store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address.
        When you browse our store, we also automatically receive your computer’s internet protocol (IP) address in order to provide us with information that
        helps us learn about your browser and operating system.
        Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates.
SECTION 2 - CONSENT
How do you get my consent?
When you provide us with personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange for a delivery or return a
        purchase, we imply that you consent to our collecting it and using it for that specific reason only.
        If we ask for your personal information for a secondary reason, like marketing, we will either ask you directly for your expressed consent, or provide
        you with an opportunity to say no.
        If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your
        ontinued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at anytime, by contacting us at
[email protected]
SECTION 3 - DISCLOSURE
We may disclose your personal information if we are required by law to do so or if you violate our Terms of Service.
SECTION 4 – Smile POS
Our store is hosted on Smile POS, LLC. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you.
        Your data is stored through Smile POS’ data storage, databases and the general Smile POS application. They store your data on a secure server behind a firewall.

        Payment:

        Smile POS stores your credit card data. It is encrypted through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). Your purchase transaction data is stored only as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. After that is complete, your purchase transaction information is deleted.
        All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.
        PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers
SECTION 5 - THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us.
        However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions.
        For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information will be handled by these providers.
        In particular, remember that certain providers may be located in or have facilities that are located a different jurisdiction than either you or us. So if you elect to proceed with a transaction that involves the services of a third-party service provider, then your information may become subject to the laws of the jurisdiction(s) in which that service provider or its facilities are located.
        As an example, if you are located in Canada and your transaction is processed by a payment gateway located in the United States, then your personal information used in completing that transaction may be subject to disclosure under United States legislation, including the Patriot Act.
        Once you leave our store’s website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our website’s Terms of Service.
Links:
        When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy statements.
SECTION 6 - SECURITY
To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautions and follow industry best practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed.
        If you provide us with your credit card information, the information is encrypted using secure socket layer technology (SSL) and stored with a AES-256 encryption. Although no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we follow all PCI-DSS requirements and implement additional generally accepted industry standards.
SECTION 7 - AGE OF CONSENT
By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
SECTION 8 - CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it.
        If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we may continue to sell products to you.
QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION
If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information contact our Privacy Compliance Officer at
[email protected]
Last updated on 15 March 2017

A Taste of Northern Thai
A Taste of Northern Thai
Portland's Most Authentic Asian Restaurant
Order Online
Starter
Peek Kai are our signature wing marinated in fish sauce.
Yum & Tum
Yum mean tossed salad and Tum mean tossed by wooden mortar.
Special
Try our Famous Northern-style curry noodle (Khao Soi)
See Menu
Contact Form
Kinn Kao Northern Thai Kitchen
A Taste of Northern Thai
For over 22 years, owners Supree (Boos) and his wife Rasamee(Amy) have been providing the Pacific Northwest with the most authentic and delicious Thai Cuisine this side of the Mekong River. Kinn Kao is a celebration of the delicious northern style of Thai Cuisine. Our passionate owner, Boos recently returned to Thailand and headed North in search of the most delicious and exciting recipes to bring back to Portland. After finding some of the best chefs in Chiangmai, Boos spent several weeks learning and perfecting some of their best recipes. Now we invite you to Kinn Kao which means “Come Eat”. Join us for a lovely and exotic taste of Northern Thailand.

For over 17 years, owners Supree (Boos) and his wife Rasamee(Amy) have been providing the Pacific Northwest with the most authentic and delicious Thai Cuisine this side of the Mekong River. Kinn Kao is a celebration of the delicious northern style of Thai Cuisine. Our passionate owner, Boos recently returned to Thailand and headed North in search of the most delicious and exciting recipes to bring back to Portland. After finding some of the best chefs in Chiangmai, Boos spent several weeks learning and perfecting some of their best recipes. Now we invite you to Kinn Kao which means “Come Eat”. Siam Village Thai Cuisine
Welcome to Siam Village Thai Cuisine â Where Tradition Meets Flavor
At Siam Village Thai Cuisine, we bring the heart of Thailand to your table. Our restaurant celebrates authentic Thai cuisine, blending bold flavors, fresh ingredients, and centuries-old recipes. Every dish is crafted with care â from the comforting flavors of classic Thai curry to the fragrant street food favorites of Bangkok.
Step into a warm, inviting space inspired by Thailandâs rich culture and natural beauty. Whether youâre savoring a comforting bowl of Tom Yum soup or discovering the perfect harmony of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy in our signature dishes, every bite promises an unforgettable experience.
Join us on a journey through Thailandâs vibrant culinary landscape â no passport required.
Authentic. Fresh. Inspired.
Experience the soul of Thailand at Siam Village Thai Cuisine.
Siam Village Thai Cuisine
âWe bring Northern Thai Village, Thailand to NW West Union, Oregon.
 Come and experience it at Siam Village Thai Cuisineâ

raw_text:
Full Moon Thai - Portland, OR

Welcome To Full Moon Thai
Start your dining experience with one of the specialty drinks while you explore the vast menu. Your senses will delight in the complex flavor profiles offered by Chef Tom's unique presentation of daily entrée favorites and authentic specials that will please the casual diner and seasoned foodie alike.
Skip Gallery Carousel
Start stop gallery carousel
Reservations
Your table is waiting
We recommend booking a table in advance to ensure the best dining experience. Whether you're planning a romantic dinner, a family gathering, or a business lunch, we're here to make it special.
Reserve
Private Parties
Celebrate in style
Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, corporate event, or any special occasion, our space is perfect for memorable gatherings. We offer customizable menus, dedicated service, and a warm, inviting atmosphere. Get in touch to start planning your private event - we'll take care of the rest.
parties
catering
Bringing our flavors to you
From intimate gatherings to large events, our catering services make it easy to enjoy your favorite dishes wherever you are. Choose from a variety of menu options tailored to your needs, and let us handle the rest.
catering
Order online
Your favorites, just a click away
Craving something delicious? Skip the wait and order your favorite dishes online for pickup or delivery. Fast, easy, and always fresh - enjoy the taste of our kitchen wherever you are.
Order from
Pick up
Order from
Delivery
Our Little Story
Experience the difference
Full Moon Thai Restaurant Thai Restaurant and Bar is an elegant but affordable dining experience of authentic family recipes that have been handed down for generations. The Full Moon Thai Restaurant experience begins upon entering the Zen like, dining room. The tension eases out of your body as you are warmly greeted by the professional well-seasoned staff. It is the perfect balance of tasteful upscale white tablecloth dining and a very comfortable friendly feeling.
our menu
slideshow start stop playing
Slide 1 content
Slide 2 content
Slide 3 content
previous slide
next slide
Rotating Thai Specials:
Craving something new? Our rotating Thai menu features bold, seasonal specials that keep things fresh and exciting.
Our specials
Late Night Happy Hour:
Late-night eats just got better. Enjoy Portland's best Thai happy hour with flavorful dishes, craft drinks, and unbeatable prices—served 'til late!
Our Menu
Patio Dining on Broadway:
Soak up the vibes on our outdoor patio, right on Broadway in Portland. Great food, great drinks, and a prime location for your next evening out.
reserve
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
todd:
Outstanding food. The curry the seafood ingredients are large generous fresh and delicious. Best Thai food I think I have ever eaten. Two years later I won't change the review after two months in Thailand. This is an authentic Thai restaurant.
Review by - Google
five star review by
g j:
I've tried so many different Thai places in Portland and Full Moon is now my absolute favorite. Probably the freshest thai food i've had. The absolute best salad rolls EVER. Will be ordering from here again.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Phyllis S:
Great food, very fresh, and delicious. Kind people and a nice outdoor patio as well as indoor dining. They have excellent salad rolls and very good cocktails.
Review by - Google
five star review by
j d:
Great little spot if you're feeling thai. I got the pad ka pao with chicken and a thai coffee. The food was fantastic, our waitress was very friendly and the atmosphere was really warm and welcoming.
Review by - Google
five star review by
markell:
Easily the best most authentic Thai food, everything we ordered was amazing and this is now our #1 Thai spot!

Lunch Specials
L1. Pad Thai
L1. Pad Thai
Choice of meat with stir-fried rice noodles, egg, green onions, bean sprouts, ground peanuts, and sweet radish with house special Pad Thai sauce. Served with fresh bean sprouts and fresh lime.
$11.00
L2. Pad See Ew
L2. Pad See Ew
Choice of meat with stir-fried fresh wide size rice noodles, egg, broccoli, Chinese broccoli with special sweet soy sauce. Topped with fried garlic.
$11.00
L3. Thai Fried Rice
L3. Thai Fried Rice
Choice of meat with Thai fried rice, egg, tomatoes, green onions and Chinese broccoli. Served with fresh cucumber and fresh lime.
$11.00
L4. Pad Ka Pao
L4. Pad Ka Pao
Choice of ground meat, stir fried with fresh chili, ground garlic, onions, bell peppers, minced green beans and hot basil leaf.
$11.00
L5. Cashew Nuts
L5. Cashew Nuts
Choice of meat stir fried with roasted chili paste, ground garlic, carrots, onions, bell peppers, and cashew nuts.
$11.00
L6. Red Curry
L6. Red Curry
Choice of meat with bell peppers, eggplants, bamboo shoots and basil leaf in Thai red curry paste and coconut milk. Served with steamed white rice.
$11.00
L7. Yellow Curry
L7. Yellow Curry
Choice of meat with potatoes, carrots, and onions in Thai yellow curry paste and coconut milk. Served with steamed white rice.
$11.00
L8. Omelet Thai Style
L8. Omelet Thai Style
Beat Eggs and fried with oil. Topped with green onion. Served with steamed white rice.
$10.00

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

Dungeness Crab Cakes

Prawn Cocktail
Steamed prawns with housemade cocktail and tartar sauces, and fresh lemon 11

Steamer Clams

​
Calamari

​
Creamed Spinach
The Prime Rib’s original 1955 recipe served with grilled bread 7
​
Sautéed Mushrooms
Cremini mushrooms sautéed with onions, garlic, demi-glace, and fresh herbs 7
​
Prime Rib Bites*
Tender bites of all natural Certified Angus prime rib served in jus, with creamy horseradish and fresh herbs 17
​
SOUP & SALADS
Add soup or salad to any entrée for 5 dollars.
​ ​
Clam Chowder
New England-style with clams, bacon, diced potatoes, cream, and fresh herbs, with grilled bread 8
​
French Onion Soup
Slow-cooked veal stock, caramelized sweet onions, and vermouth, baked with Gruyere-Parmesan toast 8
​
Wedge Salad
Iceberg lettuce, bleu cheese-horseradish dressing, chopped egg, bacon, fried onions, and scallions 7
​
Green Salad
Mixed greens, beets, pickled onions, sunflower seeds, croutons, and Clyde’s bleu cheese-horseradish dressing 7
​
Kale and Apple Salad
Kale tossed with apple cider vinaigrette, Honeycrisp apples, toasted pine nuts, and Parmesan 7
​
Gorgonzola-Walnut Salad
Romaine, gorgonzola, walnuts, dried cranberries, fried shallots, and Champagne vinaigrette 8
​
Caesar Salad*
Romaine, housemade Caesar dressing, Parmesan, toasted croutons, and lemon 7
​
Little Louie Salad

​
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne
illness.
From the Butcher Block
Our prime rib and steaks are dry-aged to develop flavor and tenderness. Our pork, lamb, and other proteins are
sourced from the best local and natural purveyors we can find.
Prime Rib* – Slow-roasted with garlic and herbs, served au jus
​
Ten-ounce 28 Fourteen-ounce 34 Eighteen-ounce 38 Add sautéed mushrooms and onions 3
​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Ribeye Steak* – Chargrilled, then brushed with herb-butter
​
Ten-ounce 28 Sixteen-ounce 36 Add sautéed mushrooms and onions 3
​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Tenderloin* – Wrapped in bacon and chargrilled, with bleu cheese and veal demi-glacé 30
​ ​ ​
Hanger Steak* – Coriander-brined and smoked hanger steak, chargrilled and carved into medallions 27
​ ​ ​
Rack of Lamb* – Roasted rack of lamb, mint jus, and toasted walnuts 33
​ ​
Babyback Ribs – Slow-roasted babyback pork ribs and housemade BBQ sauce 23
​ ​
Surf-n-Turf – add 6 oz. Maine lobster tail 24
​ ​
Butcher Block entrees served with choice of roasted garlic mashed potatoes, housecut French fries, herbed rice pilaf,
or loaded baked potato (available after 5:00 PM) and seasonal vegetable. Add soup or salad 5
​ ​ ​
ENTRÉES
Burgers and sandwiches come with housecut French fries. Add soup or salad to any entrée for 5.
​ ​ ​ ​
Lobster Tail
Maine lobster tail roasted at 500 degrees, drawn butter, herbed rice pilaf, and seasonal vegetable 29
​
Seared Halibut
Halibut seared in a cast iron skillet, roasted shishito, forest mushroom, and fingerling hash, and salsa verde 26
​
Fried Chicken
Crispy fried boneless breasts, roasted garlic mashed potatoes, gravy, and braised greens 21
​
Three Cheese Ravioli
Fresh ravioli of ricotta, parmesan, and pecorino, with forest mushrooms, pickled chiles, arugula, and pine nuts 19
​
French Dip*
Shaved prime rib and “horsey” sauce on French roll, served au jus 14 Add cheese, peppers, and onions 16
​ ​ ​
Clyde’s Burger*
House-ground patty, white cheddar pimiento cheese, veal demi-glacé, crispy onions, and fresh-herb aioli 15
​
Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Crispy fried chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, pickle, onion, and chimichurri aioli on toasted brioche bun 14
​
Prime Rib Wedge Salad*
Lettuce wedges, prime rib, house dressing, chopped egg, bacon, crispy shallots, scallions, and balsamic drizzle 18

Cobb Salad

Serving Portland since 2020
Welcome to the Mox Portland restaurant menu—where cozy elegance and bold flavors meet at the game table. Our globally inspired kitchen features house-made dishes for every adventurer, with vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options available. Dine in the warm light of our Parisian-style restaurant, sip on local craft beer or signature cocktails, and explore our free-to-borrow board game library. Whether you're dropping by before a Timbers match or settling in for a long night of play, we’ve got something delicious waiting for you.

authentic Hawaiian cuisine
808 Grinds
Serving real authentic Hawaiian cuisine to Portland Oregon.
VIEW MENU
feed your event
Catering
We offer catering for any event with many different options to choose from.
CATERING
Order now
Take it to go
We make it easy for you to order online and pick up in one of our 3 locations.
ORDER ONLINE
OUR STORY
808 Grinds began with a single food cart located in downtown Portland on SW 9th and Washington. Focusing on its motto, “Spreading Da Aloha, One Plate at a Time,” 808 Grinds now includes a food cart, food truck, catering business, and two restaurant locations. For over 13 years, we have been creating delicious eats for the whole family.
Feed your event
Catering
No matter the shape or size of your event, we can offer catering services to feed all those in attendance. From different portion sizes, to a full staff, leave your guests full and satisfied.
Catering Menu

Drinks
We offer drinks that will transport you straight to the islands.
Plates
Every plate comes with rice and Mac salad for a real Hawaiian experience.
Specialties
Something special with flavors you won't find anywhere else.
Catering
Our catering will bring a taste of Hawaii to all of your guests.
We want to hear from you
Contact Us
Questions about our menu? Want to tell us about your experience? Let us know!
Catering Inquiries - Click Here
Our Founders
Childhood friends Jensen Yip and Kevin Scofield were both born in Hawaii and raised in the upcountry area of Maui. They found themselves in Portland, Oregon attending college and graduating from Oregon State University. Jensen had spent years in the restaurant industry while Kevin worked in Finance/Investments.
Shortly after Kevin was laid-off from his “suit and tie” job, they decided to use it as an opportunity to start something together and opened a food cart in 2010. Neither owner had any professional cooking background but their memories of family cooking lingered in their heads and could not be escaped. The menu spawned from family recipes and a bit of creativity. 808 Grinds was born to provide the 503 with what the people of the 808 love to eat!
LIVE ALOHA!
View our menu

Always Gluten-Free. Dairy-Free. Soy-Free. Refined Sugar-Free.
Seed Oil-Free. Seasonal. Plant-Focused. Sustainable.
Allergen Guide
As we are a casual counter service-style restaurant, we do not accept reservations, but our Weekend Brunch has an in-person waitlist available if tables are full. Please arrive expecting a 20+ minute wait between 11am-2pm on Saturdays & Sundays.
While we take every effort, we can’t always take phone-in orders during busy hours, but please do try!
BASTION. EAT WELL.

SPICY FRIED CHICKEN SLIDERS
Marinated with jalapeño & buttermilk, dusted in spicy flour, crispy-fried and topped with chipotle Napa slaw and dill pickles.

DEEP FRIED PICKLES

OVEN BAKED GIANT PRETZEL

GARLIC SESAME EDAMAME
Soybean pods sautéed with garlic sesame soy glaze.

Cheddar, jack and pepper jack cheese, simmered with roasted jalapeños, onion and tomatoes. Served with white corn tortilla chips.

Ahi tuna marinated in soy, Sriracha chili, sweet onions, avocado, nori, scallions, sesame oil and Hawaiian sea salt. Layered with rice, soy glaze and Sriracha aioli with wonton chips.
SAUTÉED BRUSSELS SPROUTS

Roma tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, basil, fresh mozzarella and our four cheese blend.

Spicy Italian sausage, prosciutto, basil pesto, roma tomatoes, feta cheese, kalamata olives, pepperoncini, four cheese blend and fresh basil.
PEPPERONI & FOUR CHEESE
Italian pepperoni, roma tomato sauce and our four cheese blend.
FRESH SALADS & BOWLS
SOUTHWEST SMOKED CHICKEN
Mesquite smoked chicken, roasted sweet corn, red peppers, avocado, marinated jicama, grape tomatoes, fresh greens and cabbage tossed with cilantro lime vinaigrette. Topped with Cotija cheese and crispy tortilla strips.
ROASTED CHICKEN COBB SALAD
Fresh greens, radicchio, arugula, roasted chicken, pepper bacon, avocado, Kalamata olives, Gorgonzola, grape tomatoes, egg, roasted corn and blue cheese vinaigrette.
SEARED AHI SALAD**
Spice rubbed and seared rare on mixed greens, arugula and radicchio with red peppers, cucumbers, Napa cabbage, edamame, Mandarin oranges, mango, soy glaze, crispy wontons, cilantro and wasabi ginger vinaigrette.
GRILLED STEAK SALAD* **
Caramelized pears, Danish blue cheese, pecan pralines, roasted sweet peppers, tomatoes, mixed greens & blue cheese vinaigrette.
CLASSIC CAESAR*
Romaine, arugula, radicchio, grana parmesan, ciabatta croutons, parmesan crisp and Caesar dressing. + Grilled Chicken + Grilled Shrimp + Grilled Salmon + Grilled Steak*
BRUSSELS SPROUTS, QUINOA & ROASTED CHICKEN**
Roasted chicken, brussels sprouts, arugula, quinoa, cranberries, candied walnuts, currants and Asiago cheese with white balsamic and pomegranate vinaigrette.
PORK CARNITAS SALAD BOWL
Pork carnitas simmered in tomatillo salsa, with steamed rice, Tajin spice crisp greens, sweet chipotle dressing, cabbage, black beans, jicama, cotija cheese, roasted corn, red peppers, avocado, pickled radish, jalapeño, and cilantro.
AHI POKE BOWL*  **
Soy marinated Ahi tuna poke, sushi rice, Napa slaw, avocado, carrot, cucumber, pickled radish and jalapeños, fresh mango, onion, cilantro, daikon, nori, sesame seeds, ginger soy glaze and Thai peanut vinaigrette.
GARDEN POWER BOWL
Arugula, shaved Brussel sprouts, quinoa, brown rice, edamame, garbanzo beans, avocado, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, radish and lemon basil vinaigrette. + Grilled Chicken + Grilled Shrimp + Grilled Salmon + Grilled Steak
MEDITERRANEAN CHOPPED CHICKEN BOWL
Chopped greens, herb roasted chicken, salami, kalamata olives, pepperoncini, feta, smoked mozzarella, garbanzo beans, cucumber, grape tomatoes, fresh sweet corn, quinoa, red bell peppers and lemon basil vinaigrette.

Boneless Korean BBQ smoked pork, grilled with gochujang sauce, sautéed kimchi fried rice and a fried egg, sunny side up.

Tempura chicken in garlic ginger orange sauce, scallions, Szechuan chilies, sticky rice and glazed Thai vegetables.

SOUTHWEST SMOKED CHICKEN
Mesquite smoked chicken, roasted sweet corn, red peppers, avocado, marinated jicama, grape tomatoes, fresh greens and cabbage tossed with cilantro lime vinaigrette. Topped with Cotija cheese.
BRUSSELS SPROUTS, QUINOA & ROASTED CHICKEN**
Roasted chicken, brussels sprouts, arugula, quinoa, cranberries, candied walnuts, currants, Asiago cheese and pomegranate vinaigrette.
GARDEN POWER BOWL
Arugula, shaved Brussel sprouts, quinoa, brown rice, edamame, garbanzo beans, avocado, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, radish and lemon basil vinaigrette. + Grilled Chicken + Grilled Shrimp + Grilled Salmon + Grilled Steak*
BURGERS & SANDWICHES
Served on a toasted gluten-free bun with lettuce, tomato, onion and your choice of Napa slaw or small house salad.
CHEESEBURGER*
Choice of cheddar, Swiss or pepper jack cheese, with pickles and burger sauce. Add Pepper Bacon
JALAPENO PEPPER JACK BURGER*
Melted pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, fresh guacamole and chipotle aioli.
BEYOND BURGER™
Plant based protein burger grilled with melted cheddar cheese, dill pickles and 1000 Island.
GREEN CHILI CHICKEN & AVOCADO SANDWICH
Roasted pasilla chilies, avocado, cilantro, jalapenos, pepper jack, Cotija cheese, spicy Napa slaw and chipotle aioli.
KITCHEN SPECIALTIES
BAJA STYLE TACOS
Three tacos with sautéed cod, shrimp or pork carnitas, chipotle aioli, cilantro lime slaw, pico de gallo, Cotija cheese and white corn tortillas. Served with Santa Fe bacon black beans.
GRILLED ATLANTIC SALMON*
Roasted garlic herb butter, fresh lemon and served with jasmine cilantro rice and seasonal vegetables.
GRILLED RIBEYE STEAK*
12oz. Center cut ribeye seasoned with our rub, garlic butter and served with seasonal vegetables and chef’s accompaniment. Add grilled shrimp
*Items are served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, seafood, shell fish, eggs or poultry may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
**Recipe contains nuts. For those who have food allergies, please inform your server. We will be happy to discuss any necessary changes.
LUNCH/DINNER
CHICKEN STRIPS
Chicken tenders breaded then deep fried to a golden brown and served with French fries and ranch dipping sauce.
FISH & CHIPS
Crispy cod served with tartar sauce and French fries.
SPICY CHICKEN SLIDERS
Tender chicken marinated in spicy buttermilk, dusted in seasoned flour, crispy fried, topped with chipotle aioli and dill pickles on a toasted brioche bun. Served with French fries.
BURGER SLIDERS
Two of our bite sized burgers, topped with cheddar cheese, burger sauce, and pickles. Served with French fries.
MAC & CHEESE
Creamy mac and cheese with three cheeses.
FOUR CHEESE FLATBREAD
Roma tomato sauce and our four cheese blend.
WEEKEND BRUNCH
KID'S BREAKFAST*
Two eggs any style with grilled bacon, roasted potatoes, and toast.
FRENCH TOAST
Coated with crunchy flakes and grilled. Topped with whipped cream and maple syrup.
BELGIAN WAFFLE
Served with butter, powdered sugar and maple syrup.
BEVERAGES
Apple or cranberry juice
Orange juice
Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Dr. Pepper, Lemonade or Milk
Roy Rogers, Shirley Temple, or strawberry lemonade
*Items are served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, seafood, shell fish, eggs or poultry may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
THE BAR MENU
CRAFT COCKTAILS, BEER & WINE
We dedicate ourselves to providing a breadth of wine varietals and vintners and high-quality beers on draft that are hand-selected for each region. Using only the freshest of produce, premium liquors, and hand-pressed juices and purees, we passionately create exceptional modern classics and signature cocktails.

We are grateful for your loyal patronage and continued support of our staff. If you would like this charge to be removed, please let your server know and we will take it off.

Hours & Location
5700 SW Terwilliger,
Portland, OR 97239
(503) 246-6963
SUN: 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM
MON - SAT: 11:30 AM - 9:30 PM
Happy Hour: Monday - Friday 3:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Pick Up:
Order Online

Event Catering
Grubhub
DoorDash
Caviar
Postmates
UberEats
Portland - A Waterfront View of the Mountains
From its vantage point at the top of historic Terwilliger Boulevard, Chart House seafood restaurant boasts some of the best seafood in Portland, as well as some of the city's best views. Overlooking the gorgeous Willamette River and offering views of Mt. Hood, Mt. St. Helens and Mt. Adams on a clear day, it's one of the most majestic viewpoints in all of the Pacific Northwest. Each December, watch the Christmas Ship Parade set sail down the Willamette River, right from the splendid dining room.
And it doesn't stop there. In addition to unrivaled scenic dining, Chart House also offers some of the most unique culinary creations you're likely to find anywhere. Combining local ingredients with creative takes on steak and seafood, it's no wonder that diners consider it to be among the city's best restaurants. Choose from entrees such as slow-roasted Prime Rib and Mac Nut Mahi - or enjoy an extensive collection of fine wines and Hot Chocolate Lava Cake.
To find seafood at its peak and the city's best happy hour, visit Chart House in Portland.

13 Coins Steaks
The boutique Royal Ranch operation in the heart of the Columbia Basin is revolutionizing the way cattle are
raised and brought to market. A regenerative ranching model, inspired by the highly successful
Royal Family Farm & Dairy, results in beef with a consistency and flavor profile that’s truly unmatched.
We charbroil our steaks over high heat, finished with a demi-glace and 13 Coins steak butter. Served with your choice of spaghettini or garlic mashed potatoes.
Filet Mignon*
Light marbling, spectacularly lean and tender, crowned with frizzled onions.

Salty’s Waterfront Seafood Grills Portland Menus
Salty's Waterfront Seafood Grills Portland Menus
Portland Menus
Click “More Menus” to see more options. Menus are subject to change without notice. Ask your server about daily specials.
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs increases your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. Menus and prices subject to change without notice on a daily basis due to changes in inventory. Please ask your server for daily specials. Menus subject to change without notice.
Reserve Portland
SALTY’S SEAFOOD
Salty’s Waterfront Seafood Grills menus for both Seattle and Portland, Oregon, feature the freshest local seafood dishes that will both surprise and delight you. Enjoy aged charbroiled steaks or fresh Northwest seafood entrées, appetizers, soup, salads, side dishes and desserts. You’ll find brunch, lunch, dinner and cafe-bar menus. Menus change frequently and seasonally in order to feature the freshest seafood available and offer an eclectic mix of comfort food, elegance and a little pinch of whatever local ingredient inspires us. We love to celebrate the arrival of fresh seasonal seafood as well as produce. In the winter, we rejoice when fresh Dungeness crab arrives with our “You Crack Me Up” Crab Festival. Springtime brings in the fresh Alaskan halibut catch where we invite you to join us for our “Just for the Halibut” Festival. Locals eagerly await summer and the arrival of Copper River Salmon when we celebrate our “Wild Ones” Summer Salmon Festival. Fall presents us with our “Aw Shucks! Amorous Oyster” Festival for oyster and other bivalve lovers.
SALTY’S E-GIFT CARDS ARE HERE!
Available in any denomination
, choose the gift that fits the occasion.
Order Now
SUSTAINABILITY PROGRAM
Salty’s prides itself on working with local farmers and fisheries to get you the best product as well as support our local economy. Since 2011, Salty’s have implemented a sustainable seafood program that focuses on safe fishing practices. We love our guests, we love our seafood and we would love it to stay that way.
AWARD WINNING WINE SELECTION
No meal would be complete without a great glass of wine to accompany it. Review our restaurant Wine Menus for a complete listing of our current wine selections featuring Washington and Oregon wines as well as international selections. After exploring our menus and blogs, call us or make a restaurant
reservations
today. Come whet your appetite on the Northwest’s most fabulous seafood — we’d love to have you as our guest!

Your Table Is Waiting
Morton's The Steakhouse is located in Portland's Southwest neighborhood across the street from Keller Auditorium, home to the Oregon Ballet, Portland Opera and the Broadway Series Events. Walking distance to the Portland riverfront, a short drive from Rose Garden Arena, the Memorial Coliseum and the Oregon Convention Center, Morton's is ideal for diners visiting the city and residents alike. Richly appointed dark wood interiors make Morton's an elegant, yet inviting atmosphere. Sip a Mortini in stylish Bar 12-21, or make reservations for an unforgettable steakhouse experience in the dining room.  Two private boardrooms with state-of-the-art A/V capabilities perfectly accommodate business meetings, birthday parties and holiday celebrations. Every detail, from the succulent steaks and seafood, and vast wine selections, to the seamless service, makes every visit to Morton's a memorable one.
General Manager: Ben Frelke
Proper attire is required.
View our dress code here.

About the Business
We are from the island of Oahu and our mission is to "Spread Aloha Through ʻOno Food". We served a mixture of foods from Filipino to Hawaiian style plate lunch: Entree, 2 scoops rice, 1 scoop mac salad.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Is the honey walnut shrimp shell on?
A:
Aloha! Our honey walnut shrimp is shell off tail on. Battered in flour then fried till light crisped and tossed in our sweet & tangy aioli topped with our candied walnuts
Tryzen P., Business Owner

RADIO ROOM
Food. Drink. Art. Music.
For the people.
With our family history in the neighborhood dating back to the early 1960's, we have seen first-hand the often unsettling pace of change happening around us for many years.
We believe that restoring neglected buildings helps preserve a little bit of the history and character of the King neighborhood while providing our neighbors with a comfortable place to gather and socialize.
The Radio Room building is an Art Deco style former service station, built in 1949 in the aftermath of the
tragic Vanport flood
as the neighborhood became home to many who fled the vanished town. Rich in history but temporarily unloved, the Radio Room building sat decaying and unwanted for many years. With a strong commitment to preservation, we set out to clean up the site and recycle the building, leaving the original structure to serve as Radio Room’s covered entry and main dining area.
With its classic 1960's mid-century style, Radio Room is a full service diner, restaurant and cocktail lounge like no other.
Our funky little sister bar,
Keys Lounge
,
likewise sat unloved and decaying for many years until we came along. With a crumbling foundation and collapsing roof, the building had long been a hazard and an eyesore to the neighborhood. We set out to save as much of the old building as possible, successfully restoring the storefront and historic signage, even repurposing some of the old locksmith contents, including many of the keys left behind.
What once were vacant and decaying buildings are now two humble monuments to neighborhood history, serving as welcoming gathering places that reflect our commitment to preservation, hospitality and our neighborhood.
neighborhood.

We're proud to offer a diverse and delicious burger menu. Our nine unique burgers feature 1/4 lb ground chuck beef, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, mayo, and onions. Each burger is cooked to order and served hot and fresh, just for you. It's fresh, it's delicious, and because you deserve the best. Serving quality since 1971.

Texas BBQ   Local Beer  Margaritas
Portland’s Original Craft Barbecue since 2006
Willamette Week Restaurant of the Year
Thanksgiving Turkeys
Sunday Brunch 9AM to 1PM
Food Network Best BBQ in Oregon
Catering Inquiries
Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
Order Online
Podnah’s is Portland’s original craft barbecue restaurant
Named in honor of my  grandfather J.R. “Podnah” Muirhead who was a butcher and BBQ’er in my hometown of Waxahachie TX.  Podnah, think Texas slang for Partner, was a true character in every sense.  Podnah was the grandfather that would teach you songs you probably shouldn’t know, let you shoot his guns, play with his farm animals like they were family dogs, and all types of mischief that every kid loves to get into.
Growing up in Texas and watching my grandparents cook Sunday meals from scratch gave me a lifetime love of food and cooking.  This eventually led to culinary school in New York, working at some very nice restaurants, learning as much as I could about the restaurant game, and full circle back to Texas BBQ.
Opened in 2006 Podnah’s has strived to make the best BBQ possible in the Pacific Northwest.  We fire up an all wood burning smoker every morning at 5am to have dinner ready that evening.  Like my grandparents we make everything from scratch daily and don’t cut corners to make things easy.
Thank You for checking us out
Rodney and the Podnah’s crew

Portland, OR 97211

​
411-417 SW 12th Ave, Portland, OR 97205
1201 SW Yamhill St, Portland, OR 97205
1232 SW Washington St, Portland, OR 97205
Mediterranean Exploration Company (MEC) is Sesame Collective’s flagship restaurant in Portland, Oregon. MEC serves up cuisine from the Mediterranean and beyond while drawing inspiration from extensive research and global travels. Located in the heart of Portland’s industrial Pearl District, MEC is a vibrant, energetic restaurant with an open hearth kitchen, and a playfully creative beverage program.
Food was delicious and service excellent. We sat outside and it was a lovely evening and a good time. Cocktails were extra-ordinary.
Judith H.
Amazing! We got the potatoes, lamb hummus, their pita is to die for and then the octopus was delish! Worth every penny! And the arak & a hard place is my fav drink.
Marissa W.
Nice selection of unique cocktails and dishes. It’s was a little loud but only because it was crowded and people were enjoying themselves. This is our second time and we will be back again.
Barb A.
Loved it! The host was incredibly friendly, hospitable, and accommodating. Food was delicious. Great date night experience.
Brandon

About Gastro Mania
Mediterranean Bistro
Ever since the day Gastro Mania was launched in 2014, it has made a name for its diverse cuisine. Within a year of its inauguration, it has become the ultimate food place for the city of Portland.
Тhe bistro offers wonderful Mediterranean specialties, Sea food, Greek food, unique breakfast, specials, Gyros, Coffee Specials and Happy Hour.

Home

Google Review
Our Food
The House Where Authentic Shawarmas Are Made
Full Menu
Shawarmas And More
Dive into our extensive menu featuring the best of Middle Eastern cuisine, from our signature shawarma wraps to an array of traditional sides and desserts.
Most Ordered
Explore our customer favorites that keep everyone coming back for more. Indulge in top picks like our tender chicken shawarma, perfectly spiced and paired with golden rice and fresh sides.
View Items
Family Meals
Enjoy a feast fit for the whole family with our generously portioned family meals. Each meal combines various shawarmas, sides, and salads, ensuring there's something delicious for everyone at the table.
View Items
Appetizers
Kickstart your taste journey with our delightful appetizers. From crispy falafel to creamy hummus, each dish is prepared to tantalize your taste buds and set the stage for a memorable meal.
View Items
Gyro
Delve into our delicious gyros, filled with your choice of tender, spiced meat, wrapped in a warm pita, and topped with fresh veggies and creamy tzatziki. A perfect fusion of taste and texture.
View Items
Shawarmas
Discover the savory delight of our shawarmas, marinated and roasted to perfection. These wraps are a staple of Middle Eastern cuisine at its finest.
View Items
Mediterranean Plates
Explore a variety of Mediterranean plates, each offering a symphony of flavors. From grilled kebabs and falafel to fresh salads and richly seasoned rice, indulge in the diversity of Mediterranean fare.
View Items
Over Salad/Fries
Choose your favorite shawarma, served over a fresh, crisp salad or a heap of golden fries. A perfect blend of flavors and textures that cater to every craving.
View Items
Kebab Plates
Indulge in our kebab plates, featuring expertly grilled meat skewers that are succulent and full of spices. Served with aromatic rice and a selection of dips, this is the taste of tradition reinvented.
View Items
Burritos with a Twist
Experience our unique twist on burritos, wrapping traditional Mediterranean fillings like spiced meats and fresh veggies in a soft, warm tortilla. It's a fusion feast wrapped up in every bite.
View Items
New Items
Check out our latest additions to the Shawarma House PDX menu! Discover new tastes with our innovative dishes, each crafted with the freshest ingredients and a twist of creativity.
View Items
Up to 35% Off Selection
Enjoy great savings with up to 35% off on select items! Dive into some of your favorite dishes at unbeatable prices. It's the perfect opportunity to taste more for less.
View Items
Drinks
Refresh and rehydrate with our assortment of beverages. From classic soft drinks like Dr. Pepper to traditional Middle Eastern refreshments, we have the perfect drink to complement your meal.
View Items
Discount up to 30% only this month.
Enjoy an exclusive 30% discount on all on-site orders this month with a minimum purchase of $100. Don’t miss out on your chance to save while indulging in our delicious menu. Visit us today and claim your promo!
New Items
Explore Our New Items
Discover new tastes with our innovative dishes, each crafted with the freshest ingredients and a twist of creativity.

October 2024

View Selection
Discovery New Menu Items
Start from $9
View New Items
Testimonials
What they say about us.
Hear directly from our customers about their experiences at Shawarma House PDX. Their stories reflect our commitment to exceptional service and unforgettable flavors.
I grew up eating Syrian style chicken shawermas all the time in Egypt and this is the first time I ever had one in the US that tasted like home. The location and service is amazing as well! Absolutely love this place and the owner was super nice, definitely coming back for traditional style food! I had the “Chicken Arabi” which was a sliced chicken shawerma with all sauces in it and fries.
Omar Youssif
Local Guide
We got a lamb wrap and chicken over fries on our first visit and we were so stunned by the quality of the food and service that we had to come back for more! What’s shown in this picture is the lamb over fries we got on our second visit. Absolutely splendid
Teddy M
Local Guide
The chicken shawarma here might be one of the best. They have an actual vertical spit for the chicken which you don't see much in Portland. The falafel was very very good too. The owner was so nice when I ordered, highly recommend this place!
Mohammad Awaida
Local Guide
A Taste of the Middle East Right in Oregon.
Discover the rich flavors of our authentic shawarma, crafted with the freshest ingredients and traditional spices. Perfect for any meal, any day.

Greek Gods Gyro
Welcome
Locally Crafted Since 2016
We are pleased to offer you our passionate Creek Egyptian casein. Greek Gods Gyro's main dish is the love toward our Great Portland customers and families. We can't wait to see you and offer you one of the best authentic menus in town.
More About Us
Hours
we are open!
Everyday | 10 AM - 8PM
Our Menu
Quality Ingredients, Tasty Meals
All gyros come with homemade tzatziki, lettuce, tomato, and onion on fresh warm pita bread. Meals come with fries, rice or baklava, and  either soda or water. Homemade white sauce hot sauce available.
Gyro
1- Lamb Gyro $9.50
2- Chicken Gyro  $9.50
3- Beef Gyro  $9.50
4- Super Gyro/Comes with choice of two of your favorite meats $11.50

Discover Entire Menu
Happy Customers!
"The best gyros and baklava in town. The lamb was tender and flavorful. I normally not like lamb but thoroughly enjoyed sharing the lamb gyro with my husband. The baklava was sweet and tender.  The prices are so reasonable. I highly recommend The Greek Gods Gyros."
- Janet Moore
"Grabbed some food here today and it was amazing! Fresh, tasty and wonderfully seasoned! The meat and bread were amazing! We will be back."
- Amanda Simon
"This place was fantastic. I'll definitely be back. I had a lamb gyro, a plate of dolmas, and a Greek salad.  I ate it over two meals, that's quite a bit of food. It was all really good. I regret not ordering the hummus. The woman that ran the cart was kind and friendly. She made me feel welcome."
- Molly Finkelstein

name: Shawarma Express Halal
raw_text:
Shawarma Express Food Cart Portland, OR – Gyros, Gyros, Kababs & more!
Skip to content
Home
Menu
Main Menu
Home
Menu
Welcome to Shawarma Express
Arabic Halal Food Cart
At Shawarma Express you will find the freshest, highest quality Halal Meals. We have been proudly serving Downtown Portland with the best Mediterranean food around. Providing our customers with the best fresh and quality Shawarma and vegetarian options is our number one priority.
Daves Station
View Menu
(971) 344-7236
645 NW ADAMS ST. mcminnville, OR 97128
11:30-9pm tuesday-sunday

Hawthorne Street Food & Bar
View Menu
(971) 344-7236
4225 SE Hawthorne Blvd, Portland, OR 97215
UberEats
DoorDash
Facebook
Yelp
Enjoyed it?
Drop us a review!
Authentic Arabic Cuisine
Here at Shawarma Express we take our reputation in Downtown Portland seriously. Our Authentic Arabic food will satisfy your hunger. Come in for lunch or dinner, 7 days a week, we guarantee you will love it!
Locally Owned & Operated
There is an energy and flare to the cart that cannot be captured in words. Whether it’s our “hole in the wall” charm or the great customer appreciation, going to Shawarma Express is always the right call.
100% Halal Food
We offer a wide range of Arabic and Mediterranean dishes that are sure to delight the palate. Our tasty food is full of flavor and affordably priced. We take pride in making fresh, 100% Halal food every time.
Gyros. 
Kabab. 
Falafel.
Saj. & more
No time to wait, not a problem! Shawarma Express can get your order started right away. Pre-order the most popular menu items like, the Combo Saj or our Delicious Kebab Plate. Call ahead for Gyrö sandwiches or our halal, marinated lamb, chicken or falafel that can be delivered to you.
VIEW MENU
Our Customers
Love Us!
Delicious and detailed in their food and service.  The meat is full of flavor and tender! The service is generous and professional. My family and I tried numbers 2, 8, and 16. They were just divine! Will come back and highly recommend!!!
Alice M.
I am a guest in Portland and this cart really helped solidify the food scene here for me. In between the many breweries, the shawarma from this cart is a a god send.
Hussein Farran
HUGE portions ! Got a lamb gyro and fries 12 bucks and had enough food for 2 VERY hungry adults and a 5 year old. Everyone was very happy with this place, great food and better prices !
D. Williams
Best Arabic Food in Portland, oR
The best way to give back is to leave us an awesome review! We love hearing from our customers and what they have to say about our beloved Halal Shawarma Food Cart in the heart of Portland, OR.

Six vegetarian dolmas stuffed with rice, tomato, onions, parsley and spices. Served over a fresh salad and accompanied by your choice of tahini or tzatziki sauce.

Choose between chicken shawarma or gyro meat served on top of a "mountain" of spicy garlic fries, garnished with feta cheese.

Salads
Feta Salad
Crisp romaine hearts, tomato, onion, fresh herbs and cucumber all tossed in our made-to-order salad dressing. Topped with a generous sprinkling of feta cheese.
$11.99
Full
$11.99
Half
