Tabbouleh Salad
A classic Middle Eastern salad made with finely chopped parsley, tomato, and onion, mixed with bulgur wheat. Dressed with lemon juice and olive oil.
$8.99
Chicken Salad
Grilled chicken shawarma on a bed of crisp romaine hearts, tomato, onion, fresh herbs and cucumber, all tossed in our made-to-order salad dressing. Finished with crumbled feta cheese, a drizzle of spicy garlic sauce and a touch of tahini sauce.
$14.99
Gyro Salad
Crisp romaine hearts, tomato, onion, fresh herbs, and cucumber, all tossed in our made-to-order salad dressing. Topped with savory gyro meat, feta cheese, and a dollop of tzatziki sauce.
$14.99
Sandwiches
Make any sandwich a combo meal with a fountain drink and your choice of:

French Fries +4.50
Side Feta Salad +4.50
Basmati Rice Pilaf +4.50
Spicy Garlic Fries with Feta +6.50
Lentil Soup +6.99
Gyro Sandwich
Your choice of classic lamb and beef shaved off our vertical spit OR grilled chicken, served in a warm flatbread pita. Topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and our creamy tzatziki sauce. For an extra kick of heat and garlic goodness, add our spicy garlic sauce.
$11.99
Shawarma Wrap
Choose between lamb and beef or grilled chicken shawarma, combined with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and onion and a choice of tzatziki, tahini or spicy garlic sauce. We wrap it all into a thin pita and grill it to perfection!
$11.99
Falafel Sandwich
Three scratch-made falafel patties, accompanied by refreshing cucumber, tomato, crisp lettuce, pickles, and tangy tahini sauce. Choose between a soft flatbread pita or a grilled wrap.
$11.99
BBQ Ranch Gyro
Experience a fun twist on our classic gyro! Thinly sliced lamb and beef or grilled chicken, paired with lettuce, tomato, and onion. Served in a flatbread pita drizzled with a generous combination of ranch and barbecue sauce.
$11.99
Kabob Sandwich
Choose between tender chicken, flavorful lamb or savory kafta kabob. Wrapped in a thin pita, it's accompanied by lettuce, tomato, grilled onion, pickles, and your choice of tahini, tzatziki or spicy garlic sauce.
$12.99
New Option
Kafta
$12.99
Chicken
$13.99
Lamb
$13.99
Jumbo Gyro
For those with a hearty appetite, enjoy "jumbo" portions of lamb and beef gyro meat or grilled chicken. Served in a flatbread pita with lettuce, tomato, onion and tzatziki sauce. To elevate the taste, we sprinkle it with feta cheese and offer a choice of more tzatziki or spicy garlic sauce.
$13.99
Super Shawarma
Enjoy generous portions of our lamb and beef or chicken shawarma complemented by lettuce, onion, tomato and pickles. All wrapped in a thin pita with your choice of tzatziki, tahini, or spicy garlic sauce and grilled to perfection.
$13.99
My New Option
Add fries or rice INSIDE the sandwich
$1
Colossal Falafel Sandwich
For falafel enthusiasts, indulge in five scratch-made falafel patties, combined with creamy hummus, refreshing cucumber, tomato, lettuce, pickles and our signature tahini sauce. Served in your choice of a soft flatbread pita or a grilled wrap.
$13.99
Entrees
Gyro Bowl
Enjoy all the delicious flavors of a gyro sandwich in a convenient bowl format! Choose between shaved lamb and beef gyro meat or grilled chicken shawarma. The bowl is served with romaine lettuce, tomato, and onion and topped with a choice of tzatziki or spicy garlic sauce. Pita bread is served on the side, perfect for dipping or creating your own gyro sandwich.
$11.99
New Option
Add fries, hummus or rice to the bowl
$3
Extra meat
$3
Gyro 2 Go Plate
Our bestselling plate featuring your choice of chicken shawarma, gyro meat or falafel perfectly paired with pilaf-style rice, creamy hummus and a refreshing feta salad. Top it off with your choice of tzatziki, tahini or spicy garlic sauce and enjoy it all with a complimentary pita bread.
$17.99
Shawarma and Rice Plate
Chicken shawarma or gyro meat served over pilaf-style rice. We use long-grain basmati rice cooked to perfection with a blend of spices, including curry and turmeric. The combination of these spices infuses the rice with a rich, warm flavor and vibrant yellow color. The plate is topped with your preferred sauce from tahini, tzatziki or spicy garlic sauce to enhance the dish.
$15.99
Hummus and Meat Plate
Chicken shawarma, gyro meat or falafel served over scratch-made hummus. Our hummus is made using traditional methods, resulting in a creamy and rich texture. The combination of the savory meat and and the smooth hummus creates a delicious contrast of flavors. You can select your preferred sauce from tahini, tzatziki or spicy garlic sauce to top the dish and savor it all with a complimentary pita bread.
$15.99
Gyro Nachos
For a unique and delicious twist on traditional nachos, try our gyro nachos. We start with fresh pita chips as the base, then layer your choice of gyro meat or chicken shawarma. The nachos are topped with crisp lettuce, juicy tomato, onion and feta cheese. To bring all the flavors together, we drizzle tzatziki and spicy garlic sauce over the nachos.
$15.99
Kabob Plates
All kabob plates are served with curry turmeric rice + fresh house salad + sauteed vegetables + hummus + a pita bread + a choice of sauce.
Beef Kafta Kabob Plate
Indulge in our perfectly seasoned ground beef kabob, mixed with onion, garlic, fresh herbs and spices.
$19.99
Chicken Kabob Plate
Experience the juicy tenderness of marinated chicken breast tenderloin.
$19.99
Lamb Kabob Plate
Delight in the rich flavors of marinated pieces of tender lamb leg.
$19.99
Mixed Grill Combo Plate
Can't Decide? Enjoy the best of all worlds with our mixed grill plate. Indulge in a combination of beef kafta, lamb and chicken kabob.
$20.99

We are Shawarma Delight, a Mediterranean restaurant offering authentic and flavorful dishes. What sets us apart is our commitment to using high-quality ingredients and traditional recipes to create mouthwatering shawarmas, falafels, and salads. With a history rooted in the heart of the Mediterranean, our passion for delivering delicious cuisine shines through in every bite. Come experience the taste of the Mediterranean with us today!

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

Teas By The Pot
Featuring Root Tonic & Tea
Medicinal teas along with classic options
By The Pot
Medicinal Teas & Tisanes
Urgent care | a restorative blend for when you’re not feeling your best
Fennel, anise, raspberry leaf, rosehips, mullein, birch bark, thyme, dandelion leaf, horsetail, blackberry leaf, peppermint
Concentration | a stimulating blend for healthy mental function and memory
Yerba mate, ashwagandha, holy basil, ginkgo, hawthorn, lemon balm, matcha (contains caffeine)
Nervous system | a calming blend for restfulness and a balanced mood
Peppermint, chamomile, passion flower, lavender, kava kava, schizandra
Throat & lung | a soothing blend for respiratory function and immune support
Elderberry, peppermint, mullein, ginseng, usnea, oregano
Cardiovascular | a warming blend for a
healthy heart and circulatory system
Green rooibos, fennel, lemongrass, hawthorn, bilberry leaf, cinnamon, ginger, red clover, roasted barley, safflower, hibiscus, lime oil
Digestion | A normalizing blend for a
healthy digestive system
Rooibos, ginger, lemon peel, lemongrass, lemon oil
Metabolism | A stimulating blend for
optimal metabolic function
Yerba mate, pu-erh, ginger, lemon peel, lemon oil (contains caffeine)
Joint & muscle | A supportive blend
for healthy joints and muscles
Rooibos, turmeric, nettle, dandelion root, ginger, holy basil, lemongrass, birch bark, willow bark
Female | A sensual blend for
hormonal and sexual health
Rooibos, raspberry leaf, ginkgo leaf, oat straw, licorice, ashwagandha, catuaba, rose petals, cacao bean, peppermint, calendula, natural chocolate flavor
Male | An invigorating blend for male hormonal and sexual health
Green rooibos, peppermint, ginkgo, puama bark, catuaba bark, damiana, hawthorn berry
Vitality | A replenishing blend for general wellbeing
Honeybush, rosehips, ginger, astragalus, licorice, ginseng, holy basil
Classics
Sencha | fukamushi
Fukamushi is a deep-steamed Japanese green tea. the lengthy steaming process releases more of the plant’s nutritional properties. this is a bright, grassy brew, with well-known health benefits.
Oolong | da hong pao wuyi
One of china's famous teas, this oolong is dark and flavorful with notes of fruit and honey. da hong pao (big, red robe) is grown in china’s wuyi mountains.
Darjeeling | glenburn
Sweet with a very light body and notes of toast and honey up front and apricot at the end. this golden cup is from the glenburn tea estate in the doon valley, nestled in the foothills of the Himalayas.
Assam | hathikuli
This single estate black tea is grown in the hathikuli organic tea garden, located in india’s golaghat district. full-bodied, rich and malty, assam is great with milk, making it an ideal morning tea – though it’s perfect any time you seek increased alertness.
Pu-erh | mini tuocha
A healing aroma rises from this high-mountain tea as its nest of compressed leaves – called “tuocha” – unfurl during steeping. fermented pu-ehr offers probiotic benefits as well as an unusually smooth, slightly herbal profile.
Subscribe For Home Delivery Of Teas

Experience a world of diverse, plant-based delights with [COKIEA'S KITCHEN]. Our menu boasts a wide array of vegan and vegetarian options, from savory classics to delightful vegan sweets. Every dish is carefully prepared with an abundance of love and dedication, ensuring a truly special culinary experience. Elevate your event with our delectable offerings, where each bite is a testament to our commitment to compassionate, flavorful dining.
UBER EATS
DOOR DASH

LOVE IS THE NUMBER ONE INGREDIENT!!
COKIEA'S MENU
COKIEA'S KITCHEN OPTIONS
Explore a world of diverse, plant-based delights at [COKIEA'S KITCHEN]. Our menu offers a wide array of vegan and vegetarian options, each bursting with incredible flavors. Come and discover these healthy, delicious creations that cater to every palate. Your taste buds will thank you!
Catering and Events,
[COKIEA'S KITCHEN] offers an extensive array of vegan and vegetarian catering options that cater to diverse tastes and preferences. From delectable vegan sweets to savory, wholesome dishes, our menu has it all. Our culinary creations are crafted with an abundance of love and passion, making each bite a memorable and compassionate experience. Choose us to elevate your events and delight your guests with plant-based perfection.
Submit Catering Inquiry
Takeout and Delivery
Elevate your dining experience with [COKIEA'S KITCHEN], where professionalism seamlessly blends with a dynamic culinary approach. Our curated menu offers a diverse range of expertly crafted vegan and vegetarian options. From delectable vegan sweets to hearty soul food classics, each dish is meticulously prepared with passion and precision. Join us on this culinary journey, experiencing the finesse of professional cuisine in every flavorful bite.
DOORDASH
GRUBHUB
UBEREATS
ORDER ONLINE
Our Testimonial
What Our Clients Feedback
Elizabeth White
"Absolutely blown away by Cokiea's Kitchen! As a devoted vegan, it's not always easy to find flavorful and satisfying options on-the-go. But this food truck delivers in every aspect. The range of dishes is impressive, and each one is made with an evident touch of love and creativity. The vegan sweets are to die for! Can't wait to be back for more!"
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Jane Martinez
Cokiea's Kitchen brings a whole new level of culinary experience to the urban streets. As someone who isn't exclusively vegan, I was pleasantly surprised by the depth of flavor and creativity in their dishes. The urban vibe adds an extra flair to the dining experience. Don't miss out on their incredible vegan sweets!"
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Alice Collins
"I can't stop raving about Cokiea's Kitchen! The vegan pies are a game-changer. The flavors are out of this world. What sets them apart, though, is the outstanding customer service. The female cook deserves a special shoutout for her talent and warm hospitality. Thank you for making my dining experience truly memorable!"
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
ORDER ONLINE
Get In Touch
Email: Vegansoul@cokieaskitchen.com
Address : Rose City Food Park, NE Sandy Blvd, Portland, OR 97213
Assistance Hours :
Wed – Sun 12:00pm - 8:00pm
Monday/Tuesday – CLOSED
Welcome to [COKIEA'S KITCHEN], where professional culinary expertise meets urban vibrance with a soulful twist. Our culinary journey began with a collective passion for redefining the boundaries of vegan and vegetarian cuisine, delivering top-tier flavors in an urban setting.
We take pride in crafting dishes that not only tantalize the taste buds but also align with a conscious, plant-based lifestyle. Our menu features an eclectic mix of globally-inspired flavors, from zesty street tacos to mouthwatering plant-based burgers, along with a selection of plant-based soul food dishes that pay homage to tradition. Indulge in our hearty vegan sweet potato pie and peace cobbler pie, where every bite tells a story of comfort and soulful nourishment.
Sustainability is woven into the fabric of our identity. We utilize eco-conscious packaging and maintain strong ties with local farmers, ensuring every dish we serve reflects our commitment to a healthier planet and community.
[COKIEA'S KITCHEN] isn't just a food truck; it's a cultural hub where passionate foodies and conscious urbanites converge. We believe in the power of plant-based living to drive positive change, one delicious, soulful meal at a time.
Join us on the streets and experience a culinary journey that transcends boundaries. Together, let's savor the bold, vibrant flavors that define a professional yet distinctly urban approach to vegan and vegetarian cuisine, enriched with the soulful comfort of plant-based soul food classics.
ABOUT COKIEA'S KITCHEN HOUSE OF LOVE.
Email: Vegansoul@cokieaskitchen.com
Phone : 971-601-2796
Address : Rose City Food Park, 5235 NE Sandy Blvd, Portland, OR 97213

doe is a woman-owned small business, Located in Portland, Oregon.
We specialize in artisanal vegan donuts and ice creams, made from scratch with local, fresh and sometimes unusual ingredients.
Quality always takes precedence over quantity. We love to sell out and we don’t love day old donuts, which is why you will never see us selling anything that isn’t 100% fresh.
check out our menu
Everything at Doe is made from scratch.
Where we source our ingredients is important to us. We choose Local, Organic, Fair Trade and Non GMO when possible. We support local farmers and buy our produce fresh. All of our chocolate is certified fair-trade from the Food Empowerment Project.
we do not use pre-made mixes.
We do not use fillings that come in tubs or glazes that come in buckets. Cheap donuts are made from cheap ingredients and we want you to walk away knowing that your hard earned money was spent wisely. We are actively supporting a small business, employees who are paid a living wage, families, fair wages overseas, non-profits, the environment and most importantly,  a plant based lifestyle.
we make donuts that are as beautiful as they are delicious

Menu
All bowls are nut, gluten, wheat, hydrogenated oil and guilt free and come with brown rice, black and red beans, avocado, cilantro, black olives, Tillamook cheddar, sour cream, salsa and Tali Sauce.
Vegan? Simply ask your Bowlista to “veganize” it!

Hyperbowle - (Feeds 10)
Perfect for office gatherings, birthday parties, etc., the Hyperbowle contains the same fresh, delicious ingredients as our traditional bowls.
Please allow at least 1/2 hour for preparation.
Orders of 10 or more bowls, or any Hyperbowle, will incur a 20% service charge.
Gift Cards

online here

Delivery & Catering
Mobile Catering Truck
Yes, we can cater your next event! We’ll show up in a cute truck and handle everything.
All catered truck events carry a $1,200 minimum.
*A 20% service fee is added to all truck appearances.
Schedule Catering
In-office catering
Whatever you’re planning, let us provide the bowls. Cater a team lunch, corporate event, or casual get-together.
Schedule Catering
Accolades
The New York Times
"The long line of people I observed at this truck confirmed for me the fact that a simple, satisfying meal with grain, protein and terrific vegetables can be worth standing in line for."
Willamette Week Readers Poll
Voted "Best Lunch Cart in Portland"
Portland Monthly
"The Best of the City"
Named "Best Lunch Cart" - "...Serves the best movable feast in town - and that's according to veg heads and meat lovers alike."
The Portland Mercury
"My new favorite food cart, the Whole Bowl serves only one thing: a big, hearty bowl of tasty hippie stuff."
guardian.co.uk
"A secret lemon and garlic "Tali" sauce (named by creator Tali Ovadia) has been attracting accolades since the early 2000s."
Hot Off the Quill
"The best and most rewarding experience I have had thus far on my voyage into Portland street food has been The Whole Bowl."
Portland Tribune
"It’s the hot fudge sundae of lunch."
The Portland Mercury
"This tin shed serves up one thing (bowl of beans, rice topped with cheese, veggies, sour cream and the mysterious tali sauce) but they do it SO well. It's addictive I tell you! ADDICTIVE!"
The Northwest Examiner
The 'bowl' is a comforting and healthful mix of brown rice, black and red beans, avocado, cilantro, olives, cheddar cheese, sour cream and cilantro. On the surface, that sounds like the inside of a burrito, but Tali's Special Sauce, a thick lemon garlic, ties all the disparate elements together and gives it an entirely different- and delicious- taste."
Portland Tribune
"After experimenting for a summer, owner Tali Ovadia perfected her 'Tali sauce' and has been building local addictions in the Pearl ever since."
The Portland Lunch Times
After 2 years on the wagon, Ovadia's special sauce has become The Whole Bowl's secret weapon. Even confirmed rice-haters adore the bowl, drenched as it is in the delicately spiced sauce- scientifically developed in Ovadia's test kitchens."
Contact The Whole Bowl Portland

キャバクラボーイとして働くメリットについて
ボーイを辞めたい・辞めた人が来るサイト
-bare bones cafe&bar-
ボーイを辞めたいと考える人は多い
ボーイの仕事はハードです。時給に見合っていない、とお考えの方もいるでしょう。
諸々の事情でお店を去るボーイは少なくありませんが、本当に
辞めるべきお店
なのかお悩みではありませんか？
もし辞めたいと思っても感情に流されず、一度立ち止まって考えてみましょう。辞めたいと考える時こそ冷静になるべきです。
まず、自分の状況を整理してみよう
最初にご自身の現状を整理してみましょう。キャバクラを辞めるのは本人の自由ですが、
本当にいま辞めても大丈夫ですか？
退職してしまうと、今後はお給料が1円も入ってきませんし、生活に影響が出てしまう可能性も否定できません。
それに新しい仕事がすぐ見つかる保証はなく、何ヶ月もバイトや転職先を探す羽目になる場合もあります。
現在の貯蓄や、ご自身の置かれている立場、今後の生活の見通しを整理しておくべきでしょう。
もちろん貯蓄に余裕があったり、新しい仕事に目処が立っているなら話が別です。
しかし、これらに問題があるならば、今後の見通しを立ててから退職を検討すべきです。
ボーイを辞めたい原因はお店？あなた？
どうしてボーイを辞めたいとお考えでしょうか？その原因を一度ピックアップしてみましょう。
お店を辞める方は少なくありませんが、実はご自身に原因があることも珍しくはないのです。
例えば、このような理由で辞める方が多く見受けられます。
・思ったほど稼げない
・仕事がきつい
ボーイの仕事は確かに辛いです。
しかし、これらの理由で辞める方はご自身にも原因があります。
逆に下記のような理由で辞めたいなら、お店に原因があると言って良いでしょう。
・脅迫や恫喝をされて精神的にボロボロになった
・違法な客引き(キャッチ)を無理やりさせられるのは嫌だ
これらはブラックキャバクラに見られる傾向です。普通のお店なら恫喝してきませんし、違法なキャッチも行いません。ご自身には何の非もなく、お店側が悪いと言えます。
辞めたい時は、主にご自身が原因なのか、それともお店が悪いのかハッキリとさせておくべきです。
それを考えることで、辞めるか留まるべきか冷静に判断できるようになります。
もし自分に反省すべき点があれば真摯に受け止めよう
万が一自分に非があった時は、その事実から逃れてはいけません。もし別のお店でボーイを始めても、再び繰り返してしまう恐れもあるからです。
反省するべき点はしっかり受け止め、真摯に向き合いましょう。原因を見つめ直し、以後は失敗を繰り返さないよう心に留めること必要があります。
例えば、こんな経験はありませんか？
・自分のミスを後輩に注意されカチンときた
・キャストと口論になった
・他のボーイやお客さんと暴力沙汰を起こしそうになった
キャバクラで長く働いていると、どれも起こりそうなものばかりですよね。
ただ、これらはご自身に原因があるか、双方に問題があるパターンです。
つい相手が悪いと思いがちですが、各種トラブルがご自身にも何らかの非があります。間違いはしっかり認めることが大切です。
できれば「ボーイ」の仕事自体は続けてほしい
ご自身に原因がある場合でも、お店を去ってしまうボーイが少なくありません。お店との縁がなかったとも解釈できますが、できれば続けてほしいのが本音です。
確かにボーイは独自のルールがあり、立場も決して良いとは言えません。最初の頃は雑用としてこき使われたり、キャストに見下されることも珍しくはないでしょう。
しかし、ボーイにはボーイ職ならではの魅力があります。代用がきかないのはもちろん、頑張れば頑張るほどお給料という見返りが得られるのも大きなポイント。
それに判断力が養われるだけでなく、精神面も鍛えられます。そして頑張りが認められると数ヶ月でマネージャーへ昇格するケースや、1年で店長になるケースも珍しくないのです。
当然、お給料も倍々ゲームで増えていきます。このような魅力を持つのはボーイ職ならではと言えるでしょう。
ボーイの仕事を続けていく中で反省すべき点は自ら省みるべきですが、それを辞めることに直結させてはいけません。
ボーイの仕事自体はしばらく続けてみて、それでも辛いと感じるなら真面目に退職を考えるべきでしょう。
最悪なお店はあってもナイトワークは最悪な業界ではない
まず最初に言っておきます。
そもそも完全にホワイトというキャバクラは存在しません。
どのお店も何らかの問題を抱えています。
極稀に完全ブラックなお店もありますが、これらはお店を”点”として見た場合です。ナイトワーク全体を””面””として見れば、最悪な業界とは言い切れないのです。
例えば、ナイトワークは他の業界と比べて稼ぎの効率が良く、様々な業界のお客さんと繋がりやコネクションを作れます。
財界人や著名人と知り合えるのもナイトワークの魅力でしょう。お店を個別に見ると、最悪に近いキャバクラも存在しますが、業界全体が悪い訳ではありません。
しっかり稼ぎたい方や、色んな人と出会いたいなら、ナイトワーク業界へ身を置くのも一考に値するでしょう。
運営者情報
津田 武彦
キャバクラのボーイとして勤務した経験あり。
ボーイの仕事は楽なことばかりではないですが、辞めてしまう前に原因を探る必要があります。
場合によってはお店を辞めなくても良い場合もあります。
当サイトでは「ボーイ　辞めたい」で検索した方などのために、ボーイを辞めてからの進路や、辞める必要性について紹介しています。

Sie haben das Recht, binnen vierzehn Tagen ohne Angabe von Gründen diesen Vertrag zu widerrufen. Die Widerrufsfrist beträgt vierzehn Tage ab dem Tag (1). At Laughing Planet, you don’t have to choose between healthy and delicious. Our menu consists of burritos, bowls, soups, salads, and smoothie, served in a relaxed and casual environment. We make it easy to go vegan, paleo, vegetarian, or gluten free without having to go taste free.

name: Fehrenbacher Hof
raw_text:
Menus | fehrenbacherhof
top of page
EAT & DRINK
COFFEE BLENDS
EAT & DRINK
Espresso, craft drinks, tea, and cold drinks
This is a place to find a corner to meet a friend, read a good book, study, or just chill. Your secret place is safe with us...
Espresso or Americano
A double ristretto shot of Coava S.O blend espresso. A quad is 4.50)
$3
Latte or Cappucino, 12 oz
Served with whole milk. Substitute soy, almond, or coconut milk for .75 and oat or hemp for 1.10
$4.25
Einspanner, two shots
A whimsical German espresso drink, simply prepared with raw sugar and topped with whipped cream.  Price listed is for a double ristretto shot.
$3.50
Tea latte - your choice, 12 oz
So many choices in the latte world, when it comes to tea. If you're craving a little pick-me-up in the afternoon, but want to stay away from coffee, a tea latte might just do the trick. Served with whole milk. Substitute soy, almond, or coconut milk for .75 and oat or hemp for 1.10
$3.50
Chai, 12 oz, choice of spicy or sweet
We offer Spicy Dragonfly or Sweet Oregon Chai. Feeling in-between, you can have yours sweet-&-spicy. Price listed is with whole milk. Substitute soy, almond or coconut milk for .75 and oat or hemp for 1.10
$4.25
Mocha, 12 oz
We use Holy Kakow! Cocoa, made with Heirloom single-origin cacao and rich Colombian sugar. Whipped cream is complimentary, on request. Served with whole milk. Substitute soy, almond, or coconut milk for .75 and oat or hemp for 1.10
$4.75
Caramel Turtle, 12 oz
Thick caramel sauce, Holy Kakow! organic chocolate sauce, espresso, steamed milk, and whipped cream on request. Served with whole milk. Substitute soy, almond, or coconut milk for .75 and oat or hemp for 1.10
$5
★ Cold Brew Coffee, 16 oz
We make our own using Longbottom's rich, dark "Black Gold" organic, fair-trade coffee beans. 20 oz option available for 4.25.
$3.75
Italian Soda, 16 oz
Choose from a wide selection of Monin syrups, such as Raspberry, Peach, and Lavender. Add half and half or whipping cream for a delicious treat.
$2.75
Whole Leaf Teas, for here or to go
We have a great selection of whole leaf teas from Jasmine Pearl Tea Merchants. Come by and check it out.
$3
Hang out and enjoy your food, or bring a few back to the office...
Breakfast sandwiches & burritos; deli sandwiches; homemade soups; quinoa beet salad; house soups; house pastries: feel free to call in your order!
Breakfast Sandwich
Each sandwich is baked to deliciousness.
English muffin slathered with Reuben sauce, your choice of  ham, Morningstar veggie sausage, or avocado (or add $1.00 for our haus-cooked corned beef), a thick slice of Tillamook cheddar, and a slice of tomato (added at the end). Plain sandwich without the protein or avo filler is 5.00
$6
Breakfast Burrito
Filled with mini potato patties, Tillamook cheddar, a whole baked egg, choice of  filling (avocado, Morningstar vegetarian breakfast sausage, ham or corned beef (add 1.00 for corned beef), salsa, and sour cream.
$7
Homemade Granola-coming soon!
Oats, raisins, cranberries, sliced almonds, and oat bran are just some of the goodies in our house granola.
$6
Vegetarian
Vegan
Homemade muffin
Fresh daily
$3
Banana or Harvest Bread
$3.25

name: Sushi Love
address: 4943 Ne Mlk Jr Blvd, Portland, OR 97211
raw_text:
SUSHILOVE
0
Skip to Content
Home
About
Menu
Order
FAQ
Open Menu
Close Menu
Home
About
Menu
Order
FAQ
Open Menu
Close Menu
Home
About
Menu
Order
FAQ
Serving up the best plant based sushi in the Portland area, Period.
Order Pickup Or Delivery Now
Always 100% plant based & gluten free.
Everything is made in house using nothing but the freshest ingredients, and all of our rolls are made fresh when you order them.
Allow us to reintroduce ourselves.
We took a break, a reset you might say, but we never left the kitchen. We kept rolling, kept refining recipes and even added a couple new cooks to our kitchen.
We moved to a new full size kitchen and are available city wide for delivery. There are more new things in the works for later this year, but for now we’re excited as hell to be making sushi for the city we love.
Let’s get it!  and we hope you do!
Sushi Menu
Inari Bites
Three tofu pouches stuffed with a special blend of rice, vegetables and spices. Sautéed and topped with spicy mayo. A customer favorite!
$9
Tiki Tiki
Chili pineapple soy curls, collard greens, sriracha coconut flakes, and spicy mayo.
$14
Fresh Prince
Avocado, cucumber and cream cheese. Topped with black sesame seeds.
$10
Glazed and Confused
Miso glazed sweet potatoes, avocado, pickled ginger, sesame seeds and    sur-eel sauce.
$14
Flavor Of Love
Hearts of palm salad, cream cheese, cucumber, avocado, fresh dill and shichimi togarashi.
$14
Wassup Jalapeno
Cucumber, cream cheese, asparagus, topped with seared jalapeño slices, crushed wasabi peas and wasabi mayo.
$14
Damn Skippy
Marinated soy curls sautéed in peanut sauce, cucumber, pickled carrots, red cabbage and cilantro.
$14
Bowls & Sides
Tiki Tiki Bowl
Seasoned sushi rice, chili pineapple soy curls, collard greens, sriracha coconut flakes, and spicy mayo.
Coming Soon !
Damn Skippy Bowl
Seasoned sushi rice, marinated soy curls sautéed in peanut sauce , cucumber, pickled carrots, red cabbage and cilantro.
Coming Soon !
Cucumber Salad
Cucumber, red onion and ginger.
$6
Delivery to your crib, house, palace, easy.
The good news is that its never been easier to pickup Sushi Love or have it delivered right to your doorstep. The even BETTER news is that if you order through the links on our website, there are zero commission fees attached. Which means the lowest price all around for everybody.
Order now! Click the link to your preferred app.
FAQs
Sushi Love is back open again?
YES! We're now operating out of a new location with a full kitchen! Are you ready to fall in love again?
How many pieces are in a roll?
We make Whole Rolls which are cut into (8) pieces.
Are you a meat and gluten free facility?
No, we share a large kitchen but our space and utensils are completely separate.
Are you a sit down restaurant?
At the moment we offer pickup and delivery only. But stay tuned… we’re working on some exciting things.
How do I place an order?
Click the link on our website to your preferred delivery app. If you use the links on our website they charge us 0% commissions. This allows us to offer you the lowest price!
Can I just stop in and order?
Yes, but you’ll still have to order online. The QR code is right on our front door, we aren't accepting any cash sales at this time.
Let’s Stay In Touch
Wanna stay in the loop for all things Sushi Love? Deals, menu updates, sushi eating contests? Add your email and we’ll keep ya updated as things roll out. ( no pun intended)
Email
*
Thank you!
Follow us @sushilovepdx
Sushi Love
4943 NE MLK JR BLVD, Suite 101
Portland OR 97211
503 896 4039
sushilovepdx@gmail.com
Wednesday  Through   Saturday
5pm - 9pm

raw_text:
EastBurn
PHONE: 503.236.2876
Questions: EVENTS
@THEEASTBURN.COM
‍
Parties
:
EVENTS@THEEASTBURN.COM
THE EASTBURN
Established in 2008, Eastburn is a neighborhood Public House that is as diverse as Portland’s population.
Our Sous Chef [Chef Branden] elevates the public house dining experience with innovative brunch and dinner dishes that comfort and delight.
Our GM [Michael] and Bar Supervisor [Cozette]
makes su
re that guests experience the best of hospitality, while overseeing a lovingly curated draft list and cocktail menu. Our Events Manager [Mike] makes sure all of the private events book here have the personal touch and go off with out a hitch with customer service and menus.  Be a guest at your own event by booking at the Eastburn.
Eastburn boasts two floors of dining and entertainment with two full bars, 16 rotating taps, and a heated patio with swing chairs and fire tables.
From fantastic brunch, lunch, full menu happy hour and dinner, to drinks on one of our two patios, to a game of skee-ball in the TapRoom…EastBurn has something for everyone!
New Hours
Now open for Breakfast at 8am

Recess Dinner Happy Hour 3-5pm   Seven Days a Week on Full Dinner Menu

Additional Outside Seating

Thanksgiving
Christmas Day
We have sixteen rotating taps in house. Between the eleven taps upstairs and eight taps downstairs in our Tap Room, you will find a wide selection of local craft beers and ciders from some of the country’s most progressive breweries and cider houses. Below is a live list of what we are pouring right now. Updated in real time.
